data:
AKANGABAZI nakancane ukuthi uzowuphasa ngamalengiso u-matric uNobuhle Khuzwayo (18) ofunda Ohlange High, eNanda phezu kobunzima asebhekane nabo empilweni.
UNobuhle nomamncane wakhe bakhishwe emzini abebehlala kuwo ngo-Okthoba, unina washona esemncane kanti uyise akanabo ubudlelwano naye. Noma kunjalo le ntokazi ehlale imamatheka ithe izowuphasa ngamalengiso u-matric. Ngesikhathi sihlangana nayo ubungeke usho ukuthi isidlule ebunzimeni obukhulu njengoba ibingelela ngemfudumalo futhi imoyizela.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
OWAYENGUMENGAMELI, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki, uxwayisa ngokuthi kunenhlekelele enokwenzeka noma yinini eNingizimu Afrika uma isimo singalungiswa.
Ethula inkulumo yakhe emcimbini obuhlelwe yiphephandaba langeSonto lapho bekuhlonishwa khona izinkampani eziwu-100 ezinkulu ezenza kahle ngoLwesibili ebusuku, uMbeki uthe lizonyuka izinga lokungagculiseki kubantu okuzoholela ekutheni kube khona imibhikisho eminingi.
label: politics

data:
BATHANDAZELA ukuthi alulame esibhedlela owesifazane okuthiwa udutshulwe amahlandla amane nguyise wezingane zakhe obeyiphoyisa likaMasipala waseThekwini emzini wakhe ePhilani Valley, eMlaza, ngoMgqibelo.
USergeant Mduduzi Buthelezi (41) utholakale eseshonile emgwaqweni u-R603 eMbumbulu ngemuva kokuthi imoto abehamba ngayo ishayisane mahlanze neloli. Kepha okuxake umndeni wakhe wukuthi ubeshile ebusweni enenxeba lokudutshulwa esandleni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
INYUNYANA yamaphoyisa nojele, iPolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru), isizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngezokuphepha emajele ngemuva kokushona kweziboshwa ezintathu kwalimala abangu-25 kade kulwa ojele neziboshwa ejele iSt Albans eBhayi ngoMsombuluko.
Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba izolo, okhulumela iPopcru, uMnuz Richard Mamabolo, uthe badumele ngokwehlwa kwalesi sigameko ebesingagwemeka ukuba ezokuphepha ziqinile emajele.
label: crime, law and justice

data: USOMAHLAYA wakuleli osezinze e-United States, uTrevor Noah, uzoba nengqophamlando yohlelo lapho azoxoxa khona nomengameli uBarack Obama. Njengoba usuphela lo nyaka abantu base-US abavotele kuwo umengameli omusha, uTrevor uzoba nengxoxo ekhethekile no-Obama eWhite House. Kuzobe kungokokuqala ngqa lo mengameli ekhuluma ohlelweni olwethulwa iThe Daily Show with Trevor Noah. Lolu hlelo luzodlala kusasa (Disemba 13) ngo 9 ebusuku kuComedy Central (DStv 122). Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukhetho e-US, uTrevor ukhulume nabaholi abaphambili kwezombusazwe kulolu hlelo okubalwa kubo uBill Clinton, uDkt Ben Carson, Senator Lindsay Graham noSenator Rand Paul. Kubanye abantu abazovela ohlelweni luka Noah kuleli sonto kubalwa intatheli uTa-Nehisi Coates (Disemba 14), umlingisi uMichael K. Williams (Disemba 15) Rod Corddry we-Office Christmas Party (Disemba 16) nabanye. Kusukela ngoJanuwari 4, 2017, iDaily Show with Trevor Noah izodlala ngo 9.55 njalo ngoLwesibili kuya kuLwesihlanu.
label: politics

data:
IBHANTSHI ligcwale umoya kubaholi beNFP, uMnuz Maliyakhe Shelembe noSolwazi Nhlanhla Khubisa abagwetshwe iminyaka engu-10 bengazihlanganisi neqembu kwaphinde kwahoxiswa nobulungu babo ngemuva kokulahlwa ngamacala ebebekwe wona yiqembu.
Ikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe leqembu, lithole uShelembe obenguSihlalo kazwelonke owesula esikhundleni noKhubisa obenguNobhala-jikelele naye owasula, benecala lokwehluleka ukubhalisela iqembu kusenesikhathi ukuze lingenele ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya nokwaholela ekutheni ligcine lingangenanga.
label: politics

data:
INTATHELI YESOLEZWE
ISIBOSHWA sokuqala ukweqa ejele lasePitoli, u-Ananias Mathe, sigcine sishonele eKing Edward VIII Hospital ngoLwesibili ntambama kulandela ukuxinwa ukugula. UMathe ushonele kulesi sibhedlela eThekwini emva kwesikhathi enenkinga ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“yokugaya ukudla esiswiniÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢. 

Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uMathe waba yisiboshwa sokuqala ukweqa ejele iC-Max ePitoli ngonyaka ka-2006, wabanjwa emva kwenyanga eqile. Ngo-2005 weqa eJohannesburg Central Police Station. Ngonyaka ka-2009 wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-54 ejele emva kokulahlwa amacala angu-64 ayebekwe wona, okubalwa kuwo awokuphanga ehlomile, ukudlwengula, ukubulala nokugqekeza. 

Ngenxa yokuthi ubesezame kabili ukweqa ejele laseKokstad, KwaZulu-Natal, kubikwa ukuthi izikhulu zakhona ziqale zazitshela ukuthi ukuya esibhedlela bekuyingxenye yecebo lakhe elisha lokweqa ngenkathi exinwa ukugula emasontweni amathathu edlule. 
Nokho ugcine ehanjisiwe esibhedlela lapho afike ashonela khona.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
I-AFRICAN National Congress (ANC) izolo izwakalise ukuthi isibonile isimemezelo seNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) sokuthi usenikezwe amasamanisi uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Pravin Gordhan okuba avele enkantolo ngamacala okukhwabanisa kulandela uphenyo ngeSouth African Revenue Service (Sars). 
ObenguKhomishana kwaSars, uMnuz Oupa Magashula noMnuz Ivan Pillay obeyiSekela likaKhomishana khona kwaSars, nabo banikwe izincwadi zamasamanisi ezibafuna enkantolo noGordhan.
label: politics

data:
I-ANC ayeneme ngabaholi abafuna uMengameli Jacob Zuma axolise emndenini wowesifazane owambopha ngezinsolo zokumdlwengula ngo-2005. Leli qembu libachaze njengabantu abangavuthiwe emqondweni.
Umkhulumeli we-ANC, uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, uthe iyabaxaka indaba yokuthi kumele uZuma axolise ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi inkantolo yamthola emsulwa ngezinsolo zokudlwengula uNksz Fezekile Ntsukela Khuzwayo obebizwa ngoKhwezi ukuze avikeleke.
label: politics

data:
UHLAKAZWE ngezinhlamvu ezingu-20 emagcekeni esonto izolo umfundisi webandla iPresbyterian, eLamontville, eThekwini. Basale bebabaza isihluku abantu bakule ndawo namalungu ebandla ngokudutshulwa kukaMfundisi Vusi Mabaso (57) ongusomatekisi.
Amatekisi akhe abehambela khona eLamontville. Uhlaselwe ngabantu abangaziwa izolo ekuseni ngabo-8 esemishini lapho ehlala khona. Abahlaseli kuthiwa bebehamba ngeVW Polo empunga. Umufi kuthiwa uphume emishini eyokhuluma nocingo nokuyilapho abasolwa bemdubule bephindelela, kuthiwa noma eselele phansi bebelokhu bemdubula njengoba nesandla size sahlephuka.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma usenxuse ngokusemthethweni uMvikeli woMphakathi oshiyayo u-Advocate Thuli Madonsela ukuba amnikeze isiqiniseko lungakapheli usuku lwanamuhla (ngoLwesibili) sokuthi ngeke aluphothule uphenyo lwakhe engazange amnike ithuba lokupheka ngemibuzo ofakazi.
Esitatimendeni, ihhovisi likaMengameli lithe uZuma ugxeke u-Adv Madonsela ngokumnqabela ukuba naye azibuzele kofakazi abone namaphepha ophenyo nge-state capture.
label: politics

data:
UMA ngibuka okwenzeke e-USA ngenyanga edlule nangonyaka odlule wonke ngingasho ukuthi cishe * -2017 uzoshaya uzwele ngempela kumuntu ophila eNingizimu Afrika.
Okokuqala nje uMnuz Donald Trump wathi uzozikhokhisa intela ethethe xaxa izinkampani ezisuka e-USA zidilize abantu bakhona ngoba zikhetha ukubhunguka kuleliya lizwe ziyokwakha amafemu emazweni okuzoshibha ukukhiqiza kuwona.
label: politics

data:
USAKHUNGATHEKILE umndeni wowesilisa oshone ngeSonto ekuseni ngemuva kokuphuza umuthi ethi ukhipha idliso. UMnuz Bheki Hlongwane (46) waseMafefetheni, eBergville, obehlala ehostela eDalton eThekwini, kuthiwa ubuye nomuthi wokuphalaza okungaziwa ukuthi uwuthathephi okuthe eqeda ukuwuphuza, wakhihliza amagwebu.
Kuthiwa abebenaye bamphuzise ubisi bamphuthumisa esibhedlela kodwa kwathiwa ufike esibhedlela esevele eshonile. Isolezwe liye ehostela lafica abafowabo bakamufi begcwele indlu abehlala kuyo besashaqekile. Bakhombise intatheli umuthi okuthiwa ubephalaza ngawo. Nabantu abebehleli amaqoqwana kuleli hostela bebeyibabaza le ndaba kucaca nje ukuthi iyimpicabadala.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMENGAMELI we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema ukhwele wadilika kuMengameli Jacob Zuma emsola ngokuthi uzonda imfundo ngokuvumela kugqunywe emajele abafundi abaqhuba umkhankaso wemfundo yamahhala kuleli.

Ekhuluma ngaphandle kwasejele laseWestville, eThekwini izolo, ngemuva kokuvakashela ezitokisini omunye wabafundi abahola i-#Fees Must Fall eKZN, uBongonkosi "Education" Khanyile, uMalema uthe uKhanyile ugqunywe ejele ukuze kujatshuliswe uZuma.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUNDIZE izihlalo kwaba wubumayemaye eNkantolo yeMantshi eScottburgh izolo ngesikhathi iziboshwa esezitoke iminyaka emihlanu zijomba ebhokisini zishaya abashushisi ababili ngezihlalo zidinwa wukuthi bafuna kuhlehle icala.
Umthombo weSolezwe uthe lokhu kwenzeke emini ngesikhathi abashushisi benza izethulo ecaleni lamadoda awu-25 nowesifazane oyedwa ababoshwa ngo-2012 ngecala lokweba amakhebuli.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UFANISE indodana yakhe noJosefa waseBhayibhelini, unina wesiboshwa esidonsa isigwebo seminyaka engu- 15 esigile izimanga siphasa * -matric ngamalengiso. 
UNkk Gladys Ngcobo (53) ongunina kaKwandokuhle Ngcobo (22) ogwetshelwe ejele laseWestville ophase ukudlula bonke abafundi ngaphansi koMnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo, uthe zimthokozise kakhulu izindaba zokuphumelela kwendodana yakhe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UGCINWE esitokisini owesifazane waseHammarsdale okuthiwa uncishe umoya usana lwakhe olunezinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye ngokulimboza ngesiqamelo ebusweni, laze lashona ngemuva kwengxabano noyise walo ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.
UNksz Hlengiwe Radebe (23) kuthiwa uvele kafushane eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu, icala lakhe lahlehliselwa isonto elizayo lapho okulindeleke ukuthi afake isicelo sebheyili.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMGCINIMAFA-JIKELELE we-ANC, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uyaziqhelelanisa nombiko wabezindaba oveza igama lakhe kuthiwa uphakanyiselwe ekutheni abe yiPhini likaMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, yena ovela ekwesobumengameli njengoba kubhekwe engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi bukazwelonke ezoba ngoDisemba.
Ekhuluma ohlelweni lndaba kwiGagasi FM izolo, uMkhize unxuse ukuthi amalungu ombutho ayeke ukulokhu ephakamisa amagama njengoba kubhekwe engqungqutheleni.
label: politics

data:
INKAMPANI yomculi wowokholo ongasekho iphoxekile ngesithombe sowesifazane oshuthe eqhwakele ethuneni lakhe. Isithombe sisabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
AbeNcwane Communications bathi ukuba yiqhawe nosaziwayo kukaSfiso Ncwane akusho ukuthi abantu abenze noma yini ethuneni lakhe. Bakusho lokhu emuva kokuthi owesifazane okusolwa ukuthi ubeye komunye umngcwabo ngempelasonto eshuthe emamatheka ehlezi ethuneni lakhe egqoke nezingubo ezimnyama. Ugxekwe kakhulu abanye, bembiza ngethatha lowesifazane ozifunela udumo.
label: society

data:
UKUKHULELWA eneminyaka ewu-16 efunda * -grade 11, wahlala iminyaka emithathu engafundi ekhulisa ingane, kumvuse emaqandeni umfundi waseMkhuphula, eMsinga, obuyele ka-matric wadabula zonke izifundo.
UThobile Mthiyane (23) wafunda * -matric ngo-2010 enengane encane wawufeyila, kodwa kuleli sonto ubemdibi munye nabafundi baKwaZulu-Natal abebeklonyeliswa wuNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo kulesi sifundazwe ababaqwaqwade bonke emakhanda.
label: society

data:
UNOVALO umndeni kaSihlalo weziNduna zaKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Vusumuzi Mthethwa, ngemuva kokudutshulwa kwendodana yakhe ngentululwane yezinhlamvu isendleleni ebheke ekhaya.
Ngokusho kukaMthethwa indodaba yakhe, uMnuz Thobani Mthethwa (26), iqale ngokuyoshiya ezinye izingane esebenza nazo, kuthe isiphuma kozishiya kwavumbuka amadoda angaziwa adedela inhlamvu ebhekise emotweni yayo, yaze yayobhajwa esihlahleni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUTHIWA beyidla amagalani futhi ilayishe ngokweqile itekisi okushone kuyo izingane ezine ebeziya esikoleni, kwalimala ezinye eNtuzuma, eThekwini, izolo.
Leli tekisi okuthiwa belilayishe abagibeli abangu-22, litholane phezulu nebhasi kaMasipala weTheku lizama ukudlula enye imoto. Kule ngozi eshiye abantu bethuthumela ngosuku lokuvulwa kwezikole, kushone abafundi abangabafana, base-Sivananda Technical High noyintombazane waseSibonelo High.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UFISA sengathi ngabe uyakwazi ukusicisha emiqondweni yabantu isigameko esisematheni, owesifazane ogxekwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoba eshuthe eqhwakele ethuneni lomculi ongasekho uSfiso Ncwane. UNkk Nondumiso Biyase waseMgungundlovu, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ufisa kufinyelele emndenini wakwaNcwane ukuxolisa kwakhe ngesenzo sokushutha ethuneni.
UNkk Biyase othe washonelwa umyeni eneminyaka engu-22, uthe ubengazi ukuthi ukushutha kwakhe ethuneni likaNcwane kuzonyakazisa isizwe kangaka.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
Sekukaningi ngithola imibuzo izungeza ekutheni abesifazane abatshelwa ukuthi bayabanda ocansini; bebuza ukuthi ikhona yini into enjalo, uma ikhona kungabe yini imbangela? Le mibuzo iyaqhubeka ithi uma kungekho into ewukubanda ocansini, yini eyenza abesilisa okanye abesifazane baze baphimise la magama ahlabayo?
Ekuhlahleleni le mibuzo, ngiyafisa siphinde sibuke indima yabefundisi. Ngikhuluma ngabagcotshwa ekufundiseni ngocansi ikakhulukazi labo abangena emshadweni. Lokhu kubalulekile ngenxa yomthamo omkhulu wolwazi olunezimbomo eziningi, esizithola njengoba abantu bakithi bekhala ngapha nangapha ngento eyodwa: ewucansi.
label: society

data:
UMFUNDI waseNdengetho High School KwaNdengezi uqophe umlando eba ngowokuqala emlandweni wakulesi sikole ukuphasa kahle athole o-A kwiMaths neSayensi, nakuzo zonke ezinye izifundo abezenza kwa-Grade 12.
UBheka Kunene (19) waseDesai, eMariannhill, uthole o-A abayisikhombisa kuzo zonke izifundo zakhe. Lokhu bekungakaze kwenzeke emlandweni walesi sikole selokhu saba khona.
label: education

data:
UYOKWENZA izifundo zobudokotela eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal umfundi waseMavela High oPhondweni eJozini okhule elusa izinkomo ehamba nebanga elide uma eya noma ebuya esikoleni.
UBongumenzi Simelane (17) umenyezelwe nabanye abafundi abaphase ngamalengiso yize bebefunda ngaphansi kwengcindezi. Ubonga uyise owamyekisa ukwelusa izinkomo, wathi abhekane nezincwadi kuphela ekuqaleni konyaka.
label: education

data:
BANOVALO lokuthi luzoqala phansi udlame oludlule nenqwaba yemiphefumulo ehostela laseMlazi iGlebelands njengoba kuqhubeka ukuthathwa kwemali yosomatekisi ngodli yiqembu elalifuna ukubagada ngenkani.
Abahlali basehostela banovalo lokuthi kungenzeka kuphinde kuqale phansi ukubulawa kwabantu njengoba liqhubeka nokuqoqa imali iqembu labantu okuthiwa bahlala kuleli hostela. Leli qembu kuthiwa liqale ukuqoqa imali ngejozi kubashayeli bamatekisi ahambela ehostela ngo-Okthoba nyakenye, emuva kokuthi osomatekisi benqabe ukubavumela ukuthi babaqaphe.
label: crime, law and justice

data: NJALO kabili ngenyanga sizokuphathela ingosi ehlaziya kabanzi ngezinkanyezi. Sizobe sihlaziyelwa nguMnuz El-Sun Nzama oyi-Astrologer. UNzama ufunde eThurburn School of Astrology D.M.S. Astrol; wathola iziqu eRod Suskin School of Astrology, kuyimanje wenza iHonours kwiVedic Joytish Astrology, Hellenistic and Urianian Astrology kanti uyilunga eligcwele le Astrological Society of South Africa (ASSA). UNzama uyatholakala kwinombolo ethi 072 388 4419 ngezikhathi zomsebenzi. Namuhla usihlaziyela i-Aquarius okungabantu abazalwa kusukela ngoJanuwari 21 kuya kuFebhuwari 20.

data:
NJENGOBA elokhu eqhamukile amagama abantu abasembangweni wokuhola i-ANC, umhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele uMnuz Xolani Dube yena uthi ubona uNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likaMengameli Jacob Zuma, uMnuz Jeff Radebe kunguye ongangena khaxa kulesi sikhundla.
Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uDube uthe uRadebe nguyena mholi oyisibonelo sokuthi ilungu le-ANC kumele libe umuntu onjani.

data:
USHAYA phansi ngonyawo umkhulu womzukulu okuthiwa udlwengulwe wumakhelwane, osefuna ukukhokha * -R1000 nembuzi ukuhlawula umzukulu wakhe oneminyaka ewu-15.
Lo mkhulu waseNkanini eMuden ngaseMsinga, esiligodlile igama lakhe ngenhloso yokuvikela umzukulu wakhe, uthe akazimisele ukuthuthukisa isihlava esesivamisile kule ndawo ukuthi uma kudlwengulwe owesifazane, umndeni wakhe ugcine usuxoxisene nomdlwenguli, ukhokhelwe * -R1000 okanye imbuzi.

data:
UMPHAKATHI waseMalukazi ngaseMlaza ufuna adingiswe owesifazane osolwa ngokucwasa owesilisa onebala elimhlophe, okuthiwa wamgenca ngocelemba wavuka esibhedlela. Ukusho lokhu enkantolo.
Umndeni kaMnuz Mlungisi Makhanya (32) ongakwazi kahle ukuhamba ngenxa yokukhubazeka, uthi ukhathele ukuhlukunyezwa nguNksz Phindile Ngcobo (44), odedelwe ngaphandle kwebheyili yinkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, ngoLwesibili, ngecala lokushaya uMakhanya.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
NGONYAKA odlule sibhale ngohlelo lwentuthuko kamacaphunakusale waseThekwini uMnuz Vivian Reddy, i-Oceans Umhlanga, ka-R3.8 billion lapho ayemema khona umphakathi ukuthi uthenge amasheya ehhotela lomtakabani i-Radisson Blu ezoba kule ndawo yomtakabani.
Kule nyanga amasheya e-Radisson Blu aqale ukudayiswa kanti ababefake izicelo bathunyelelwe ama-emails abazisa ukuthi izicelo zabo ziphumelele.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
ASEQALILE ukuvalwa amanzi kuzo zonke izindawo ezikuMasipala weTheku njengoba kuvela ukuthi abantu abawongi ngokwanele. NgeSonto abengekho amanzi eMlaza, Burlington naseChatsworth kanti izolo abantu baKwaNdengezi, Klaarwater, St Wendolins, Savannah Park naseShallcross bavuke bengenawo.
INhloko yoPhiko lwezokuXhumana kuMasipala weTheku, uNksz Tozi Mthethwa, ithe ngenxa yokuthi isomiso siyaqhubeka amanzi ayancipha emadamini amakhulu.
label: society

data:
UBUKEKA usekude ukuphela umsindo othinta iqembu elibusayo i-ANC mayelana nomkhankaso walo wokubeka kabi amanye amaqembu epolitiki. Manje sekuvela ukuthi ezinye izikhulu ze-ANC ziyawazi lo mkhankaso kodwa ngakolunye uhlangatho i-ANC iyaphika.
 Ngokwemibiko yayizolo kuthiwa uNksz Sihle Bolani wayiqopha inkulumo yakhe ngesikhathi enomhlangano noMnuz Ignatius Jacobs oyimenenja kwi-ANC. Kulowo mhlangano uNksz Bolani wadlulisela umbiko wakhe wokuqala kuJacobs emkhombisa ukuthi kuyishubele i-ANC okhethweni. Kubikwa ukuthi uKhongolose wayeshodelwa wu-R50 million ekutheni aqhubeke nomkhankaso wokubeka kabi amaqembu aphikisayo.
label: politics

data:
ABAFUNDI abebenza unyaka wokuqala emanyuvesi bathi kumele bazibambe ziqine abazoqala nonyaka ngoba akusiniswa mahleza.
 USphilangenkosi Dlamini (20) waseJozini owayedabule o-A abayisithupha eMavela High nyakenye, uthe akakholwanga uma efika enyuvesi esephasa ngo-60% ezifundweni. USphilangenkosi oyokwenza unyaka wesibili kwiBachelor of Medicine and Surgery, e-University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN), ubona ukuthi ukwehla kwamamaki ezifundweni kwenziwa wukuthi muningi kakhulu umsebenzi enyuvesi.
label: education

data:
OWESIFAZANE waKwaMashu owaphucwa izingane zakhe esolwa ngobudedengu, sekuphele iminyaka emibili elinde ukuthi zibuyiswe ngemuva kokuthi icala ayebekwe lona lihoxisiwe.
Lo wesifazane igama lakhe eligodliwe ukuvikela izingane uthe wayesolwa ngokunikela ngendodakazi yakhe esokeni lakhe elingayizali ukuthi liye nayo ocansini. Uthe wayesolwa ngokuthi akazange athathe izinyathelo ngesikhathi efica isoka lakhe lilele nendodakazi yakhe eyayineminyaka eyishumi ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UPHIKO lwentsha kaKhongolose eThekwini i-ANCYL lusale lukhwice imsila emuva kokuthi luthethiswe kanzima ubuholi benhlangano ngesenzo salo sokumemeza esidlangalaleni ukuthi akuxoshwe uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Pravin Gordhan.
Lolu phiko luphumele obala lwacela uMengameli Jacob Zuma ukuba akhombe indlela lo ngqongqoshe. Bebekhala ngokuthi wehluleke wancama ukuletha uguquko enkampanini yamabhanoyi kuleli, iSAA. Lolu phiko belusola uGordhan ngokuvumela idlanzana losomabhizinisi abamhlophe ukuba bahlomule kule nkampani kuvalelwe ngaphandle abamnyama.
label: politics

data:
UKUKHULA ehlala emjondolo uthi yikhona okumnike ugqozi lokuthi abhale incwadi egqugquzela intsha ukuthi ingalilahli ithemba, umbhali osemncane waseThekwini.
UMnuz Ayanda Jwara (29) okhule ehlala emjondolo kwa-J eMlaza, uthi ulwazi kahle usizi lokukhula ehlala endlini eyodwa nomdeni wakhe njengoba ekhule belala ndawonye nabafowabo ababili, udadewabo nabazali bakhe. UJwara ubhale incwadi esihloko sithi: From Hell To Heaven, athi uhlose ngayo ukunikeza ithemba kulabo ababona sengathi impilo iyaphela ngenxa yobunzima abahlangabezana nabo.
label: society

data:
UMNDENI kasomatekisi waseMbulwana, eGreytown, usola amaphoyisa ngokushona kwelungu lawo, okuthiwa lipitshizwe imoto yamaphoyisa lashona, liyokhomba lapho lifihle khona isibhamu.
Umndeni kaMnuz Mdumiseni Mkhize (32) onamatekisi asuka eMbulwane aye eGreytown, usola ukuthi umufi ushone efakwe ishubhu, amaphoyisa afihla ukuthi useshonile amathatha ngeveni athi ubulawe yingozi yemoto.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IZICATHULO, imifaniswano yesikole nezikhwama zesikole zisale zigcwele igazi ngaphansi kwetekisi ekushone kuyo abafundi abane abebelibangise esikoleni, izolo. Kube muncu izolo, okuwusuku obekulindeleke ukuthi lulethe injabulo kubafundi abaningi ababuyele esikoleni ngenxa yengozi yetekisi nebhasi eyenzeke emgwaqweni Ingcebo Drive eNtuzuma.
Kuqhume isililo kubazali, amalungu omphakathi nakuNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube ngesikhathi bebona indawo yesehlakalo. Endaweni yesigameko Isolezwe lifice itekisi elithwala abantu abangu-16 seliphenduke iqashana ngenxa yokuhlephuka kwalo. Emgwaqweni bekugcwele izinsimbi zemoto. Ibhasi likamasipala elishayisane netekisi belimi buqamama netekisi, lilimele kancane ngaphambili.

data:
USEPHUTHWE ukuqala enyuvesi nonyaka umfundi waseLovu onenkinga kamazisi kusukela ngonyaka odlule.
UNosipho Mhlongo (18), obefunda uGrade 12 eSiyabonga Secondary School, bekumele enze unyaka wakhe wokuqala eDurban University of Technology (DUT) kodwa impilo imile emuva kokuba ingalungiseki ekamazisi. Elandisa Isolezwe uNosipho, uthe ubenaso isitifiketi sokuzalwa esinenombolo kamazisi kodwa inkinga yaqala sekumele ashaye umazisi.

data:
KUTHUNGATHWA isosha elineminyaka engu-26 ngecala lokuvulela ngenhlamvu libulale udadewabo wentombi, kwalimala nabanye abathathu okubalwa nephoyisa.
Isosha okuvela ukuthi lisuke ngemoto yalo e-Upington, eNorthern Cape, lafika kubo kwentombi eBuhleni eNanda, lafuna intombi okuthiwa ingunina wengane yalo enezinyanga ezimbili. Kuthe uma lingayitholi lavulela ngenhlamvu kwalimala odadewabo bentombi ababili.

data:
KUNXUSWA abantu ukuthi babophe izifociya ikakhulukazi labo abasebenzayo kodwa bengenzi imali etheni njengoba kulindelwe ukuthi inyuke intela abayikhokhayo.
Ngokusho kukaMnuz Dawie Roodt oyisazi somnotho esizimele, abantu bekufanele bayilalele kahle inkulumo kaMengameli Jacob Zuma ngoba beyindlalela okuzoshiwo nguNgqongqoshe weziMali, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan ozokwethula isabelomali maphakathi nenyanga.

data:
UMKHULU oneminyaka engu-69 ugwetshwe yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaDukuza iminyaka engu-45 ngamacala okudlwengula abazukulu.
Lo mkhulu waseGlendale, KwaDukuza, igama lakhe okungavumelekile livezwe ngenxa yokuhlobana nezisulu, ngecala lokudlwengula abazukulu bakhe ababili abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-9 no 11, okwenzeka ngo-2014. Kuthiwa ubejwayele ukubabiza abazukulu ngesikhathi onina besemsebenzini bese ebanukubeza. Kuthiwa lokhu ukwenze izikhashana ephindelela kwaze kwaba ubanjwa umakhelwane othathe udaba walubika konina bezingane.

data:
UKHALA ngonya lomnikazi wesikhungo sekhaya labadala laKwaMashu umndeni wesalukazi esithathwe kulesi sikhungo isidumbu saso sesonakele ngemuva kokuthi benqwahe naso ngoba kuthiwa ukweleta imali yamanabukeni.
UNkk Eunice Makhathini (81) waKwaMashu kwa-J, obehlala esikhungweni sekhaya labadala iThembeni Old Age Home khona KwaMashu, kuthiwa umndeni wakhe uthole ucingo ngokushona kwakhe ngoLwesithathu ekuseni luvela kumphathi wesikhungo.

data:
UMNDENI wowesifazane owasikwa amabele, ikhwapha nezinye izicubu zomzimba eSweetwaters, eMgungundlovu, ukhala ngophenyo lwamaphoyisa njengoba kungakaze kuboshwe muntu ngecala.
Umndeni uthi bahlukumezeka ngokugqunywa kwamanye amalungu omndeni esiteshini samaphoyisa kubhalwa nezitatimende kodwa kungaboshwa muntu. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi amanye amalungu omndeni abesesatshiswa ngamalungu omphakathi ngemuva kwesehlakalo sokubulawa kukaNksz Zodwa Madlala (34) esenzeka ngoJanuwari 15. UNksz Madlala watholwa ecwiyiwe ngaphandle kwakubo.

data:
KUTHIWA bayanda abesifazane bakuleli abavuma ukuya ocansini ngosuku lokuqala behlangene nabesilisa abasanda kuthandana nabo. Lokhu kuvezwe wumbiko wocwaningo olwenziwe yi-website yabajolayo, iVictoria Milan. Ucwaningo lwenziwe kwabesifazane bakuleli abangu- 5 650 abangu-71% wabo bavuma ukuthi abalilindi ibhadi kodwa balala zisuka nje. Yize bengazibekanga izizathu kodwa bathe akuselona ihlazo ukuvuka emashidini ngosuku lokuqala nendoda.
 Abangu-56% bathe bathatha isinqumo sebevele bezikhiphile nendoda ukuthi bazovuma ukulala. Izindawo okujwayeleke ukuthi balale kuzo yisehhotela nasendlini yendoda.

data:

data:
ININGI labantu besifazane baseNingizimu Afrika bazithola besengozini yokushona, bezama ukuthola usizo ezikhungweni ezihushula izisu ngokungemthetho ngenxa yezingqinamba ezibavimbela ukuthi bathole usizo kulezo ezisemthethweni.
Umbiko ophume ekuqaleni kwenyanga ukubeka ngokusobala ukuthi ukuba khona kwezikhungo ezihushula izisu ngokusemthethweni kuleli akwenele ukusombulula inkinga yokushona kwabantu besifazane ngenxa yokusebenzisa izikhungo ezingekho emthethweni. Lezi zikhungo kufanele zivezwe ukuze abantu besifazane bazazi.

UKhongolose eKZN uthe lo mbono uzowuveza engqungqutheleni yeqembu kazwelonke yokuxoxa ngemigomo ezoba ngoJuni. Umfelandawonye wezinyunyana iCosatu uwunanele lo mbono wathi uzosilekelela lesi sifundazwe engqungqutheleni ekuzwakaliseni lo mbono.

Umndeni kasomabhizinisi wakwaNzimande eWatersmeet, ngaseLadysmith, usashaqekile ngemuva kokuthi evulele ngenhlamvu ebhekise emadodaneni akhe amathathu ngenxa yokuthi alande ugandaganda wakhe kamakhelwane lapho okuthiwa wayewushiye khona ngaphambi kokuba anyamalale.

data:
UNakanjani Sibiya ungomunye wababhali besiZulu baseNingizimu Afrika abavelele nasebekhiqize kakhulu. Usezuze indathane yemiklomelo futhi usebhale yedwa, wabhala nabanye futhi wahlela imibhalo engaphezu kwamashumi amahlanu eminxeni enhlobonhlobo
Ziningi izizathu okuye kuthiwe yizona eziyimbangela yokuba abantu bakithi bakwenqene kangaka ukufunda. Iningi lalezo zizathu liyizaba nje ezingathi shu futhi esingeke sagxila kuzo ngoba ziwumshonisalanga. Okugcina sekugqama nokho ngukuthi indaba yokungakuthandisisi ukufunda igcina isiyinkombankombane. Bonke abathintekayo kule ndaba bayazihlangula bethi kalingethweswa bona kuphela icala lokungachumi kwesiko lokufunda. Kuqala bona nje abantu okufanele ngabe bayafunda; babalise ngokuthi bazofundani kungekho abazokufunda; bakhale ngokuthi okuningi kokufunda kubhalwe ngesiNgisi abangasiqondi kuyaphi. Labo okufanele bakhiqize okokufunda bazihlangula ngokuthi kuyizindleko ezingenasidingo ukushicilela izincwadi ezingezukufundwa muntu.

data:
NGOLWESITHATHU uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali kuleli, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, wethule isabelo sezimali sika-2017/18. Ngaso (isabelo sezimali) ukwazile ukukhombisa ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika inawo amasu okulungisa okonakele uma kugxilwa ezinhlelweni ezibekiwe nezizobhekana nezinselelo ezibhekene nabantu bakuleli, kuloba uTANDISIZWE MAHLUTSHANA.
Yize izimemezelo eziningi kulesi sisabelo sezimali zizofaka itwetwe kwabaningi, iningi labantu baseNingizimu Afrika yilo elihlomule kakhulu ngaso.

data:
KWESINYE isikhathi kunzima ukuba ngumthengi ongasazi isiNgisi eNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu ngikusho ngoba ngike ngabhala udaba uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa ekhala ngokuthi bayingcosana abathengi baKwaZulu-Natal abazifaka izikhalo kwi-National Consumer Comission, okuyinhlangano exazulula izinkinga zabathengi nakwi-National Consumer Tribunal okuyiyona ekhipha isinqumo esingumnqamulajuqu uma abathengi sebehambe yonke iminyango bengasizakali.
USolwazi Dumisa osebenza kwiNational Consumer Tribunal, uveze ukuthi izikhalo eziningi bazithola eWestern Cape, kulandele iGauteng bese kuba yiKZN nakwezinye izifundazwe.

data:
OKWENZEKE eLoftus Stadium ngoMgqibelo bekungamele kwenzeke. Kuyihlazo. Kushiye umthandi webhola ethuthumela engazazi noma kusamele na abeke umcondo wakhe enkundleni. Kuphelile ukuthi bekudlalwa laphaya, uma ubuka izithombe ezikhombisa okwenzekile ubungafunga ukuthi bekusempini.
Uma uthatha leziya zithombe uzikhombisa umuntu ofisa ukumvakashisa kulezi zinkundla zebhola, ucabanga ukuthi angeza egijima kuzo? Awucabange nje ukuthi izingane, abaphila nokukhubazeka nabesifazane bangazivikela kanjani kuloluya dlame esilubone kuleya nkundla.

data:
UGWETSHWE iminyaka engu-25 owesilisa waseMpangeni ngokudlwengula owayeyintombi yakhe.
Lo wesilisa oneminyaka engu-39 ugwetshwe eNkantolo yeMantshi eMpangeni ngoMsombuluko. Ugwetshwe nezinyanga ezingu-18 ngecala lokuhlukumeza yona intombi ngonyaka odlule. Inkantolo ithole ukuthi ngoMashi 20 wonyaka odlule, owesifazane oneminyaka engu-31 washayelwa ucingo ngowayeyisoka lakhe embizela ngaphandle kwakubo. Umdlwenguli wayekweleta lo wesifazane imali, wathi umbizela ukumnika yona.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IPHUNYUKE kunoxhaka iMeya kaMasipala waseNdumeni uMnuz Sboniso Mbatha ngemuva kokuhluleka kwemizamo ye-ANC yokuyiketula esikhundleni ngoLwesihlanu.
I-ANC ifake isiphakamiso sokungabethembi ubuholi bukaMbatha ngoba imsola ngokukhwabanisa nenkohlakalo. Kusolwa ukuthi ubefuna ukukhokhelwa wumkhandlu imali yokuthi uhamba ngemoto enkulu kodwa ebe ehamba ngemoto encane uma ehamba ngomsebenzi kamasipala ngesikhathi engakabi imeya.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma nguyena oziqhatha nokugxekwa ngesenzo sakhe sokuhlasela omakadebona be-ANC ngesikhathi evula ingqungquthela yemigomo yeqembu eNasrec, eGoli.
Lona ngumbono womhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, ngemuva kokuthi abaholi abathathu be-ANC - uMnuz Enoch Godongwana, oyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu, uSotshwebhu we-ANC ePhalamende, uMnuz Jackson Mthembu noSihlalo kaKhongolose eGoli, uMnuz Paul Mashatile - bephumele obala bahlasela uZuma. Bakwenze lokhu ngemuva kokuthi umengameli egxeke omakadebona.
label: politics

data:
ABAZALI babafundi basesikoleni samabanga aphansi iVryheid Primary bafuna aphume aphele uthisha osolwa ngokuhlukumeza izingane azifundisayo ngocansi. Usihlalo wesigungu esilawula lesi sikole uMnuz Sakhi Siyaya uthe abamfuni nalapho ehambe khona lo thisha eligodliwe igama lakhe. 
Uthe lo thisha usolwa ngokuphathaphatha umfundi wesifazane ka-grade 3 ezithweni zangasese.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMPHAKATHI waseMakhehleni eMalukazi, okuyindawo eyakhelene noMlaza, uthukuthele uyaveva ngemuva kokuthola ukuthi kunowesifazane wasendaweni obezitika ngocansi nezingane zabafana ezingu-13, ezineminyaka ephakathi kuka-5 kuya kuya ku-14.
Ingxenye yalo mphakathi beyithutheleke eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, izophikisa ukunikezwa kwebheyili umsolwa (23) eligodliwe igama lakhe ngenxa yokuthi kunezingane zakhe ezincane ezithintekayo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUBOSHWE abane ngokubulawa kowesifazane oneminyaka engu-67 obethunjwe ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.
Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbhele uthe amaphoyisa akwaNdengezi nawophiko lweK9 abophe abasolwa KwaNdengezi. Lo wesifazane kuthiwa kwabika indodakazi yakhe ngokulahleka kwakhe esiteshini eBhekithemba. Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luwaholele kule ndawo emuva kokuthi kubonwe imoto yakhe inamadoda amane ngaphakathi. Amaphoyisa kuthiwa ajahe imoto, yagingqika, abasolwa baboshwa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma izolo uzichithile iziphakamiso ezithi akaxoshwe uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kuleli uNksz Bathabile Dlamini ngenxa yokuqubuka kwesixakaxaka mayelana nodaba lwezibonelelo zikahulumeni nempesheni yabadala.
Engxoxweni nomsakazo, uZuma uthe uNksz Dlamini angehlulelwa ngemuva kuka-Ephreli 1, okuwusuku okubhekwe ngabomvu ukuthi bazozithola yini izibonelelo zikahulumeni abantu bakuleli abangu-17 million.
label: politics

data:

Umphakathi waselokishini eNhlalakahle, eGreytown, uthe uyoyixoxela amagwababa echobana indaba yomfundi wesifazane (21) esiligodlile igama lakhe ocuphe isikhaftini sakhe ngoshevu ebesinamakhekhe nejusi kwashona uSiboniso ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œMaguzuÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â Majola (18).

data:
ABESIFAZANE abahlukunyezwa ngabathandana nabo mabahlukane nokufela ngaphakathi okwebutho likaZulu, baphumele obala bebike ngezinkinga ukuze balulekwe. Lowo kube ngumyalezo wosuku ngesikhathi kwethulwa uhlaka lokusiza abesifazane ekulweni nokuhlukunyezwa kwabo olubizwa nge-Intimate Femicide.
Lo mcimbi obuhlelwe wumnyango wezoBulungiswa kuzwelonke, ubuseProtea Hotel eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu. Abesifazane abayizisulu zokuhlukunyezwa bathole ithuba lokuxoxa ngezinkinga zabo nokwabelana ngezeluleleko.
label: society

data:
KUSABATSHAZWA isihluku kowesilisa waseHammarsdale okuthiwa ubulale owesifazane (30) ongumakhelwane wamxhonxa amanxeba alinganiselwa kwawu-13 wase ezama ukumshisa ngoba ethi ubona isilwane.
Kuthiwa lo mlisa wase-4 eHammarsdale ugwaze uNksz Naniza Nzama ongumakhelwane wakhe waze wamxhifiza ekhanda waphuma ubuchopho ngoba emsola ngokuthi uyisilwane ngoLwesine ebusuku. Kuthiwa isidumbu sakhe sitholakale sinendlebe eyodwa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUYAWUHLUKUMEZA umndeni wakwaMzila kwa-G, eMlaza, ukuthi insizwa encane (25) inesibindi sokubulala amalungu amane omndeni engamsukelanga.
UMnuz Nathi Mzila ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokuvela kukaMnuz Sanele Makhanya enkantolo yemantshi eMlaza ngamacala ayisishiyagalolunye, okungamane okubulala amalungu omndeni wakwaMzila, amabili okuzama ukubulala, elilodwa lokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nelokutholakala nezinhlamvu zesibhamu esingekho emthethweni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IPHINI likaMengameli waseNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, liqinise abantu abawu-17 million abathola izibonelelo zikahulumeni idolo, lithi ngeke kwenzeke ukuthi bangazitholi izibonelelo zabo okungacaci ukuthi zizokhokhwa ngubani ngo-Ephreli.
URamaphosa ubephendula umbuzo welungu le-IFP, uNksz Liezl van der Merwe, obebuza ukuthi ngabe ngubani ozoholela abantu izibonenelo zabo ngo-Ephreli emuva kokuthi i-South African Social Security Agency (Sassa) isihoxisile isicelo sayo sokuthi kwelulwe inkontileka ye-Cash Paymaster Services (CPS) ukuthi iqhubeke nokuholela abantu izibonelelo.
label: society

data:
UMNYANGO wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal usubamangalele abantu abakhubazekile abahlala esikhungweni, Enduduzweni Skills Centre abashaya phansi ngonyawo bethi ngeke baphume kule ndawo ngoba ifana nekhaya kubona.
UNkk Ncumisa Fandesi okhulumela umnyango utshele Isolezwe ukuthi baluyise enkantolo udaba ukuze kugcinwe umthetho. "Umnyango usuthathe isinqumo sokuthi lolu daba luxazululwe yinkantolo ngoba sizamile ukuxoxa nabo abantu izikhathi eziningi kwangalunga," kusho uNkk Fandesi.
label: society

data:
BUCHITHEKE bugayiwe emndenini waseBuxedeni KwaNongoma ngesikhathi amalungu enhlangano elwa nokwebiwa kwemfuyo iSikebhe egasela ezolanda izinkomo ezinhlanu obekusanda kulotsholwa ngazo indodakazi yawo.
Kuthiwa abeSikebhe bafike kulo muzi ngempelasonto edlule behamba nomnikazi wezinkomo uMnuz Patrick Zikhali (40) waseNkodibe eMtubatuba obesekuphele amasonto amathathu ethungatha izinkomo zakhe eziwu-13 ezebiwa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
LITHOLE ibheyili ka-R1000 iphoyisa loPhiko lwezobuNhloli eliboshwe nomfowabo omncane nosibali wabo ngecala lokwakha itulo lokusoconga umfowabo wenkosi yesizwe saKwaMpukunyoni, eMtubatuba.
Izolo umshushisi uMnuz Linda Duma utshele inkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaMsane ukuthi maningi amahlebezi ngaleli cala kodwa inhloso yenkantolo wukuveza ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda ngezinsolo ezisuke zishiwo, hhayi ukunqumela abantu ogodweni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
USINDE edutshulwa ngentululwane yezinhlamvu umholi wenhlangano elwela uzinzo emahostela, Ubunye Bamahostela, ohlala ehostela laseMlaza iGlebelands.
UMnuz Vusi Zweni onguSihlalo woBunye Bamahostela uthe usola udlame oseludlule nenqwaba yemiphefumulo ngokuhlaselwa kwakhe eSiphingo ngoMsombuluko ntambama. NgoLwesibili kubulawe owesilisa (22) igama lakhe elingakaziwa ngesikhathi kuhlaselwa isitezi sakwa-S ehostela.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
USATHUTHUMELA umzimba umculi wokholo osinde ngokulambisa bezama ukumduna imoto. UFikile Mlomo uthe uyokhohlwa efile ngesigameko esenzeke ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule ebusuku, njengoba esinde ngokulambisa ezigebengwini ebezithi ziyaqeda ngaye ngesikhathi zifuna ngodli imoto yakhe.
UFikile uchaza lesi sigameko esenzeke ebusuku njengesimfikisela ngomchamo oshisayo uma kufanele adlule ngasendaweni yesigameko.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
USIHLALO we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala uxwayisa ngokuthi kunempi yezomnotho ebhekiswe kwi-ANC nohulumeni wayo ngenhloso yokuqumba phansi umbuso wabantu.
Ekhuluma ngesikhathi evala ingqungquthela yemigomo ye-ANC esifundazweni eBhekuzulu Hall oNgoye izolo, uZikalala uthe bayaqonda ukuthi kunempi yezomnotho ebhekiswe kwi-ANC nokuholele ekutheni kwehliswe umnotho wakuleli ufakwe esigabeni samazwe angenzi kahle kwezomnotho.

data:
SEKUQALWE uphenyo ngezithombe ezisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhuma eziveza iziboshwa zipotozwa abantu besifazane. UMnyango wezokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo eGauteng uthi izikhulu ezingu-13 zizocelwa ukuthi zichaze ngokwenzeka ejele iJohannesburg Medium B.
Lokhu kumenyezelwe ngomsobuluko esithangamini nabezindaba eGoli lapho obambe isikhundla sokuba ukhomishina womnyango, uMnuz James Smalberger, egxeke khona lesi sigameko wabe esexolisa kubantu bakuleli.Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â

data:
UMENGAMELI uJacob Zuma ushiye angalazi egigiyela umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema embiza ngohlanya. Yize uZuma engazange amgagule ngegama uMalema kodwa inkulumo yakhe ibugudla iguma ikhombisa ukuthi ibheke kuyena.
Ekhuluma engqungqutheleni yemigomo ye-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, eBhekuzulu Hall oNgoye, uZuma uthe uwuhlanya lolu oluphatha umentshisi luze lufune ukushisa indlu nalo luphakathi.

data:
ILOKISHI elikhulu kunawo wonke eThekwini, uMlaza, ngenye yezindawo ezimbalwa okuthiwa izidakamizwa zidlangile kuzo.
Lokhu kuvezwe uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Weziwe Thusi, ngesikhathi evula ingqungquthela yokulwa nezidakamizwa ephothulwe izolo, eThekwini. Bekuyingqungquthela yokuqala yalolu hlobo evulwe ngoMsombuluko okuqondane nokugujwa kwe-International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Drug Trafficking.
label: society

data: IVULELWE icala lokushaya inyanga yodumo yaseThekwini uZamokwakhe Nzama odume ngelikaKing Bhaka. Le nyanga isolwa ngokushaya umuntu ePinetown ngoLwesihlanu ntambama ihamba nabaqaphi bayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Thulani Zwane ukuqinisekisile ukuthi livuliwe icala lokushaya nokukhomba ngesibhamu."Singakuqinisekisa ukuthi livuliwe leli cala esiteshini sasePinetown kodwa akukaboshwa muntu, amaphoyisa asaqhubeka nophenyo lwawo," kusho uZwane.Ethintwa uBhaka uphike walala ngomhlane wathi akakaze axabane namuntu yena. Uthe akalazi icala avulelwe lona."Ayikho yonke leyo nto ngimatasa nomsebenzi wami wokusiza abantu futhi sengisebenzela emahholo manje. Anginaso isikhathi sokuxabana nabantu, sengiyakholwa mina," kusho uBhaka ngokukhululeka.UMnuz Bheki Hlongwane (32) okunguyena ovulele uBhaka icala, uthi ubhonywe kabuhlungu wuyena phambi kwabangani bakhe wamehlisa isithunzi. Uqhube wathi akenzanga lutho kuBhaka, ufike behleli beziphuzela waxhuma umsakazo wakhe awusebenzisa uma encenga amakhasimende. UHlongwane uthe emva kokuxhuma umsakazo uBhaka ube esebathuka ethi abangaphuzi utshwala uma kukhona yena."Asizange simphendule, sizithulelile saqhubeka nokuhlala. Ngesikhathi esehamba, ngivalelisile kuyena kwaba ngizithintele, wahosha isibhamu waqala wangishaya ngequpha," kusho uHlongwane ezwakakala ukuthi uhlukumezekile.Uthe ushaywe ngisho nangabaqaphi njengoba egcine eshaywe wuBhaka ngesidunu sesibhamu, wawa phansi. Uthe emuva kwalokho uBhaka ucele ukumphuthumisa esibhedela, wathembisa ukukhokha zonke izindleko. UHlongwane uthe unqabile, wabiza amaphoyisa."Abantu abebebuka badiniwe ngesikhathi ngishaywa. Uzame ukubancenga ngokubapha imali banqaba bathi bafuna achazele amaphoyisa ukuthi umshayelani umuntu engenze lutho," kusho uHlongwaneUHlongwane ubonga amaphoyisa athi asheshe afika angenelela.Uthe ufuna ukubona kwenzeka ubulungiswa ngoba akayazi into ashayelwe yona.Uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuzithwala kukaBhaka nokuba luhlaza nokubukela abanye abantu phansi.UBhaka wake waba sematheni ngobudlelwano bakhe obabungacacile kahle noKelly Khumalo obeyisinqandamathe sikanozinti we-Orlando Pirates ongasekho uSenzo Meyiwa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
OBEYISIKHULU kwa-SABC, uMnuz Hlaudi Motsoeneng, ucele ukuthi kuthandazelwe uMvikeli woMphakathi, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane ngenkathi evakashele ibandla likaProphet Mboro namhlanje ekuseni. UMotsoeneng usanda kuxoshwa kwaSABC kulandela izinsolo zokuthi ungene isinyenyela esikhundleni sokuba yisikhulu esiphezulu. Ekhuluma kuleli bandla uMotsoeneng ucele ukuthi akhulekelwe u-Adv Mkhwebane ngoba uyakholelwa kuyena. Ngesonto eledlule uMkhwebane ubengaphansi kwengcindezi kulandela isithangami nabezindaba asisebenzisela ukucacisa ngezinto ezihlukene ihhovisi lakhe eliziphenyayo. Phakathi kwezinto aphawula kuzo uMkhwebane waphakamisa izincomo wathi iBhange loMbuso kumele liguqule ukusebenza kwalo, waphinde wathi ibhange u-Absa kumele likhokhe imali eyabolekwa uBankorp. UMkhwebane uthe u-Absa kumele ukhokhe u-R1.125 billion wemali eyabolekwa yileli bhange kusukela ngo-1985 kuya ku-1995 kwiBhange loMbuso. U-Absa ngeledlule uthe uzofaka lolu daba enkantolo kwazise uyazihlangula kulesi sikweletu. Ngakolunye uhlangothi iBhange loMbuso nalo lithi uMkhwebane akanawo amandla okulitshela ukuthi kumele lisebenze kanjani. 
Esontweni likaMboro uHlaudi uphinde waphawula ngodaba lokuvalwa komthetho awubeka wokuthi u-90% womculo odlalwa eziteshini ezingaphansi kukaSABC kube ngowakuleli. Amaciko akuleli athathe ukucishwa kwalo mthetho njengokuphucwa isinkwa kwazise asezophinde ancintisane nomculo wamaciko akwamazwe angaphandle. Khonamanjalo, uMotsoeneng kusalindeleke ukuthi avele phambi kwebhodi lakwaSABC ezochaza ngokudliwa kwezimali kulesi siteshi ngesikhathi esaphethe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SEKUNOVALO emphakathini waseShowe ngenxa yokwanda kwezigameko zokunyamalala kwezingane, ezinye ezitholakala sezibulewe.
Abantu bakule ndawo banengebhe nje, ngeSonto kunyamalale uSibongakonke Mpungose (10) obefunda uGrade 4 KwaMondli Primary, okusolwa ukuthi uthunjwe khona emphakathini. Isidumbu sikaSibongakonke waseKing Dinuzulu sitholwe izolo emfuleni ngemuva kokutholwa kwezingubo zakhe osebeni lomfula. Kuthiwa wanyamalala kade eyodlala ibhola nabangani enkundleni yezemidlalo eseduze kwasekhaya.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMHOLI we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, usabisa ngenyoka efile uma ethi inhlangano yakhe izophuma emshadweni wayo ne-DA uma engaxoshwa uNkk Helen Zille njengoNdunankulu waseWestern Cape.
Lona ngumbono womhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Protas Madlala, ngemuva kokuthi i-DA ingamxoshanga uNkk Zille kwesikaNdunankulu phezu kwesililo emphakathini mayelana nombhalo wakhe ku-twitter lapho athi khona kukhona okuhle okwenziwa ngamakoloni.
label: politics

data:
UNGQONGQOSHE wezeziMali uMalusi Gigaba usenxuse osomabhizinisi abasebenzela emalokishini ukuba bagxile ekukhuleni emiphakathini yabo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abahlala kuleyo ndawo bayahlomula oguqukweni kwezomnotho eNingizimu Afrika.
UGigaba obekhuluma embukisweni wezamabhizinisi odonse izinsuku ezintathu eMlazi, eThekwini ngempelasonto edlule, uthe kubalulekile ukukhula komnotho ezweni ukuze lizothuthuka. Kodwa okubaluleke kakhulu wukuqinisekisa impilo engcono ebantwini abahlala emalokishini namathuba angcono kwezamabhizinisi.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
USATHUTHUMELA unina wengane (2) yasemijondolo yaseSukamuva, eChatsworth, ebanjwe wugesi wezinyokanyoka iphuma enkulisa iya esitolo yashona.
UNksz Palesa Mosia (26) uthe namanje akukamukeleki kuyena ukuthi indodana yakhe uTsepo ishonile. UTsepo ushone izolo ekuseni emuva kwehora lesikhombisa enyathela intambo kagesi wezinyokanyoka obuxhunywe amalungu omphakathi angomakhelwane benkulisa afunda kuyo.

data:
ISENKINGENI inyuvesi yaseZululand, oNgoye, ngokuthi ingase ilahlekelwe yilungelo lokufundisa iziqu zomthetho njengoba umbiko wesikhashana we-Council on Higher Education (CHE) uveza ukuthi ibalwa kumanyuvesi amathathu angase aphucwe leli lungelo.
Umbiko uthi amanyuvesi amathathu - eyaseLimpopo, Kapa ne-Unizulu - aseyalelwe ukuthi ahlangabezane nemibandela ye-CHE ngoMeyi wonyaka ozayo noma aphucwe ilungelo lokufundisa iziqu.

data:
BAZOWUDLELA esitokisini uKhisimusi abasolwa abathathu ababekwe icala lokubulala abafundi ababili baseClairwood Primary abangabangani, ngemuva kokuhlehliswa kwecala labo yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, izolo.
ONksz Amahle Maliwa (28) noLiziwe Ngwayitshe (32) noMnuz Ali Yusaf (46) bavele enkantolo izolo icala labo lahlehliselwa uJanuwari 26 ngonyaka ozayo ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUSAMILE ukufunda ekolishi eliqeqesha ngamakhono eGroutville emuva kokuba sekuphele izinsuku izitshudeni zilala emakilasini ngoba zingakhokhelwe imali yokuqasha izindawo zokuhlala. Izitshudeni zize zakhishwa ngamaphoyisa ekolishi ngoLwesihlanu.
Izitshudeni zaseMfolozi TVET College zicasulwe wukuthi sezibekezele isikhathi eside zingayitholi imali yokukhokhela izindawo zokuhlala ekhishwa yisikhwama iNational Students Financial Aid Scheme (Nsfas). Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ngoMsombuluko odlule bafike emakilasini nezimpahla nezingubo zokulala ngoba abanye sebexoshiwe emiqashweni abebehlala kuyo ngenxa yokungakhokhi. Ukulala kwabo emakilasini kuphazamise nokufunda njengoba kuthiwa othisha bagcine bengasafiki yavalwa ikolishi.
label: education

data:
BAYAVEVA abenhlangano elwela abathandana nobulili obufanayo ngezinsolo zokuthi amaphoyisa ashaye abesilisa ababili, bavalelwa esiteshini ngoba becwaswa ngobulili.
UMnuz Vincent Nkosi (24) waseChesterville ongumfundi eRegent Business School eThekwini, uthi usahlukumezekile ngenxa yalesi sigameko esenzeke ngoLwesine olwedlule ngasebhishi eThekwini. Wayehamba nomngani wakhe wasePitoli uKgotatso obevakashile ngamaholidi eThekwini. Elandisa ngokwenzeka, uNkosi uthe babezihambela ngasebhishi ngesikhathi kuqhamuka amadoda amabili eza kubona sekukhona akukhipha emaphaketheni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
USASHAQEKILE umndeni womfundi (17) waseNtshisekelo High, eNanda okuthiwa ugwazwe, wabulawa omunye umfundi ngoLwesibili eya esikoleni emuva kokuthi kubangwe iphepha elalibhalwe abangawenzile umsebenzi wesikole.
Kusenzima emndenini kaSikhumbuzo Gumede waseWolawola eMatikwe obenza uGrade 10 eNtshisekelo High, eNanda ukwamukela ukuthi akasekho emhlabeni. Kuthiwa ugwazwe eduze kwasesikoleni wawela ngaphandle kwesango lesikole, washonela emtholampilo.

data:
UTHUKUTHELE uyaveva unontandakubukwa weTheku, uTha Simelane ngoR250 000, athe wawuboleka usomabhizinisi uMnuz Sizwe Sifunda ongumyeni wesinye sezikhulu zoKhozi FM njengoba engasafuni ukuwukhokha.
Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngeSonto, uTha waboleka uSifunda le mali eminyakeni emibili edlule ngethemba lokuthi uzosheshe ayibuyise. USifunda kuthiwa wayethole umsebenzi ayenethemba lokuthi uzomkhokhela imali enkulu kodwa izinto zangahamba ngendlela.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
UHLELI lubhojozi umphakathi waseNgodini, eDududu, ngenxa yezingulube zehlathi okuthiwa ziyacanasa kule ndawo ziqeda ukudla emasimini zibhincisele nxanye nabantu bale ndawo. 
Leli phephandaba linikele kule ndawo ngenhloso yokuzwa usizi lwabantu bakhona asebehlala ngokwethuka izanya ngenxa yalezi zilwane eziyingozi. Izakhamizi zale ndawo zithi azisakwazi ukudla okulinywa emakhaya njengoba lezi zingulube zishaya ziqothule emasimini. Kuthiwa ziphuma zibe wumhlambi ebusuku ikakhulukazi uma imvula ina zicanase naphakathi kwezindlu zifuna ukudla.
label: society

data:
ODLALELA abaculi abadumile bokholo base-Eastern Cape i-keyboard, okubalwa kubo uBetusile Mcinga noDumi Mkokstad, kusolakala ukuthi uzifake obishini ngokulimaza kabuhlungu obeyintombi yakhe.
UNksz Phakamile Mthalane (33) waseWembezi, e-Estcourt, ufuna lo saziwayo abhadle ejele ngokumsakaza ngezimpama, amklinye, amgingqe ngequpha, amgxobe futhi aze amgence ngembazo encane ngesikhathi emvakashele endlini aqashe kuyo eChris Hani Park, eMthatha, e-Eastern Cape, ngoMashi 4.

data:
USIHLALO weMKMVA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Themba Mavundla, unxuse uhulumeni aqinisekise ukuthi onke amasosha oMkhonto Wesizwe ahlanganiswe namasosha akuleli ukuze ahole nemindeni yawo idle.
UMavundla uphakamise lokhu emcimbini wokubuyiswa kwamathambo abanye ozakwabo ababengamalungu oMkhonto Wesizwe ngezikhathi zobandlululo obuseCity Hall, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo. Uthe kade kwasa bezicelela ukuba uhulumeni asukumele usizi lwamasosha okuthiwa awanakiwe kodwa ayelwela inkululeko yezwe. Uthe kufanele amasosha anakwe ngoba izwe lilapho likhona ngenxa yeqhaza alibamba emzabalazweni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
Sekujwayelekile ukuthi ngaso sonke isikhathi emuva kokubhala kule ngosi ngokusebenza nokwenziwa wumzimba uma kuyiwa ocansini, bese kuvela izicelo ezithi sikhulume sigcizelele umunxa othile. Kulokhu izicelo bezilokhu zilekanyana ezifisa sizimelele ontwentwesaneni oluyisicutshana esisekungeneni komgudu wesifazane. Lokhu bekuhambisana nesifiso sokuthi sikhulume nangokuya ocansini kusetshenziswa umgudu ongemuva. Nizongivumela ukuthi la mathafa womabili - untwentwesana esilubiza ngokuthi yiso nalolu hlobo lokuya ocansini - ngakunye yingosi ezimele. Iso liyatholakala ezilwaneni ezifana nezindlovu namahhashi. Ngiyafisa ukusho ukuthi umsebenzi wami njengodokotela kule ngosi, wukunikeza umumomzimba nokusebenza komzimba, hhayi ukunikeza umbono okanye umcabango othile othinta isiko, inkolo okanye umcabango othile ngengosi noma ngami nomndeni wami.
 Izibalo zithi sikhula ngesivinini isibalo sabantu abasha nasebekhulile abaya ocansini lomgudu ongemuva. Izizathu zalokhu ziningi, zihlanganisa:
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IZOZE ibe ngemuva kokhetho lonyaka ozayo ingqungquthela ye-ANC esifundeni iTheku obekulindeleke ukuthi ibe ngoDisemba kulo nyaka.
Esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini izolo, uNobhala omusha we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uthe yize isinqumo sobuholi obuphezulu kwi-ANC sithi zonke izingqungquthela zezifunda kumele zibe ngaphambi kokuthi kuphele * -Agasti kodwa eyaseThekwini izoze isingathwe ngonyaka ozayo.

data:
KUSUKE umsindo phakathi kwamakhansela e-ANC neDA emhlanganweni we-Exco eThekwini izolo mayelana nohambo lukaR2 million oluya emadolobheni amabili aseSouth America, lwezikhulu ophikweni lwezokuthutha kumasipala, osomatekisi nabanikazi bamabhasi.
Ithimba labantu abangu-54, elisuka eThekwini, lizoya eSao Paulo eBrazil naseBogota eColombia liyofunda kabanzi ngohlelo lokuphucula ezokuthutha olwaziwa ngeGo Durban. Usuku lohambo lusazohlelwa.

UNkk Thandiwe Ndlovu-Makhunga (46) namhlanje ubuyele enkantolo yesizwe ngemuva kokulahlwa yicala ngoJulayi 31, nonyaka, lapho anikwa khona umnqamulajuqu wezinsuku ezingu-14, ukuthi zingapheli angayikhiphile inhlawulo kodwa kuze kube yimanje akakahlawuli.

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uqoke uDkt Silas Ramaite ukuthi abambe esikhundleni sokuba nguMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi emuva kokuthi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo inqume ukuthi ukuqokwa kuka-Advocate Shaun Abrahams kwakungekho emthethweni.
UNkk Khusela Diko okhulumela ihhovisi likaRamaphosa uthe uMengameli uqoke uRamaite ukuthi abambe ngesikhathi esafunda ngokugcwele isinqumo senkantolo ebheka nomuntu ozongena esikhaleni sika-Abrahams.

KUSIZE abezimo eziphuthumayo ngesikhathi indoda yaseChina isenkingeni kubhajwe isandla sayo emshinini okuthengwa kuwona ngesikhathi izama ukukhipha ithoyizi locansi ebilikhokhele kulo mshini.
Lo mlisa uthi ufike wakhokha wabe eselinda ukuthi liphume ithoyizi lakhe kodwa lutho ukuphuma, wagcina efaka isandla sakhe emshinini ezama ukuliqhwanda. Kuvele ukuthi ubekhathazeke ngokuthi uma eshiya kanjalo kuzocwila nemali yakhe nempahla yakhe ibe ingaphumanga. Ube esenza umzamo wokuyikhipha.

Uma umlalela kahle uMalema uma ekhuluma usho into efana nse neshiwo abaholi basezwenikazi i-Afrika ababulala amazwe abo ekubeni babethenjiwe ukuthi bazokwenza into engcono.

IMBOKODO ebiyingxenye yemashi ebizwa nge#Totalshutdown izolo ithi ifuna kubuyekezwe izigwebo zabantu besifazane ababoshelwa ukubulala abantu ababethandana nabo ababebahlukumeza.
Laba besifazane abebemasha eThekwini, begqoke imifaniswano ebomvu neminyama, bebemasha nezinhlangano ezihlukene zabantu besifazane okubalwa kuzo i-Agenda Feminist Media, iKZN Network on Violence Against Women, bebezwakalisa ilaka labo ngezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane.

data:
LISHONE elayizolo isematheni indaba yokuzibulala kwesitshudeni ebesiyisishoshovu, okusolwa ukuthi sizibulele.
UKhensani Maseko (23), obeyisitshudeni emkhakheni wezomthetho eRhodes University, kusolwa ukuthi uzibulele ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokuphathwa ukhwantalala. Ngokwemiyalezo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kusolwa ukuthi uKhensani ubenokhwantalala ngenxa yokuthi wadlwengulwa yisoka lakhe elikuyona le nyuvesi. Abamaziyo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bathe bezivele zibonakala izimpawu zokuthi uzozibulala. Abaningi bakhale ngokuthi bekumele athole usizo ngoba bekukhombisa ukuthi unengcindezi.

data:
KUPHENYWA isihlabani somculi kamaskandi, uKhuzani Mpungose, ngokunyamalala kwenkosikazi yomuntu, uNkk Lungi MaBiyela Hadebe nezingane zakhe ezimbili, okungeyentombazane neyomfana. Lesi sigameko senzeke endaweni yaseNkonise, eNkandla, ngaphansi kwenkosi uMbhele ngoLwesine olwedlule.
Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uNkk Hadebe, obeyilungu leqembu lesigekle, unyamalale nezimpahla zokugqoka, isamba semali elinganiselwa kuR70 000. UKhuzani uvumile ukuthi usethintwe kaningi ngabaseshi, bemphenya ngalolu daba.

Izolo umphakathi ubumi izixongololo ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ephenya kwaDube eThornwood lapho kusolakala ukuthi indodana yakhona uMnuz Khulekani Dube (21) inqume unina, yagwaza unina wezingane zayo ezimbili, yagwaza indodana enezinyanga ezintathu, kwasinda ingane yentombazane eneminyaka emibili nayo yazigwaza yase izikhunga.

data:
USENGCUPHENI yokulahlekelwa isithabathaba somuzi umndeni waseSikhaleni, eMpangeni, osuthole ukuthi wadayiselwa ngokungemthetho isiza sawo.
Ukhala ezimathonsi uNkk Nqobile Mkhwanazi, osecabanga ukuvele awudilize umuzi awakha ngemali yesinxephezelo somyeni wakhe owalimala engozini yemoto. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi wathenga isiza ngo-2013 esasibiza uR120 000, wakha nomuzi. Uveze ukuthi walandela konke okwenziwa uma uthenga isiza, wathola nencwadi yetayitela. Ngo-2014 kwafika abazibize ngabanikazi balesi siza, abathe abakaze basidayise. UNkk Mkhwanazi uthe athenga kuyena isiza naye wayesidayiselwe ngomunye okusolakala ukuthi nguyena owakokotela omazisi babanikazi baso.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
LUGCINE lugobile uphondo eziphathimandleni zikaMasipala waKwaNongoma, KwaZulu-Natal, mayelana nokuhoxisa esikhundleni ikhansela obekuthiwa lihola imali yabakhokhibentela libe lidonsa iminyaka eyisithupha ejele ngecala lokweba imfuyo esifundazweni iMpumalanga.
IMeya yaKwaNongoma, uMnuz Albert Mncwango, ithe sebegcine bemsulile emabhukwini amakhansela omkhandlu wabo uZamani Sibiya ngoba icala ligcine limlahlile ngemuva kokulidlulisela phambili.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UKUBONA isasasa kubalandeli abathanda ukujima ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kwenze izintokazi zaseThekwini zavula inkampani ekhuthaza ukuzivocavoca.
UYolanda Sokhela oyiPersonal Trainer noSbahle Mpisane odume ngeleFitness Bunnie, sebesebenza ndawonye ukukhuthaza ukujima ngaphansi kwenkampani yabo, iDual Aerodance. Baqale ngo-Ephreli nonyaka umkhankaso wokuvakashela amalokishi, abakhuthaza kakhulu abesifazane ukuthi bazivocavoce. Echaza uYolanda uthe ubebona indlela abantu abaphawula ngayo ngomsebenzi wakhe noSbahle ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Uthe uhlabeke umxhwele nangendlela abantu basemalokishini asebekukhuthalele ngayo ukujima.

UMnuz Sthembiso Khumalo (27) obeshayela itekisi ebigcwele abasebenzi bakule mayini ufike kuyo ekuseni ngo-5.30 njengokujwayelekile. UNkk Sindi MaGumede Njakazi (48) uthe uphatheke kabi ngokubulawa kwendodakazi yakhe ngoba indlela ebulawe ngayo iyakhombisa ukuthi bekukhona okonakele othandweni lwayo.

data:
AMANYE amakhosi awafuni nakuyizwa indaba yeNgonyama Trust njengoba ethi afuna ukuziphathela wona umhlaba wawo, azilawulele nemali eyenziwa ngawo.
Inkosi Mzabane Makhoba yaseKokstad eNingizimu yeKwaZulu-Natal ithe yize yabekwa yiSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu futhi iyawuncoma umsebenzi owenziwa Ingonyama Trust evikela umhlaba wamakhosi ukuthi uthathwe wuhulumeni kodwa amakhosi kufanele aziphathele umhlaba wawo.

data:
MHLELI: Ake ngikhulume ngedolobha engihlala kulo uMgungundlovu. Leli dolobha lincane kodwa ngesikhathi salo belihlanzekile ngale ndlela ongayazi.
Angazi ukuthi imeya neziphathimandla zedolobha zihamba kuyiphi imigwaqo. Indawo obonayo ukuthi kuseyidolobha isemgwaqweni uVictoria nakoGreyling uma ubheka nakhona hhayi yonke indawo. Kukhona umgwaqo ongaka-Asmalls ohlezi unamanzi amnyama. Nomunye omncane owehlayo, wudoti woqobo-ke wona, mhlawumbe usungawubiza ngomgwaqo wamaphara. Naserenki yaseSweetwaters emathoyilethi laphaya kudliwa iwunga ungalimala uma ungangena unganakile.
label: society

data:
UMHOLI we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema uyihlabe wayihlikiza inkulumo kamengameli wase-United States, uMnuz Donald Trump, othe uzolufakela izibuko udaba lokudliwa komhlaba kuleli.
UMalema uphawule ngalolu daba esithangameni nabezindaba ngoLwesine lapho eveze khona ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isazobhekana nobunzima odabeni lomhlaba. Uthe inkulumo kaTrump ayimethusi nakancane ngoba ubeyilindele kumuntu ofana naye.
label: politics

data:
UNQGONGQOSHE wezeMfundo ePhakeme kuleli bekumele abeke umnqamulajuqu ocacisa ngokuthi isikhwama esiboleka izitshudeni imali yokufunda, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) kumele sithathe isikhathi esingakanani ukulungisa izinkinga eziholela ekutheni izicelo zezitshudeni zingaphothulwa.
Lokhu kushiwo yizitshudeni zezikhungo zezemfundo ephakeme KwaZulu-Natal, ngemuva kokuputshuka kwencwadi kaNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo kuleli uNkk Naledi Pandor, abeyibhalele usihlalo webhodi lwakwaNSFAS, uMnuz Sizwe Nxasana.
label: politics

data:
CISHE yisifiso sabesifazane abaningi ukubona indoda ihlaba phansi ngedolo icela umshado. Yize lokhu bekujwayeleke emidlalweni yethelevishini, bayanda abamnyama abakholelwa ekuthembisaneni umshado esidlangalaleni. Isikhathi esiningi owesifazane usuke engazi nhlobo ukuthi uzocelwa umshado. Lokhu kujwayeleke ukwenzeka ezindaweni zomphakathi, kuhlelwe owesifazane engazi.
Ngesonto eledlule uMnuz Scelo Shelembe waseClermont umangaze isithandwa sakhe uNksz Thobile Ntombela esicela umshado endaweni yobumnandi iViews At Twenty5 eThekwini. Bekugujwa unyaka kwavulwa le ndawo yobumnandi. UShelembe osethandane iminyaka emithathu noNksz Ntombela, uthe usezinhlelweni zokuthi bashade. Uveze ukuthi ubone kungcono amthembise umshado kule ndawo ngoba bayithanda kakhulu.
label: society

data:
MHLELI: Ngibeka umbono ngodaba lokuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo. Umvusi wenyamazane akuvamisile ukuthi kube wuye oyishayayo ngoba iye ithi uma ivuka iqala ukubaleka ibaleke iye le kanti iyoziphonsa kwabanye abantu.
Ngalo mzekelo ngiqonde ukuthi umvusi wenyamazane ewudaba lokuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo nguJulius Malema neqembu lakhe le-EFF kodwa le nyamazane sibona isitshathwe yi-ANC.

data:
USASHAQEKILE umphakathi waseLovu emuva kokuboshwa komthandazi ophinde abe yinyanga (42) osolwa ngokudlwengula indodakazi yakhe (19) nokusolakala ukuthi uyikhulelisile.
Lo mlisa obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNsimbini izolo kuthiwa uboshwe ngeSonto ebusuku emuva kokuthi evulelwe icala yindodakazi yakhe okuthiwa ubeyidlwengula ephindelela. Indodakazi yakhe eyenza uGrade 11 kukholakala ukuthi seyinezinyanga ezintathu ikhulelwe, akukaziwa ukuthi ubani oyikhulelisile phakathi kwakhe nesoka layo abeyiphoqa ukuthi iyolala nalo njalo uma eseyidlwengulile.

data:
INYUKE ngokusemthethweni imali yokugibela amatekisi izolo emuva kokuthi iSouth African National Taxi Council (Santaco) imemezele ngokusemthethweni ukuthi izindleko zokusebenza nokukhuphuka umlibe kukaphethroli, kuphoqe abanikazi bamatekisi ukuthi bayinyuse.
UMengameli weSantaco uMnuz Phillip Taaibosch, uthe amatekisi azonyuka ngoR1 emabangeni aseduze bese kuthi lawo ahambela ezindaweni ezikude anyuke ngoR10 noR20.

data:
UHLA LELWE wumsebenzi onzima uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa njengoba yonke iminyakazo yakhe yokuqoka uMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi izoqashwa ngeso lokhozi.
Izazi zomthetho zisho lokhu emuva kokuthi iJaji Mbuyiseli Madlanga linqume ukuthi ukuqokwa kuka-Adv Shaun Abrahams akukho emthethweni ngoba wangena esikhundleni sika-Adv Mxolisi Oliver Nxasana owaxoshwa ngaphandle kokulandela uMthethosisekelo.

data:
ABAHLAZIYI bepolitiki bathi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uzama ukugaya amavoti njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lwangonyaka ozayo, ngokusheshisa udaba lokuguqula isigatshana u25 soMthethosisekelo othinta udaba lo mhlaba.
NgoLwesibili ebusuku uRamaphosa uvele kuSABC ememezela ukuthi i-ANC izovotela ukuthi kuchitshiyelwe lesi sigaba 25 soMthethosisekelo ukuze ithathe umhlaba wabantu abazimele ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo iwunike abawuswele.

data:
KUBULAWE umfowabo wombhali wengosi yocansi kwiSolezwe ngoMgqibelo, odutshulwe abantu abangaziwa washona nesihlobo sakhe entathakusa izolo eSigqumeni, KwaSwayimane.
UMnuz Gceno Gumede (41) noMnuz Thobani Gumede (25), bahlaselwe abantu bavulela ngenhlamvu behamba nabafana bendawo ngemoto ngezithuba zabo-3 ekuseni izolo. Kuthiwa bebeyovula amamitha amanzi endaweni. Kulesi sigameko kuthiwa kulimale kanzima abanye abathathu abanye bathola imihuzuko.

data:
MHLELI: Njalo ngoJulayi singamadoda aziphatha kahle siyabikelwa ngoba amadoda agxekwa ngapha nangapha. Amadoda angabadlwenguli, amadoda awondli, amadoda ahlukumeza abesifazane, kuze kube nemashi emashela ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.
Mhleli kuliqiniso ukuthi kukhona amadoda ahlukumeza abesifazane nezingane. Kuliqiniso futhi ukuthi kukhona amadoda amahle akholwayo njengami nje. Kuliqiniso ukuthi bakhona nabesifazane abahlukumeza amadoda; isibonelo abesifazane abondlisa abesilisa izingane okungezona ezabo. Bakhona abesifazane abazala izingane bazilahle emgqonyeni kadoti. Bakhona abesifazane abathelela amadoda ngeHIV ngamabomu. Bakhona abesifazane ababhanqa amadoda bewakhwahle imali.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
OWAYEYIPHINI likaNgqongqoshe emnyangweni wezimali, uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas, noNksz Vytjie Mentor, owayeyilungu lePhalamende emele i-ANC, bangabokuqala abazothula ubufakazi kwikhomishini eholwa yijaji uRaymond Zondo ephenya ngezinsolo zokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.
Kulindeleke ukuthi bafakaze mayelana nezinsolo zokuthi umndeni wakwaGupta wawunezwi uma kuqokwa ongqongqoshe nabazophatha izinkampani zikahulumeni ngesikhathi uMnuz Jacob Zuma esengumengameli wezwe.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
LUBUKEKA lusazowudala umsindo udaba lokubuyiselwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo emuva kokuthi uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa egcizelele ukuthi uhulumeni akahlehli esinqumeni sakhe.
Udaba lokubuyiswa komhlaba luke lwadala imvunge emuva kombiko wethimba ebeliholwa nguMnuz Kgalema Motlanthe owabe engumengameli wezwe, elancoma ukuthi kubuyekezwe umthetho iNgonyama Trust eyengamele umhlaba KwaZulu-Natal. Lokhu kwabonakala kuwunyakazisa uZulu njengoba uNdunankulu kaZulu uMntwana Mangosuthu Buthelezi wabonakala ekhala izinyembezi esikhumbuzweni sempi yaseSandlwana ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka. Wayephawula ngalolu daba ethi ubona sengathi luzoqala utavatava azohamba emhlabeni alushiye neSilo uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMHOLI we-IFP, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, ukhwele wadilika kubaholi benhlangano yakhe abasola ngokukhwabanisa imali ecishe ibe ngaphezu kuka-R3 million yobulungu.
Ekhuluma enkundleni yezemidlalo kwa-C KwaMashu izolo, emcimbini wokwethula umkhankaso weqembu njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lukazwelonke ngonyaka ozayo, uButhelezi uchaze abaholi abebe le mali njengamasela wathi kumele bayibuyise.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UKUBOSHWA kukaMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu owayenguNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha KwaZulu-Natal, okube undabamlonyeni kuleli sonto kushiye abaningi bekhexile bezibuza imibuzo eminingi. 
UMabuyakhulu ungena kuleli hlazo nje ubesanda kuqokwa esikhundleni sokuba umgqugquzeli ohlakeni lwesikhashana lobuholi be-ANC esifundazweni. Ukuboshwa kwakhe kumayelana nomkhonyovu wemali enguR28 million okuthiwa yabhubhudlwa njengamanzi.
label: politics

data:
OWESIFAZANE wasesigodini eNdluzeleni emaChunwini, eMsinga, uthi uxoshiswe okwenja enethile emzini wakhe, ngesikhathi ezozila njengoba eshonelwe wumyeni.
UNkz Zandile Mchunu (42) oshadele kwaNgubane kodwa obiza isibongo sakubo, uthi uxoshwe ngesikhathi eyozilela umnyeni wakhe uMnuz Vusi Ngubane (44) oshone emuva kokuzidubula ngoMsumbuluko emzini wabo. Umkamufi uthi wahamba kwakhe ngoJanuwari nezingane zakhe ezimbili waya eGoli.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
AKUJWAYELEKILE ukuthi abantu abamnyama bakhombise ukuthandana ngisho sebeguga ngoba kwaziwa ukuthi ngabezinye izinhlanga abenza kanjalo.
Kuhlukile kuNkk Thandi Ngonelo (65) nomyeni wakhe uMfundisi Eddie Ngonelo (66), abangabeluleki kwezomshado abangofakazi bokuthi uthando alugugi. Bangabaholi be-Act of Obedience Ministries eThekwini kodwa bayaziwa nakwezinye izifundazwe ngomsebenzi wokweluleka.
label: society

data:
LISHONE elayizolo kuchwaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngemuva kokusabalala kwemibiko yokuthi usukhushulelwe ku-R1 million umehlokaboni womuntu ozosisa oKlebe ukuthi babophe izelamani zakwaGupta noMnuz Duduzane Zuma, oyindodana wowayengumengameli wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.
Isikhulu esiphezulu senkampani ezinze eKapa iSygnia Tech Solutions uMagda Wierzycka, ubhale ekhasini lakhe kuTwitter ukuthi uzimisele ukukhipha uR500 000 ngaphezu kwekhishwe inhlangano yezomthetho iForensics For Justice ukuze kubanjwe abakwaGupta,o-Ajay, Atul noTony Gupta noDuduzane.

data:
ZISABISA ngokuphinda zivale umgwaqo kusasa izitshudeni zase-University of South Africa (UNISA), eThekwini uma zingayitholi incazelo ecacile mayelana nokuxhaswa kwazo yisikhwama sezimali iNational StudentsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ Financial Aid Scheme, iNSFAS.
Lezi zitshudeni zikusho lokhu ngesikhathi zizokweseka ozakwabo oSamukelisiwe Ndlovu, Nompumelelo Nduli noMlekeleli Shandu abebevele enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini izolo ngecala lokususa udlame emphakathini.

data:
UMHOLI weDA KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango uthi iqembu labo lizimisele ngokuheha intsha njengoba lisemkhankasweni wokwehlisa amandla kaKhongolose abe ngaphansi kuka-50%, okhethweni lukazwelonke ngonyaka ozayo.
Esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini izolo, uMncwango uthe sebejube uNksz Mbali Ntuli ukuthi kube nguyena iNhloko yezemikhankaso eqenjini ngenhloso yokufeza iphupho labo lokudonsa ivoti labantu abasha.
label: politics

data:
Sike sizibuze yini umbuzo othi; yini lena entshontsha abantu abaningi bakithi, futhi bashona ngendlela ecishe ifane? Abantu abaningi abashona kungazelele muntu. Kwabaningi esingike ngababona ukudlula kwabo emhlabeni kujikeleza ekuphundulukeni ukusebenza kwenhliziyo uqobo nasekuqhugeleni kwezinye izitho zomzimba ezishesha zizwele enhliziyweni ngenxa yokusebenzisana kwazo nenhliziyo, kuhlanganisa nomzimba wonke nje.
 Abantu bakithi bahamba emhlabeni beqale bakhale ngovalo olushaya kugubhuzele isifuba, kuphele amandla, iphika nokucinana kuthi ngilapha. Umuntu ahefuzele aze ashone. Lolu valo kwabaningi lusuke lukade lwaqala ukuhlupha kwesinye isikhathi kuze kuphele amandla.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ILUNGU lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC uMnuz Bheki Cele, likhwele ladikila kuNobhala-jikelele kaKhongolose uMnuz Ace Magashule lathi ubulala umbutho ngalezi zinkulumo alokhu ezenza esidlangalaleni.
Ekhuluma emgubhweni weminyaka engu-106, i-ANC yasungulwa enkundleni yezemidlalo eLakeside Sport Ground, eVryheid izolo, uCele uthe sebembonile ukuthi uMagashule usemkhankasweni wokucekela phansi uKhongolose.
label: politics

data:
ILUNGU le-ANC eladutshulwa lisemhlanganweni wokukhetha ababezomela le nhlangano okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-2016 lifuna kuqiniswe ezokuphepha uma sekunemihlangano yamagatsha yokulungiselela ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ngo-Ephreli.
UMnuz Hlanganani Nxumalo (33) waseBlaauwbosch, ngasoSizweni eNewcastle, owadubuleka engalweni wafakwa insimbi, uthe kuyadingeka kuqiniswe ezokuphepha njengoba kwezinye izifunda lungekho uzinzo ngenxa yokuhlukana phakathi ngesikhathi kuyiwa engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC eyayingoDisemba eNasrec, eGoli.
label: politics

data:
LWASHO lwangisuka lolo fufunyane lwami oluthi mangihlokoloze leyo mpahla ngicele bonke abafundi bale ngosi ukuthi bajeqeze izibuko zezinqola zabo baqinisekise ukuphepha maqede balandele lo myalelo.
Lo myalelo uqondile uthi sonke masishaye ama hazard siqinisekise ukuthi sichezuka ngokwanele emgwaqweni ukuze izimoto ezisaqhubeka nohambo zingaphazamiseki nakancane.

data:

UMnuz Sanele Mthethwa (36) izolo uvele enkantolo yaseHowick nalapho etshele khona inkantolo ukuthi ufuna ukuhlanza konke ngokwenzekile kodwa iMantshi uNkk Ntsoaki Khakane yamnqanda yathi kumele athole ummeli kuqala.

data:
UMNDENI kaMengameli Jacob Zuma ugcine ukhiphe isitatimende ufongqa isigqoko uxolisa emphakathi ngenkulumo kankosikazi wakhe, uNkk Thobeka Madiba-Zuma ebisematheni ku-Instagram nakuTwitter ngoLwesihlanu.
Unkosikazi kamengameli ubefake imiyalezo ku-Instagram esonga ngokuthi labo abazama ukulwa nomyeni wakhe bazozisola. Kwenzeka lokhu nje kusabalele izinkulumo ezithi uZuma uhleli ngesinqe esisodwa njengoba enxenxwa ukuba ashenxe esikhundleni.

data:
Ukuhwebelana phakathi kwamazwe kusho ukushintshana ngezimali zamazwe ezihlukene. Uma inkampani eseNingizimu Afrika ifuna ukuthenga ukolweni eNdiya, kufanele ishintshe amaRandi abe yimali yaseNdiya iRupee.
Ngokufanayo uma inkampani eseJapan ifuna ukuthenga iwayini eNingizimu Afrika kufanele ishintshe amaYen iwayise emaRandini ukuze ikwazi ukukhokhela iwayini lelo. Ukusimama kweRandi kunezimali zamanye amazwe kusho ukuthi sikwazi ukuthenga okuningi kunakuqala noma izimpahla ezivela kwamanye amazwe zibonakala zishibhile.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
USAPHITHENE amakhanda umndeni webhungu (21) okuthiwa liklabhe lalimaza unina, labulala abashana balo ababili libagenca ngobhushu, maqede lashayiswa yiloli lashona, eBhobhoyi.
Umndeni kaMnuz Siphamandla Smith awuwuvali umlomo ngesigameko esihlasimulisa umzimba esidlule nemiphefumulo yabashana bakhe uSiyamthanda (3) noThobani (2) okuthiwa bahlaselwe nguye ngobhushu izolo ekuseni, emuva kwehora lesithupha. Kuthiwa unina, uNkk Marry Smith usindile kulesi sigameko kodwa usesimeni esibi esibhedlela.

data:
BAKHATHAZEKILE abazali babafundi baseMlazi Com Tech High eMlaza, okuthiwa sebephuthwa ukufunda ngenxa yenkinga yokucishwa kukagesi. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi sekuphele isonto ugesi ungekho kulesi sikole esinabafundi abahlala ngaphakathi. Phezu kokucishwa kukagesi, kuphinde kwaphela namanzi, okwenza ukuthi izingane ezihlala emakubo zisheshe zigodukiswe. Kuthiwa isikole sikweleta uMasipala weTheku imali elinganiselwa kuR4 million. Okukhathaza abazali ukuthi abakaze batshelwe ngale nkinga yesikweletu.
Umzali wengane efunda uGrade 9 kodwa engahlali ngaphakathi esikoleni, uthe isimo simanzonzo.
label: education

data:
NGESIKHATHI oKlebe bematasa befuna uMnuz Ajay Gupta ngamacala enkohlakalo nokushushumbisa imali, umfowabo uMnuz Atul Gupta ufake amaphepha enkantolo esho ukuthi akazani noR10 million okuthiwa wangena kwi-akhawunti yakhe usuka epulazini i-Estina.
Kuvela ukuthi amaphepha akhe uwasayine ngoFebhuwari 8 eseDubai kanti ufuna i-Asset Forfeiture Unit (AFU) iyeke ukudla impahla yakhe.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
LUTHATHE elinye igxathu udaba lwekusasa leNhloko yezokuShushisa kuleli u-Advocate Shaun Abrahams njengoba uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, enqume ukuhoxisa isicelo sokwedluliswa kwesinqumo senkantolo. 
NgoLwesihlanu abammeli behhovisi likamengameli, ngomyalelo kaRamaphosa bahoxise lesi sicelo sokwedluliswa kodaba olwalufakwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma obengumengameli wezwe. UZuma wadlulisa isinqumo seNkantolo eNkulu iNorth Gauteng eyayithe ukuqokwa kuka-Abrahams kwakungekho emthethweni, yancoma ukuthi axoshwe.
label: politics

data:
INGCABA isisele noNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Malusi Gigaba, ukuthi acacise kabanzi ngodaba lwemfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kuleli. Lokhu kushiwo uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa enkulumweni yakhe ebhekiswe esizweni ngoLwesihlanu ePhalamende eCape Town. Olwemfundo yamahhala lumenyezelwe obengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngoDisemba engqungutheleni ye-ANC yokukhetha ubuholi eNasrec, eGoli. 
Kube nemibuzo eminingi amaqembu aphikisayo ekhala ngokuthi kufanele izikhulu zenabe ngokuthi imali izophumaphi.

data:
SIZWAKELE isikhalo somphakathi obufuna kufakwe uMnuz Bheki Cele abe wuNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa njengoba uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ememezele ukuthi uzongena kulesi sikhundla ngesikhathi ememezela izinguquko kwiKhabhinethi yakhe izolo ebusuku.
UDkt Zweli Mkhize, obengumgcinimafa we-ANC, ngomunye wabantu abamenyezelwe ukuthi uma esefungisiwe namhlanje njengamalungu ePhalamende uzothatha isikhundla sokuba nguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.
label: politics

data:
UMENGAMELI Jacob Zuma akanabo abamelulekayo noma kungenzeka ukuthi akabalaleli ngoba ukudaza inkani angehli esikhundleni kuzomlahlekisela ngokuningi. Usho kanje umhlaziyi wepolitiki ozimele uMnuz Thabani Khumalo.
Uthe ukudaza inkani kukaMengameli aze alibeke ngembaba elokuthi akesabi noma angashaywa ngevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe nokubekwa icala lokuphula umthethosisekelo kuzokwenza angazitholi izimfanelo zakhe uma esephumile.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ZIKUFANISE nebhonasi ukunyuka kwemali yempesheni izaguga, ezithe kuzokwenza omkhulu umehluko.
Lezi zaguga ezihola impesheni yabadala, beziphawula ngesabelomali esethulwe izolo nguNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Malusi Gigaba esizoqala ukusebenza ngo-Ephreli 1. Imali yempesheni yabadala, eyezintandane neyokugula yenyuke ngoR90 isuka kuR1 600. UGigaba umemezele ukuthi le mpesheni izophinde yenyuke ngoR10 ngo-Okthoba 1, okuzokwenza eyabadala neyokukhubazeka igcine inguR1 700.

data:
BAZITAPELE izimpahla negilosa emzini kamakhelwane wabo abantu baseChesterville abebemsola ngokubakhokhisa imali abethi eyokugwazela umsebenzi wakwaMasipala weTheku.
Izolo, labo makhelwane abebegane unwabu bathe umakhelwane wabo uNkk Cabangile Cele-Zikhali, ubebathembise ukuthi bazoqala emsebenzini ngoMsombuluko. Kuthe sekumele baqale wathi abaye emahhovisi ophiko oluqoqa intela kuleli iSouth African Revenue Service (Sars) bayofuna izinombolo zokukhokha intela.

data:
IHLEKA yodwa imilutha yewunga ehlala edolobheni eThekwini njengoba sekuqalwe phansi ukubhaliswa kwabafundi, e-University of South Africa (Unisa), emuva kokumiswa kwesiteleka sabasebenzi.
Kuthiwa le milutha idela ubuthongo ijoyine ulayini wabafundi abalala ngaphandle kwesikhungo sase-Unisa esisemgwaqweni uStalwart Simelane, eThekwini, ukuze idayisele abafundi abafika ekuseni izikhala kulayini.

data: BAPHUTHUNYISWE esibhedlela, iSt Mary's, eMariannhill, entshonalanga yeTheku kukubi odado abahlanu baseWushwini, ngaseMolweni abagandaywe yitekisi ngesikhathi bebuka Uzalo ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku. Lezi zingane okunguThembela (5), Simiso (7), Zothule Mthembu (6), Snethemba Gumede (9) noNoluthando Mfeka (12) kuthiwa zehlelwe yile nkinga unina engekho eseGreytown lapho bekuzoba nomngcwabo kanina omzalayo, uninakhulu walezi zingane.

USergeant Bhekukwazi Mdweshu (37), Mnuz Vukani Mcobothi (25), Mnuz Khayelihle Mbuthuma (32), Mnuz Wonderboy Mhlope (37), Mnuz Matlala Mdweshu Ntshangase (35), Mnuz Mahliphiza Mkhize (28) noMnuz Mondli Mthethwa (32) bavele enkantolo kaMantshi yaseThekwini izolo.

data:
UYADLONDLOBALA umkhankaso wokulwa nokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana njengoba iPhini likaMengameli wezwe eliphinde libe nguMengameli we-ANC, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, lithe mabashushiswe abathintekayo. Kuyimanje i-Asset Forfeiture Unit (AFU) isembhidlangweni wokubuyisa u-R50 billion owathathwa ezinkampanini zikahulumeni.
NgoLwesine iNational Prosecuting Authority ibinomhlangano nabameli bakwaMcKinsey nabakwaTrillion okuyizinkampani okusolakala ukuthi zakhokhelwa u-R1.6 billion ngokungemthetho ngabakwa-Eskom.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ZINGAPHEZU kuka-12 izikhulu eziqaphe izinto kuhulumeni nalabo ababheke ukugcinwa komthetho abazungeza izinkampani nosomabhizinisi abasebenzisana nomndeni wakwaGupta kufunwa uR50 billion owaluthwa ezinkampanini zikahulumeni.
I-National Prosecuting Authority (NPA), Asset Forfeiture Unit (AFU), Specialised Commercial Crime Unit, aboMnyango weziMali, iFinancial Intelligence Centre, iCompanies and Intellectual Property Commission noKlebe bayasebenzisana kulo mzamo. Inhloko esabambile ye-AFU, u-Adv Knox Molelle, ithe basathumela amasamanisi kwabakwaGupta ophenyweni olusaqhubeka ngalabo abathinteka embikweni woMvikeli woMphakathi wokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.
label: politics

data:
Ukufika kwe-internet kule minyaka kuyishintshe kakhulu impilo. Kwafika neselula okwenza kwaba lula ukuxhumana. Yize ukufika kweselula kwathuthukisa indlela yokuphila, ushintsho lwangempela lubonakale lapho kufika lawa abizwa ngama-smart phone okwasho ukuthi amaselula asene-internet.
Lokhu kwasho ukuthi sesikwazi ukuthola nokuthumela imiqulu (documents), imali, izithombe, umculo nokunye okuningi. Ngisho abantu abangenawo ama-akhawunti asebhange namhlanje bayakwazi ukuthola imali besebenzisa wona belu amaselula ane-internet.
label: society

data:
UKUSHODELWA yimali yokuthenga abaqwayizi kuholele ekutheni umfundisi osindisiwe adlwengule izingane zamantombazane ezingaphezu kuka-15, ezineminyaka esukela kwewu-3 kuya kwewu-12, emijondolo yaseLouisiana ePort Shepstone. 
Lezi zindaba zidalulwe wumndeni walo mfundisi, uThokozani Mvalelwa (34), ogwetshwe yiNkantolo yesiFunda yasePort Shepstone odilikajele abahlanu ngemuva kokuzivumela yena ukuthi ubedlwengula laba bantwana qede ababonge ngamaphakethe ama-chips noR2.

data:
UMHOLI weDA, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, ufunge wagomela ukuthi uzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bayajeziswa bonke abantu abanukeka enkohlakalweni yokugixabeza umndeni wakwaGupta ngezigidi zemali yasepulazini laseFree State.
Ethula inkulumo enkundleni yezemidlalo iPholani, eNtuzuma, izolo uMaimane uthe ngeke aphumule uNobhala-jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule noNgqongqoshe wezokuMbiwa Phansi uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane bengaboshiwe mayelana nokuxhaphaza imali yabantu eFree State. UMagashule ubenguNdunankulu waseFree State kanti uZwane enguNgqongqoshe wezoLimo ngesikhathi okusolwa ukuthi kwaphuma ngaso izigidi zemali eyanikwa abakwaGupta.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
USAMUKELE isigwebo esinikwe iphoyisa elabulala indodakazi yakhe yize ekhale ngokuthi asenele, unina wentombazane eyayineminyaka engu-17 eyadutshulwa yabulawa kunombhikisho wezindlu eCator Manor ngo-2013.
UNksz Bandile Ngidi ekhuluma nephephandaba elinguzakwabo waleli, iThe Mercury uthe lesi sigwebo seminyaka engu-10 esinikwe uPhumlani Ndlovu kasenele kodwa singcono kunokuthi angagwetshwa.
