data:
MHLELI: Kwelakho ngicela ukwedlulisa umbono wami ngodaba lwabadayisa amaDVD ukuthi basicabangele phela ukuthi sizele, bangasoneli izingane zethu.
Uyabona la maDVD omkhuba agcwele idolobha asifakela amahloni uma sihamba nezingane zethu ngoba zibona ukuthi uba njani umuntu omdala uma engagqokile. Thina sikhula besitshelwa ukuthi wabona umuntu omdala enqunu uvaleka amehlo yingakho nje ngingeke ngaba wuBen 10 ngoba ngisahamba emazwini abazali bami okuthi abubukwa ubuntu bomuntu omdala ngoba uvaleka amehlo.
label: society

data:
INYUNYANA iNational Education, Health and Allied WorkersÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ Union (Nehawu), ithi zisaqhubeka iziteleka emanyuvesi ahlukene kuleli, ezinye eziqale ngeledlule.
INehawu ithumele isitatimende kwabezindaba izolo icacisa ngokwenzeka e-Unisa, DUT, Wits nase-University of Pretoria. Esitatimende kuthiwa abasebenzi base-Unisa abangaphansi kwale nyunyana abasebenzi kuzo zonke izikhungo zenyuvesi kuleli. Lokhu kudalwe ukuthi abaphathi benyuvesi banqume ukuhoxa ezingxoxweni baya enkantolo yabasebenzi ngoba befuna ukuthi isiteleka esiqale ngeledlule sithathwe njengesingekho emthethweni kodwa bahluleka. Isitatimende siveza ukuthi izimfuno zisamile njengoba befuna ukunyuselwa umholo ngo-10% kuzo zonke izigaba. Bafuna kuqashwe ngokugcwele abasebenzi betoho abasemkhakheni wezobuchwepheshe okuthiwa sebebe yitoho iminyaka engaphezu kwengu-15. Le nyunyana ithi i-Unisa icabanga ukuthi ingaphezulu komthetho njengoba ingafuni ukuhlonipha iLabour Relations Act ngokuthi ibaqashe ngokugcwele yize benazo iziqu.

data:

Lokhu kulandela umhlangano okade ukhona phakathi kukaNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nokuVakasha, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, nabangcwabi kanjalo nalabo abathintekayo kulolu daba, izolo. Laba bahlanganisa iNational Funeral Practitioners Association of South Africa (Nafupa SA) lapho kuvunyelwane khona ngokuthi kusungulwe ikomiti elizobhekana ngqo noguquko emkhakheni wazabangcwabi okuvezwe ngabeNafupa SA.

data:
SINCAMELE ukulala emgwaqweni Siyokwenza inhlolokhono yomfundaze eGoli, isitshudeni sase-University of South Africa (Unisa), osekuphele iminyaka emithathu singayitholi imali yokufunda.
USthembele Ngejane (25) waseMount Moriah, uphenduke isilomo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana emuva kwesibindi sakhe asikhombise ngesonto eledlule. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ubengeke aphuthwe yithuba lomfundaze akade ayewudinga. UNgejane ohlala nonina ongasebenzi nodadewabo ababili, waqeda * -matric ngo-2014 eShayamoya High eKokstad, nakhona awufunde esehlale iminyaka emibili ehleli ekhaya ngenxa yokulimala engozini yemoto. Uveze ukuthi sekukaningi impilo yakhe ibambezeleka kodwa akalilahli ithemba.

data:

Lesi sikole esigcwele ngokweqile njengoba sinabafundi abevile ku-2 000, amagumbi okufundela angu-21 nothisha ababalelwa ku-60 sesizakhele igama ngokwenza kahle minyaka yonke nakuba sisuke semukele abafundi abasuke sebehlule kwezinye izikole abalethwa kusona ukuze baphume beqondile.

UCaptain Khephu Ndlovu okhulumela amaphoyisa eThekwini, uthe kujwayelekile ukuthi kusukela ngoDisemba ibe miningi imisebenzi ekhangiswayo, abanye abazithola sebegilekile ngenxa yayo. URamaphosa uzohamba nongqongqoshe ababhekele ezomnotho nosomabhizinisi ngoJanuwari 23 kuya kuJanuwari 26 uma eseyohlangana nabaholi bomhlaba engqungqutheleni yeWEF.

Abasebenzi base-Unisa abangaphansi kweNational Education Health and Allied Workers Union (Nehawu) bafuna ukunyuselwa umholo ngo-12% kulo nyaka, umqashi uthi angabanika u-6%, abaseDUT bafuna u-10% umqashi uthi angabanika * -4%.
Izinyunyana zabasebenzi baseDUT abangaphansi kweNehawu, iTertiary Education National Union SA (Tenusa) neNational Tertiary Education Union (NTEU) bangenele isiteleka ngoMsombuluko.

Izolo amalungu e-ANC aseka uMnuz Senzo Mchunu abebhikisha ngaphandle kwamahhovisi ale nhlangano eThekwini efuna kuhlakazwe isigungu sesikhashana esiholwa uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu noMnuz Sihle Zikalala, ekhala ngokuthi sicheme nohlangothi lukaZikalala.

data:

UMnuz Zwelethu Mbhele (49) oyinhloko yonogada abephucwe ithenda usola uMncwango ngokumesabisa nokwenze wagcina esemthathele izinyathelo zomthetho. UMbhele uthi emuva kokuba bephucwe ithenda kwabe sekukhangiswa kabusha naye wahamba ethi uyofaka isicelo senkampani yabo.

data:
BATHWALE kanzima izolo abasebenzi besitolo sezimpahla zesikole, iGem Schoolwear, ngenxa yesiminyaminya sabebezothenga umfaniswano wesikole ngosuku lokugcina ngaphambi kokuvulwa kwezikole namuhla.
Uma uqhamuka eGem, esenkabeni yeTheku, ubukhangwa wulayini omude obheke emnyango waso. Bese kuvulwe intuba eyodwa yokungena, kwabiywa nangothango locingo ukugwema isiminyaminya. Ngasemnyango bekukhona unogada nephoyisa lesifazane, bengenisa kuphela abanokukhubazeka nabakhulelwe. Abanye bebekhonjwa kulayini obusuzungeze lonke ibhilidi lesitolo.

Inhlangano ebhekele ukusebenza kwamabandla iKwaZulu-Natal Council of Churches nayo ike yakuveza phambilini ukuthi sekukaningi ithola ngalezi zigameko emabandleni ahlukene.

Izwe lakithi liphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi yobugebengu obudlange iNingizimu Afrika yonkana. Manje ukugijimisa izigebengu kukhona umuntu olala phandle ongaziwa ukuthi uziphilisa ngani, ngibona sengathi ukunyanyalata lokho ekukhucululeni ubugebengu.

data:
INDODA okusolwa ukuthi ibidle izidakamizwa ivulele ngenhlamvu esidlangaleni kunabantu ebebezihambela emarobhothini kwaV, eMlaza, maqede yabhekisa isibhamu kuyo yazidubula yafa izolo.
Indoda, eyaziwa ngokuthi ingumakhi wezindlu odabuka kwelinye lamazwe ase-Afrika, kuthiwa inguMnuz Sdu Sithole. Imangaze abaningi ngesikhathi imisa imoto erobhothini kwaV, yaphuma yavulela inhlamvu esidlangaleni, kungaziwa ukuthi idubula bani.

data:
LUSEYINDIDA udaba lowesilisa ongumakhi ozingqokloze ngesibhamu phambi komphakathi emarobhothini kwaV, eMlaza ngeSonto, okusolwa ukuthi ubexabene nowesifazane okuthiwa ubesebenzisana naye obemkweleta imali eningi.
UMnuz Sdu Sithole odabuka eMozambique kuvele ukuthi ngaphambi kokuzisakaza ngesibhamu ubhale kuWhatsApp wakhe exolisa kubangani ngokudubula abulale owesifazane othile. Komunye umbhalo wakhe ubethi isibhamu ubengasithengelanga ukubulala owesifazane kodwa ubenzela ukuzigada. Uqhuba athi akazi ukuthi ubengenwe yini kodwa uzozinikela emaphoyiseni. Akubhalile kusabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa umndeni wakhe uthi awazi lutho ngomuntu abexabene naye nokuthi kukhona nomuntu ambulele.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UTHUKUTHELE uyaveva uyise wentombazane eyakhuleliswa ngobenguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uNksz Nonkanyiso Chonco.
UMnuz Fartescue Chonco uthe sekumume emphinjeni ukwedelelwa wuZuma ekubeni agqekeza futhi wakhulelisa indodakazi yakhe, awe evuka nayo isishiywe wunina. Izindaba zokuthandana kukaNonka Chonco (24), onomuzi endaweni yabadla izambane likapondo eBallito noZuma (76), zavela sekubelethwe ingane esibhedlela esizimele saseHillcrest, iBusamed, ngo-Ephreli 12, okuwusuku okwazalwa ngalo uZuma. UChonco (86) uthe baxhumana ngocingo noZuma bavumelana ngokuthi bazobonana kodwa kuze kube yimanje abakabonani.

data:
IDINGA ukubukwa ngeso elibanzi indaba yenqubomgomo ehlongozwa wuMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo, okuhloswe ngayo ukufundisa abafundi abenza uGrade 3 kuya kaGrade 5 ngokukhishwa kwezisu kwabakhulelwe bengahlosile nokuvikela ukukhulelwa, ngokuthi badle amaphilisi athile emuva kokuya ocansini.
Inzima le nkinga ebhekene nohulumeni. Kuthiwa babalelwa ku-15 000 ezweni abafundi abakhulelwe. Isikhathi uhulumeni asinikeze umphakathi ukuba uphawule, sincane. Kuthiwe ukuphawula kuzophela ekupheleni kwezayo. Indaba yokukhulelwa kwabafundi kangaka ezweni elidume ngokuba neningi elingamakholwa, isho lukhulu.

data:

Amaphoyisa akuqinisekisile ukuthi isidumbu sikaMnuz Kwazikwakhe Mfanothi Lushozi onyamalale ekupheleni kwenyanga edlule sitholakele sinamanxeba okungakaqinisekiswa ukuthi ngawani. ULushozi unyamalale ngoJuni 30 eKopokopo lapho okuhlala khona intombi yakhe emuva kokuthi kufike amadoda angaziwa emfuna ngezibhamu. data:
IYAQONGA ingcindezi yokuthi uhulumeni ehlise uphethroli njengoba amaqembu epolitiki nezinhlaka zomphakathi nezokuthutha okubalwa kuzo Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP), Democratic Alliance (DA), Organisation Undoing TAX Abuse (OUTA), nePeople Against Petrol and Paraffin Increase (Pappi) ziwufuna wehlile.
Esithangamini nabezindaba ebesiseTshwane, umholi weDA, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uthe uhulumeni we-ANC ulwa nabantu abampofu eNingizimu Afrika ngoba unyuse intela yezimpahla ebizwa nge-Value Added Tax (VAT) yasuka ku-14% yaya ku-15%, wanyusa intela ekhokhwa kuphethroli, wafaka intela kashukela kanti nophethroli unyuka njalo njengoba kusukela ngo-Ephreli kuze kube manje ubulokhu unyuka.

data:
KUSAQHUBEKA ukubulawa kwabantu eMbumbulu ngenxa yombango wengoma namatekisi phezu kokuba inkosi yesizwe uMnuz Khehla Makhanya noNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda sebekhuzile bathi akubekwe phansi izikhali.
Sebeyisishiyagalombili manje abantu asebebulewe kule ndawo emasontweni amathathu edlule kusukela kuqale impi yomshoshaphansi okusolakala ukuthi isisusa sayo wumbango wengoma namatekisi esigodini sakwaNgqinya.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Ngithi angidlulise lokhu ikakhulukazi kule nyanga yamadoda aseMzansi.
Kunemashi yabesifazane ebihleliwe ngomhlaka 19 Julayi 2018 eqondaniswa nale nyanga ngoba kwabesilisa ekhuluma ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane nezingane akhona namadoda abeyingxenye yayo okuyinto enhle kakhulu ukuze kuzwakale ulaka lawo amadoda. Ngiyafisa ukuba izinhlangano ezithi zikhulumela amadoda kuthi kule nyanga ezoqala u-Agasti zisukume zihlele imashi yokuhlukumezeka okubhekiswe emadodeni ngabantu besifazane.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo ePhakeme useyalele abesikhwama esiboleka izitshudeni imali yokufunda, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), ukuthi bangaqhubeki nokwamukela izicelo zezitshudeni ezifuna ukuxhaswa ngemali ngonyaka ozayo.
Encwadini ebhalwe nguNkk Naledi Pandor, ayibhalele uSihlalo webhodi lakwaNSFAS, uMnuz Sizwe Nxasana, eputshukele kwabezindaba, uthe ukhathazekile ngendlela isikhwama esihlela ngayo izinhlelo zokuxhasa izitshudeni, okubalwa kuzo ukuphuza kwaso ukuphasisa izicelo nokuphuza ukukhokhela izitshudeni eziphasisiwe.
label: education

data:
MHLELI: Kwelakho elingakhethi iphela emasini, ake ngithembe ukuthi uzolishicilela lolu daba lwami. Benginemali ebengiyonga kwa-Old Mutual, okuthe uma sengibona ukuthi itoho lizophela noma inini nganquma ukubazisa kwa-Old Mutual.
Nangempela bangikhokhelile imali ekade ngiyilondolozile. Inkinga yami isekutheni ngoJuni 26 baphinde bayibamba imali noma sengibazisile ukuthi ngeke ngisakwazi ukukhokha ngoba itoho selizophela.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
UKHUNGATHEKILE umndeni wakwaMathonsi kwa-H eNtuzuma okufe indodana yawo edutshulwe kubhiyozwa emuva komngcwabo wendoda ebisolwa ngobugebengu.
UThandolwethu Mathonsi (19), okuthiwa ubeyisikhokho ekushayeni isidudla, kuthiwa ufike kubhiyozwa ezokwenza adume ngazo ehamba ngemoto kayise iToyota RunX ebisetshenziswa nguye isikhathi esiningi. Ngesikhathi ethi uyapaka kuqhamuke umuntu wamdubula kabili.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ISIMISIWE emsebenzini iMenenja kamasipala waseJozini ngemuva kokukhala kwamakhansela ngo-R11 million osebenze kwakhiwa umgwaqo oyikhilomitha elilodwa eMkhuze nezigidi ezintathu zokulungisa amahhovisi omkhandlu.
UMnuz Kuhle Khumalo umiswe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku ngo-9 ngemuva komhlangano wamakhansela obusemini. Umiswa nje bese kuqalwe uphenyo olwenziwa yiMunicipal Public Account Committee (MPAC) oluqalwe ngesonto eledlule.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMENGAMELI we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa udonse ngendlebe amalungu enhlangano ngokuthi akalindele muntu ozogijima aye enkantolo eyophosela inselelo ingqungquthela nobuholi obusha KwaZulu-Natal.
URamaphosa ubekhuluma emuva kokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho lwezikhundla zobuholi obusha KwaZulu-Natal engqungqutheleni yesishiyagalombili ebihleli eDurban University of Technology izolo. Le ngqungquthela eke yaphonselwa inselelo enkantolo, iqale ngoLwesine yasongwa izolo.
label: politics

data:
AMADODAKAZI kalowo owayeyinkosikazi kaDkt Nelson Mandela, uWinnie Madikizela-Mandela, asaqhubeka nokulwela ubunikazi bomhlaba kaMandela oseQunu okunesithabathaba somuzi kuwo. 
Ngokwephephandaba eliphuma ngeSonto, iSunday Times, uZindzi noZenani Mandela, sebefake lolu daba eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ukuphikisa isinqumo senkantolo yokudluliswa kwamacala (Supreme Court of Appeal), esachitha uMdikizela-Mandela ngesikhathi efuna ubunikazi bale ndlu.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
I-ANCYL KwaZulu-Natal isiphumele obala yathi ifuna uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli ukuthi akhethwe njengoNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal engqungqutheleni yesifundazwe okulindeleke ukuthi isingathwe ungakapheli uJulayi.
Ekhuluma emcimbini wokusonga inyanga yabantu abasha ehholo lomphakathi iMichael Gwala eNtshangwe, uMgcinimafa we-ANCYL uMnuz Thobelani Ncampalala, uthe bafuna ukuthi abantu abasha bangene ezinhlakeni ze-ANC ukuze nabo bahlale etafuleni uma sekuthathwa izinqumo.
label: politics

data:
UMHOLI we-Economic Freedom Fighters, uMnuz Julius Malema, usegxeke impatho etholwe uMnuz Duduzane Zuma ngesikhathi evela enkantolo izolo.
UZuma ubevele enkantolo yamacala athinta imali wanikezwa ibheyili kaR100 000 ecaleni lenkohlakalo lapho esolwa ngokuthi wazama ukugwazela owayeyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas, ngoR600 million kodwa uJonas wawunqaba.
Izolo uMbuso ubeke uDuduzane icala lenkohlakalo kodwa udaba olube sematheni kakhulu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuvela kwakhe efakwe ozankosi ezinyaweni, okuvame ukwenziwa uma kuvela abasolwa ababhekene namacala abucayi. 
Umbuzo obuhamba phambili ezinkundleni ngowokuthi ufakelweni ozankosi ngaloluya hlobo ekubeni kunguye ozinikele emaphoyiseni. 
Ekhuluma nentatheli yeSABC ngoLwesibili uMalema uthe uDuduzane usezoba yiqhawe kuleli ngoba abantu bazozwelana naye ngenxa yendlela aphathwe ngayo. 
"Akumele senze abantu okungenzeka ukuthi baphule umthetho amaqhawe ngenxa yendlela esibaphatha ngayo. Buka into eyenzeke kuDuduzane. Namhlanje uDuduzane uyiqhawe ngenxa yendlela aphathwe ngayo enkantolo. Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bayazwelana nabantu ababukeka engathi bayizisulu. Akumele sihlasele abantu okungenzeka ukuthi bayizigebengu ngendlela ezobaphendula amaqhawe," kusho uMalema. 
Uqhube waveza nokuthi kumele abantu abasolwayo balandelelwe kuphela uma sekunobufakazi obanele ukuthi babhekane nengalo yomthetho enkantolo. 
"Kunomehluko phakathi kwepolitiki necala elisenkantolo. Enkantolo kumele uveze ubufakazi obungashiyi ungabazane ngezinsolo umsolwa abekwa zona. UMalema ufike abange umsindo abange umsindo, bese beyagxuma abeNPA ngisho bengenabo ubufukazi. Ngakho kumele sikwazi ukukuhlukanisa lokhu kokubili. Sizoqhubeka sibange umsindo ngezinto esizisolayo kodwa oKlebe neNPA akumele badudwe ngabakuzwa ePhalamende. Kumele baqhubeke bona bayofuna ubufakazi, uma sebebutholile kumele baphathe abasolwa ngendlela ngoba ukungakwenzi lokhu kubaphendula amaqhawe," kuphetha uMalema.Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â 
Icala likaDuduzane lihlehliselwe uJanuwari 24 wonyaka ozayo ngoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Ngibhala le ncwadi ngisuswa udaba oluke lwaba sematheni olwakhulunywa uMnuz Julius Malema. Impela bonke laba bantu abamkhuzayo kuyacaca ukuthi abakaze basebenze nabomdabu baseNdiya noma babasebenzele.
Mina ngisebenzela owomdabu waseNdiya. Ayikho inhlobo yosizi engingaluthwele. Uyangithuka zonke izinsuku zikaThixo aze angibeke isandla ngezinye izinsuku. Ungihlukumeza sengathi angiyena umuntu ophilayo onemizwa nenhliziyo.
label: politics

data:
MHLELI: Kanti ngempela yini eyolekelela izingane zabantu abantulayo esihlukwini sokushaywa zilinyazwe abantu okufanele engabe bazinika uthando njengothisha bazo. Angihambisani nesiphakamiso seCOSAS sokuziphindisela kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi kuzomele ilekelele abazali ekuvuleni amacala ezinkantolo nokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abenzi bokubi bayaboshwa.
Ngisuswa wudaba olwaphuma kwiSolezwe langomhla ka-29 June 2018 lapho kwavela udaba lomfundi (9) waseMfume ofunda esikoleni iBaniyena Primary School olaliswe esibhedlela eyohlinzwa isandla ngenxa yokulinyazwa uthisha ngoba wayedlala eshaya amafoli, kwathinteka isicabha sekotishi likathisha. Wubulwane njena lobu mawulandela kahle isizathu sokushaywa kwezingane.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ILAHLWE yicala yafakwa ohlwini lwabahlukumeza ngokocansi indoda yaseScotland okuthiwa isibaqedile abesifazane ilala nabo kodwa ibe ingenawo umphambili, ibalutha ngokuthi inawo bese ibadlokodla ngento ethize esikhundleni somphambili.
Kuthiwa uMnuz Carlos Delacruz (35) ubebathatha abesifazane abayise endlini yakhe, afike acime ugesi bese ethatha le nto yakhe engaziwa abadlokodle ngayo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
INKAMPANI ephehla ugesi eNingizimu Afrika, i-Eskom, ithi luzoqala phansi uhlelo lokunqanyulwa kukagesi emuva kokuthi abanye abasebenzi bayo belaxaze umsebenzi bavala amasango aya eziteshini zikagesi ngoba befuna ukukhokhelwa amabhonasi.
Esitatimendeni, i-Eskom itshele amakhasimende ayo ukuthi mawabe nezinhlelo zokulungiselela ukunqanyulwa kukagesi futhi abheke nama-website omasipala bawo.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
KUBOSHWE isihlobo ngokuthunjwa kosana olunezinyanga ezintathu lwaseHibberdene, olwanyamalala ngenyanga edlule.
Ubusulahle ithemba umndeni kaLuyanda Simamane, obumthungatha nasezibhedlela, watholwa ngoLwesine eLamontville, eThekwini. Unina kaLuyanda uNksz Vuyisile Simamane (21), uthe kuboshwe umzala wakhe. Kusolwa ukuthi ingane yebiwa ngowesifazane othandana nalo wesilisa oboshiwe. UNksz Simamane uthe lo wesifazane wayeqala ngisho ukumbona kodwa wayazi ukuthi uthandana nomzala wakhe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SIKHULU isikhalo kwabanye abazali asebefisa ukuthi ngabe izikole sezivuliwe njengoba bekhala ngokuhlupha kwezingane. Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana sekwenziwe nehlaya lencwadi esabalalisiwe, okuthiwa ibhalwe abazali bebhalela othisha benxenxa ukuthi zivulwe izikole. Yize lokhu kwenziwa ihlaya, bakhona ngempela abazali abangazi ukuthi bazokwenza kanjani ukuthi izingane zingabi nesithukuthezi emakhaya. Uma amaholidi ezingane engahlelelwe, zigcina ziganga, zenze nezinto ezizozixabanisa nabazali.
OyiMarketing Manager yakwaBudget Insurance, uNkk Susan Steward, uthe okuningi kokujabulisa izingane kudinga imali. Uthe ikhona indlela yokugwema ukuchitha imali eningi kodwa uphinde ujabulise izingane. Uveza ukuthi kubalulekile ukuhlela amaholidi okuvalwa ezikole, kubekwe nemali. Nazi ezinye zezinto ezingamasu okujabulisa izingane.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SEKUBOSHWE indoda yesibili ngokubulawa komholi wophiko lwentsha kwi-ANC, odutshulwe ngakubo eMlaza ephuma engqungqutheleni yenhlangano ngoMgqibelo.
UMnuz Bongani Usher Mkhize (25), ubenguSihlalo we-ANC Youth League (YCL) eCoastal KZN College eyiPhini likaSihlalo we-ANC ku-ward 88 eMlaza. Indoda yokuqala eneminyaka ewu-29 izinikele emaphoyiseni ngosuku lobugebengu. Izolo amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi sekuboshwe indoda eneminyaka ewu-24 mayelana nokufa kukaMkhize.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IZAZI zomnotho zigqugquzela abantu ukuthi babophe izifociya futhi bamukele ukuthi intengo kaphethroli izolokhu yehla yenyuka, ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo ngoba uhulumeni akakezi namasu okwehlisa intela kaphethroli.
UMnuz Doctor Sangweni oyisazi somnotho enkampanini iDolsden Oracle, uthe uphethroli othengwa kwamanye amazwe uthengwa ngentengo ebekwe ngamazwe awukhiqizayo bese uma ufika kuleli ufakwe intela ehlukene okungekaphethroli nesiza abalimele ezingozini zomgwaqo.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
KUKHALWA nxazonke ngowesifazane waseCato Ridge okusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe wabulawa umakhi bebanga imali abeyikweleta.
 UNksz Cacisile Gumede (34), obengumabhalane eMsunduzi Clinic, eCato Ridge ophinde abe yilungu lesigungu esiphezulu egatsheni le-ANC kuwadi 1 kule ndawo, kusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe nguMnuz Sdu Sitole, odabuka eMozambique obemakhela indlu, ngoMgqibelo, ebusuku.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
USEKOLUNYE utaku uMnuz Mduduzi Manana osule esikhundleni sokuba yilungu lePhalamende kuleli sonto njengoba amalungu ekomiti ebelizomqondisa ubugwegwe efuna akhokhe izindleko zawo.
UManana owayeyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme kodwa wasula ngemuva kokushaya abesifazane endaweni yobumnandi, uzisulele ePhalamende ngoLwesibili wathumela incwadi ehhovisi likaSotswebhu we-ANC izolo emazisa ukuthi useyasula.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
USOBISHINI owesifazane waseSobantu, eMgungundlovu, okweleta umasipala waseMsunduzi uR220 000 wezindleko zamanzi, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nokuqoqwa kukadoti. UMasipala uveze ukuthi le mali eyeminyaka engu-14 edlule. 

Umnikazi wendlu, uNksz Nomusa Ngcobo, uthe umndeni wakhe wathenga lo muzi ngo-1999 kodwa itayitela langabhaliswa ngaphansi kwegama lo muntu womndeni, okuyinto abebengayazi. 

UNksz Ngcobo uvumile ukuthi abakaze bakhokhe ngisho isenti selokhu baqala ukuhlala kule ndawo ngoba abakaze bathole incwadi ebayalela ukuthi bakhokhe. Uthe owayengumnikazi wendawo ubazise ngenyanga edlule sebehlelela ukubhalisa indlu ngaphansi kwabantu bomndeni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ULALE ebaliwe owesifazane waseChina obenikela ngocansi emadodeni abhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi ofunayo akeze kuye uzomnika aze acikeke. Lokhu kwenzeke eHaitang Bay.
Kuthiwa lo wesifazane odalulwe ngokuthi unguNksz Ye uboshiwe ngecala loku-khangisa ngocansi. Kuthiwa lesi sime-mezelo sale ntokazi sidale isiyaluyalu esingakaze sibonwe njengoba izinkumbi zamadoda bezithutheleka ehhotela ebihleli kulona.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMHOLI womphakathi oyisilomo, odume nangokutetemukisa izingane zendawo aziyise ebhishi, usolwa ngokudlwengula amantombazanyana ayisikhombisa. UMnuz Xolani Ngidi, oneminyaka ewu-40, kuthiwa ubedlwengula amantombazanyana aneminyaka esukela kwemine kuya ku-12 ngezindlela ezahlukene. Amanye kuthiwa ubewabiza, awagcobe uVaselina bese ewanukubeza.
Ngokwabazali balezi zingane, umsolwa unguSihlalo weCommunity Policing Forum (CPF) emijondolo yaseManyaleni, e-Unit 2, eChatsworth ngaseThekwini.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
BAGWETSHWE odilikajele abalisa abathathu abalahlwe ngamacala okubulala ngesihluku amaphoyisa esigamekweni esenzeke ngoSepthemba 2015 emijondolo yaseNamibia, eNanda. IJaji laseNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini uXolile Ntshulana likhiphe lesi sigwebo ngoMgqibelo lathi sizobafundisa isifundo ababulali abangakhombisi ngisho ukuzisola.
ULindokuhle Mchunu (20), uSboniso Khubisa (22) noSabelo Mkhize (28) baphinde bengezelwa eminye iminyaka ngamanye amacala. Bathola iminyaka engu-15 ngokubamba inkunzi behlomile, emihlanu yokuzama ukubulala baphinda bathola eminye engu-15 nezinyanga ezingu-12 ngokutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UBEPHUME kubo eyotadisha umfundi waKwaMshayazafe, eNanda, oshiswe ngempelasonto nesoka lakhe, nokusolwa ukuthi bashiswe obeyisoka lobegadiswe umjondolo okwenzeke kuwo isehlo.
UNomasonto Zuma (17) obefunda uGrade 11 eSiyathuthuka High, ushe wangqongqa noMbusiseni Langa (18) ngentathakusa yangeSonto. Lesi sehlo kuthiwa sisuswe yingxabano ebiphakathi kukamsolwa nobeyintombi yakhe ebigada umjondolo oshile.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Ngoba isiphekiwe sengithi mangiyiphule ngiyihlukanise ngezithebe mayelana nodaba oluphakanyiswe ngokubanjwa kwabantu eNquthu obelushicilelwe ephephandabeni lomhla ka-13.
Yiqiniso elingephikwe lelo, sengikubone izikhawu kwenzeka phambi kwami kuyilapho ngingeke ngenze lutho. Bayabulala laba bafana abadlali. Imbangela yakho konke lokhu wukucanasa kwabashushumbisi bezidakamizwa ezidayisa udede kuleli dolobha.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ANGAPHEZULU kuka-100 amagatsha e-ANC KwaZulu-Natal angeke abe yingxenye yengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi besifundazwe eqala namhlanje enyuvesi yaseZululand, oNgoye.
Lawa magatsha awazange ahlangabezane nemibandela ebekiwe yokuthi akwazi ukuthamela ingqungquthela. Kanjalo nobuholi bezifunda ezintathu okuke kwaba nezehlakalo zokubulawa kwabaholi okuyiHarry Gwala, Moses Mabhida neLower South Coast buhlakaziwe, buzoya kule ngqungquthela kodwa abuvoti.
label: politics

data:
UMZALI oziba ingane uma imbikela ngokunukubezwa kunamathuba amaningi okuthi naye akhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela.
Lokhu kushiwo uConstable Lihle Mlotshwa woPhiko oluphenya amacala odlame emndenini, oluvikela izingane, luphenye namacala athinta ucansi, iFamily Violence, Child Protection and Sexual Offenses Unit (FCS), ngesikhathi kunemashi yezingane ezifunda ezinkulisa zaKwaNgcolosi, izolo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ISIGUNGU esiphezulu se-ANC sijube ikomiti elixazulula izikhalo ukuthi lisebenzisane nethimba lesikhashana le-ANC eKZN ukulungisa zonke izikhalazo zamalungu ayise le nhlangano enkantolo.
Esitatimendini esikhishwe nguNobhala jikelele uMnuz Ace Magashule izolo ngemuva komhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu obuse-Irene, ePitoli, ngoMsombuluko, uthe uma kwenzeka lokhu bazokwazi ukuxazulula izinkinga ezikhona ngaphandle kwasezinkantolo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUMISIWE ukufunda okwesikhashana esikoleni eBunguni Secondary kulandela ukuvuka umbhejazane kwabafundi, bashisa isikole bekhala ngokungabibikho kokudla.
Izolo akuzange kufundwe kulesi sikole esiseNkanini, eMuden ngaphandle kwaseGreytown, emuva kwesigameko sangoMsombuluko lapho abafundi beqale bashaya khona othisha ngamatshe, baphihliza nezimoto zabo. Kuthiwa othisha baphume sebephelezelwa amaphoyisa. Abafundi basale baphihliza wonke amawindi esikole basokhela ngomlilo sasha sangqongqa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
AKUVUMI ngisho ayibuke indlu okushe kwangqongqa kuyo indodakazi yakhe eneminyaka ewu-19, eshone igoyise isoka KwaDukuza kuleli sonto. 
UNksz Gugu Dludla (35), obengekho ngesikhathi kwenzeka lokhu, uthi uvuswe wucingo ngeSonto ekuseni obemshayela emazisa ukuthi indodakazi yakhe uLuwiza Dludla (19) yaseZimpempeni nesoka lakhe bokheleke ngomlilo ezintatha ngeSonto.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Bengicela kwabohlanga kesibheke emuva lapho sisuka khona ukuthi ngabe sisayibambe ngakho noma isisiphunyukile isidla utshani? Ake sibheke isimo phansi kwalezi zihloko ezilandelayo.(1)imisebenzi (2)ubugebengu (3)ezokuhlaliswa kwabantu.(4)umhlaba.(5)abohlanga.
Ngike ngizibuze ukuthi imbangela yokuswela umsebenzi ngabe yini? Ngike ngibone izikhangiso zomsebenzi ziziningi futhi zisho nemiholo emihle bese ngixakeka ukuthi pho kungani izingane zakwethu zihlale zikhala ngokungaqasheki zibe zifundile. Uma ulandelisisa inkinga ngamava.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SEZIQALE phansi izinkinga esikoleni samabanga aphezulu eMbumbulu esacishe savalwa ngenxa yokungaziphathi kahle kwabafundi, asebekhala ngesibhaxu kuthishanhloko.
Abafundi baseMbambangwe Secondary abafunda u-matric badube amakilasi izolo nangoLwesithathu bekhala ngokuthi abasakwazi ukubekezelela ukushaywa nguthishanhloko, bakhala nangokuthi uyabathuka. Njengoba abafundi abaningi baka-matric bezoqhubeka nokufunda uma kuvalwa izikole namuhla, abaseMbambangwe abacele ukungadalulwa bathe abalubhadi esikoleni. Bathi sekukaningi bekhononda ngokushaywa manje sebenqume ukulusukumela lolu daba. Izolo bathe sebecele ukubonana nothishanhloko bamtshele okokugcina ngezikhalo zabo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
BANGASE babhekane nezimbila zithutha abasolwa ngobutabane abazohambela umhlangano wamaNazaretha, aseBuhleni kaJulayi njengoba sekusabalele amahlebezi okuthi bazothelwa isibhaxu uma beke bafika.
Amalungu aleli bandla okuthiwa adinwe ayaveva ngezitabane okuthiwa uma zisemhlanganweni noma entabeni zisuke zize emfuleni wokweshela, noma ziye ocansini nezithandana nabo, ahlanganise uhla lwamalungu lwabasolwa ngokuba yizitabane athi kumele bathelwe induku uma befikile. Abanye kulaba abakulo luhla kuthiwa bathatha amantombazane nabafana babathembise ukuthi bazokwelashwa njengoba kuzobe kuzokhulekwa, uma sebefike babajikele babanukubeze.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IZIKHULU zamabhange ezingamalungu eBanking Association of South Africa (Basa) zithi zizimisele ukutakula izinkampani zikahulumeni ezinenkinga yezimali ukuze zingacwili kakhulu ezikweletini.
Lesi simemezelo senziwe yisikhulu esiphezulu seBasa, uMnuz Cas Coovadia oveze ukuthi ngoLwesibili kaJuni 19 babenomhlangano noNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Nhlanhla Nene, owamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uMnuz Pravin Gordhan nePhini likaNene, uMnuz Mondli Gungubele.

data:
BEKULINDELEKE ukuba libuyele enkantolo maduze ukuze kuqale ukuthethwa kwecala elithinteka kulo lokulunyiswa kwabantu ngezinja iphoyisa elidutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu lingena emzini walo.
UConstable Musawenkosi Khwela ubephuma emsebenzini ngoLwesihlanu ngo-10 ebusuku ngesikhathi ehlaselwa ngabantu abangaziwa emzini wakhe eZwelibomvu ngaKwaNdengezi, bamdubula, walimala kanzima. Ulaliswe egunjini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela.

data:
SEKUPHUME incwadi eyalela ukuthi kuboshwe igeza lomlingisi eliyisilomo emdlalweni woMzansi Magic, iThe Queen elisolwa ngokungondli.
Lo mlingisi leli phephandaba elingeke limdalule ukuvikela ingane, kuthiwa sekuphele izinyanga ezinhlanu engayondli indodana (2) yakhe. Kuthiwa umlingisi unamanye amadodakazi amabili ahlale ebonakala nawo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ejabule. Kodwa akanaso isikhathi sale ndodana.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUSASA, iNingizimu Afrika izobe igubha usuku oluthinta abaningi kuleli, uSuku lweNtsha. Ngokomlando uJuni 16 waba wusuku olubalulekile ngo-1976 eSoweto lapho kwabhikisha khona izinkulungwane zabantu abasha begqoke imifaniswano yabo yezikole belwisana nokufundiswa nge-Afrikaans ezikoleni. Kwabhikisha abafundi ababalelwa ku-20 000.
Ngokwezibalo ezivela kwaSA History kwabulawa abafundi ababalelwa ku-176 kulo mbhikisho. Omunye walabo bafundi kwaba nguHector Pieterson (13), isithombe sakhe esasabalala umhlaba wonke esezingalweni zikaMbuyisa Makhubu owayeneminyaka engu-18 ngaleso sikhathi.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUZOPHELA ukushaywa umoya emahhovisi kosigaxamabhande bamaphoyisa asebezophakwa emgwaqweni balwe nobugebengu obehlukene, ikakhulukazi ukubanjwa kwenkunzi kwezimoto zemali nokubulala.
Izolo ngaphambi kokuthi uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, noKhomishana wamaphoyisa, uLt-General Khehla Sitole, bethule izinhlelo zabo zokulwa nobugebengu esithangamini nabezindaba, kubikwe izenzo ezintathu zokubanjwa kwezimoto zemali eMpumalanga.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Ake ngithathe leli thuba ngizwakalise umbono wami malunga nokumiswa kwengqungquthela ye-ANC. Isifundazwe sakwaZulu Natal siyisifundazwe ongafunga uthi sabulawa yiqili maqe lazifela zonke izinto ezingakhi ziqala la. Lokhu okwenzekile kucacisa ngokusobala ukuthi i-ANC izibulala yona ngoba kusho ukuthi njalo uma kukhona ukungaboni ngasolinye kuyiwa ezinkantolo.
Uma i-ANC ihluleka ngo-2019 ingakhali ngamuntu, izisole yona. Futhi kungase kuqhubeke ukubulawa kosopolitiki emuva kwalesi sivimbelo senkantolo ngoba uzokhumbula ukuthi izifunda noma amagatsha abengeyona inxenye yengqungquthela okubalwa kuzo iHarry Gwala, Moses Mabhida nangala ko South Coast yilapho kwabulawa abantu okusolakala ukuthi babengahambisani nokuba khona kwengqungquthela.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
Bavuke umbhejazane osomabhizinisi abanezinkontileka zokuqoqa udoti eThekwini bachitha udoti emgwaqweni uM4 edolobheni bekhala ngokungakhokhelwa.
Baqale ngokuqoqana ngaphandle kwaseMoses Mabhida Stadium lapho bekulindeleke ukuthi imenenja kamasipala, uMnuz Sipho Nzuza, ibe khona ukuze bayinike uhlu lwezikhalo zabo njengoba bethi sekuyophela izinyanga ezintathu bengaholelwe. Umbhikisho ubuhlanganisa izinhlangano zosomabhizinisi ezehlukene okubalwa kuzo Isandlwana, Kojo, MKVA, Umlazi Business Forum neDelangokubona.

data:
UMXHUMANISI wobuholi besikhashana be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, ucacise ngenhloso yakhe yokuhambela icala lobengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma osolwa ngenkohlakalo. UZuma ubevele okwesibili eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu lapho kubonakale khona inqwaba yabaholi namalungu e-ANC eyomeseka. UZikalala uthe ukubonakala kwakhe eseka uZuma kungenxa yokuthi usuke efuna ukuqondisa ukukhuluma okungekuhle okusabalele ngabaholi benhlangano.
Uthe usuke eziyele njengesakhamuzi sakuleli hhayi njengelungu noma umholi we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal. Uveze nokuthi usazoqhubeka nokuya ngoba akaboni hlazo yena kulokho.
label: politics

data:
UMENGAMELI we-IFP Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi uxwayisa ngokuthi uma udaba lomhlaba wamakhosi lungaxazululwa luzodala ukuthi kubheduke udlame bese kuchitheka igazi. 
Ekhuluma izolo emhlanganweni wezinsuku ezine lapho kubhungwa khona ngodaba lomhlaba wamakhosi eMayville, eThekwini, uButhelezi uthe kumanje abantu baqalile ukuzithathela umhlaba ngendlela engekho emthethweni ngemuva kwekhwelo le-EFF.
label: politics

data:
UMHLAZIYI wezepolitiki ozimele, uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uthi ubuholi be-ANC kuzwelonke kumele bungenelele, buziphathele isifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natal ukuze kuphele umdonsiswano okhona obeka ikusasa leqembu engcupheni.
Engxoxweni neSolezwe izolo, uKhumalo uthe zimbili izinto ezingaqeda umdonsiswano okhona eKZN. Ukuthi ubuholi bukazwelonke buziphathele noma bujube umakadebona weqembu othembekile futhi ongekho ezinhlangothini ukuthi kube nguyena oshanelayo.

data:

Umndeni kaMnuz Bhekisisa Msane (62) waseShowe obehlala ekhweni kankosikazi omncane eMpophomeni ufike washaqa ibhokisi nesidumbu ngoMgqibelo ebusuku kulandela ukungaboni ngaso linye nomndeni kaNksz Sandile Ndlovu abehlala naye. UMsane bekumele afihlwe ngeSonto kodwa kugcine kungenzekanga abakubo sebelande isidumbu ekhweni.

Indaba yasuka ngemuva kokuthi umbhali wezincwadi uJackie Phamatse abhala ekhasini lakhe ukuthi uzwe ingxoxo phakathi kowesifazane osembonini yethelevishini encenga omunye umngani wakhe ukuthi angayisabalalisi i-video yakhe ephuzile nomyeni wakhe esocansini nosaziwayo wesilisa.

Ngo-1976 intsha yakuleli yayilwa namaBhunu ifuna ukuqedwa kokufunda ngesibhunu zonke izifundo, kodwa eyanamuhla enye yayo ingene shi kwizidakamizwa.
Ucwaningo olwenziwe ngabomkhankaso oqwashisa ngokucwila otshwalweni i-Aware Organisation.

UMnuz Mike Anderson-Reade weKZN Sharks Board, esitatimendeni uthe sekuyisikhathi sokufika kosayidinsi kanti amanethi avimbela oshaka ukuthi beze osebeni asusiwe emabhishi ukuze osayidinsi nezinye izilwane ezihambisana nabo njengamahlengethwa zihambe ngokukhululeka.

Unina walo mfundi, esingeke simdalule ukuze kuvikelwe isithunzi somfundi, uthe usefisa nokuyikhipha ingane esikoleni ngoba iphoxekile kakhulu. Lo wesifazane ubethukuthele eveva ethi impilo yengane yakhe isengcupheni uma kunezigameko ezinje esikoleni.

AZIKATHOLAKALI izihlobo zowesilisa okuthiwa udutshulwe washona ngonogada ngoMsombuluko emuva kokuhlasela umuzi wesalukazi ezokweba eMhlali. Kuthiwa lo msolwa ubevele ehlupha ngokuhlasela izaguga kule ndawo njengoba esigamekweni sokugcina ebebamba inkunzi isalukazi esineminyaka engu-73.
Lo wesilisa imininingwane yakhe engakatholakali njengoba engaziwa, kuthiwa ubesenezinye izigameko abefunelwa zona ezihlobene nokuhlasela izaguga.

data:
MHLELI: KwiSolezwe langoLwesithathu, Juni 20, phansi kwesihloko esithi: IDA ivulele uJuju awokucwasa. Ngithi ake ngibeke owami umbono. UMalema ukhuluma ngezinto ezigqitshiwe. Ngesibindi sakhe ngimushayela ihlombe.
 Mhlawumbe ngaphambi kokuqale bagijimele ezinkantolo ontabakayikhonjwa, kungakuhle baqale babheke ubuqiniso bale nto ekhulunywa nguJuju, bazenzele ucwaningo, ikakhulukazi ngalezi zindawo ezinabomdabu baseNdiya abaqashe abamnyama. Kungaba yisemalolini, emakhishini, hardware, ezitolo zokudla njalo-njalo. Uma beneqiniso bayobuya, bamxhawule uMalema, bathi wayeqinisile.

UNksz Phumzile Langeni, oyiPresidential Investor Emissary, ubekhuluma nosomabhizinisi izolo esithangamini senhlangano iBusiness Leadership South Africa (BLSA) eThekwini. Uqokwe ngo-Ephreli nabanye abathathu ukuthi bazame izindlela zokungenisa ezweni li * $1 billion eminyakeni eyisihlanu. Lesi sitshudeni sesilisa okuthiwa sifunda eDurban University of Technology (DUT), besisuka esitezi sesithupha ophikweni lwaseML Sultan kusona lesi sikhungo. Imininingwane yalesi sigameko nekamufi ibingakatholakali kodwa sekuvele imibiko eminingi ngaye njengoba abanye bekuphika ukuthi ubebaleka.

UMnuz Mbongeni Gcabashe noMnuz Thembinkosi Ndlovu abasebenza enkampanini yonogada iTrinity Protection enenkontileka nabakwaStandard Bank bathi behlelwe yilesi sigameko bephuma kolungisa i-ATM yakwaStandard Bank , enxanxatheleni yezitolo i-Assenwood Centre, eseRichards Bay ngoLwesine ebusuku.

data:
ABAZALI besikole samabanga aphansi eLovu bathi bazoqhubeka nokubhikisha uma uMnyango wezeMfundo ungamxoshi uthishanhloko obambile, abamsola ngokungaphathi kahle isikole.
Kusukela ngoMsombuluko abazali base-Andrew Zondo Primary babhikisha ngaphandle kwesango lesikole, bakhala ngokuthi abamfuni uthisha obambe emuva kokushona kukathishanhloko ngo-Ephreli. Lo thisha wesifazane Isolezwe elinalo igama lakhe, kuthiwa ubevele eyiphini likathishanhloko ongasekho uMnuz Sihiya, igama lakhe elingatholakalanga. Kuthiwa lo thisha ongafunwa uke wabamba ngesikhathi kugula uSihiya, abazali abakhala ngokuthi izinga lokuphasa lehla ngaleso sikhathi. Bakhala nangokuthi kuningi osekushintshile kusukela ebambile, okubalwa nokumisa abahlanza isikole. Kuthiwa abafundi yibona asebehlanza ngisho amathoyilethi esikoleni.

UMnuz Mthembeni Majola oyikhansela le-IFP onguyise kaMzolo ongamzali uthi ubechitha isikhathi esiningi naye njengendodana yakhe. Uthi njengoyise kunzima ukukholwa yonke into eshiwoyo ngaye.

data:
INHLOKO yophiko lezokushushisa uShaun Abrahams usefunge wagomela ukuthi noma ngubani othinteka enkohlakalweni yaseVrede dairy farm uzobhekana nengalo yomthetho.
"Siyaluphenya lolu daba. Uma uphenyo lwethu luholela ekutheni kubekwe abanye abantu amacala noma ikanjani sizokwenza lokho,"kusho u-Abrahams namhlanje ngesikhathi echazela ikomidi lezamaphoyisa ephalamende. Uthe akekho ozophunyuka ngisho noma kwenzakalani.
U-Abrahams ubephendula amalungu ephalamende abeveza ukungenami kwawo ngokusebenza kwalolu phiko lwezokushushisa, akhale nangokuthi lolu phiko kuhlanganisa namaHawks bamandla ekubopheni izisebenzi zikahulumeni kodwa alusondeli kosopolitiki.
Kuke kwaba nezikhalo ngosopolitiki abafana nowayengungqongqoshe wezokuMbhiwa, uMosebenzi Zwane noNdunankulu waseFree State ophinde abe nguNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, u-Ace Magashule, okunenkolelo yokuthi baneqhaza elibalulekile abalidlala enkohlakalweni yaleli famu kodwa akukho okwenzeka kubona.
label: crime, law and justice

Abantu, asebehlala ezindlini zomxhaso, bathe sebekhathele ukubanjiswa udonga ngesinxe-phezelo. Zibalelwa ku-34 izindlu okuthiwa zadilizwa kule ndawo ngesikhathi uNkk Zandile Gumede oseyiMeya yeTheku eseyikhansela. Umphakathi uthe wathembisa ukuthi uzonxeshezelwa kodwa azisafezeki izethembiso.

data:
UGWETSHWE udilikajele olahlwe yicala lokudlwengula umfana oneminyaka eyisikhombisa eNtshanga. Inkantolo yesiFunda eCamperdown igwebe indoda eneminyaka ewu-33 ngecala lokudlwengula.
Kuthiwa lesi sigameko sabikwa esiteshini samaphoyisa eNtshanga ngemuva kokuthi lo mfana edlwenguliwe ngoMeyi 2016. NgoMeyi 2, 2016 umgilwa waficwa wumdlwenguli eyedwa kubo unina engekho, wamgila imikhuba. Umdlwenguli wabanjwa ngamalungu omphakathi esadlwengula umgilwa, abiza amaphoyisa. Kwavulwa icala lokudlwengula esiteshini samaphoyisa eNtshanga. Icala ladluliselwa ophikweni oluphenya amacala odlame lomndeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane namacala ocansi ukuze aliphenye.

UNGQONGQOSHE omusha weMfundo ePhakeme uNkk Naledi Pandor usefunge wagomela ukuthi uzoshanela amabibi enkohlakalo kulo mnyango nasezikhungweni zemfundo kuleli. UNkk Pandor usanda kuqokelwa kulesi sikhundla esuka kwesokuphatha uMnyango wezeSayensi noBuchwepheshe ngesikhathi kushintshwa iKhabhinethi. Lesi sikhundla besiphethwe uDkt Hlengiwe Mkhize ngaphasi kweKhabhinethi kaMnuz Jacob Zuma osedla endala manje.
UNkk Pandor utshele ikomiti lasePhalamende elibhekele imfundo ephakeme ukuthi akezwani nenkohlakalo nokungethembeki.

Uma kukhulunywa ngaleli bandla, kubalwa abesifazane abalinganiselwa ku-100 okuthiwa bayizigqila zocansi kuleli bandla, abantu okuthiwa badayise imizi yabo, yizimoto zabo nokunye ukuze banike abaholi baleli bandla yonke imali abanayo.

data:
UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa uBheki Cele useqinisekise ukuthi kuzobhekwa impilo ephilwa ngamaphoyisa, nanethemba lokuthi lokhu kuzonciphisa ubugebengu. 
UCele, obeyingxenye yethimba longqongqoshe bezokuphepha ebeliphendula imibuzo ephalamende namhlanje, uveze ukuthi akusekho ukujikela emvakwendlu kumele iphenyiwe indlela amaphoyisa aphila ngayo.
Uthe bazolandela umyalelo kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi enza inkulumo ayeyibhekise esizwe, lapho agcizelela khona ukuthi kuzomele kubhekwe nempilo ephilwa abantu ukuthi iyahambisana yini nomholo wabo.Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â 
Umbuzo bewuqhamuka kwiDA ne EFF akade befuna ukwazi ngempilo ephezulu ephilwa yilowo obeyibambela lika khomishana wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke Khomotso Phahlane, bekhala ngokuthi beyisolisa.

data:
I-DA isisole uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngokuyishaya emuva ayishaye phambili ngesinqumo sakhe sokuthi umbuso ukhokhe izindleko zecala likaMnuz Jacob Zuma obengumengameli.
UMnuz James Selfe ucashunwe emaphepheni asenkantolo ekhala ngokuthi kungani uRamaphosa evumela ukukhokhelwa kwezindleko zecala likaZuma kodwa ebe enqabe ukukhokha ezecala lamaphoyisa amahlanu angesikhathi sobandlululo, asolwa ngokusoconga uNksz Nokuthula Simelane.

NgoLwesihlanu oyinhloko yophiko lwezokuShushiswa koMphakathi, uMnuz Shaun Abrahams, umemezele ukuthi uZuma uzoshushiswa ngamacala awu-16 ahlanganisa inkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa nokushushunjiswa kwemali.

UMalema ekhuluma emsakazweni ozinze eGoli, iPower FM noJJ Tabane ongumethuli wohlelo, uthe waze wakhuzwa ngamanye amalungu ale nhlangano ngesikhathi elibeka ngembaba elokuthi uNkk Magwaza-Msibi uholela into engekho ngoba isimo sakhe asisavumi ukuthi asebenze. data:
MHLELI: Kwelakho eliyibeka indaba njengoba injalo lingahlonizi. Konekele, nakhu sibanjwa inkunzi ezweni sibhekile sidlala uMTN.
Kunento eyenzekayo engaqali. Sesikhalile ngayo kaningi, kukhala izifundiswa nabangafundile kodwa akekho ophumela obala kucace ukuthi uMTN uwufakela inselelo noma-ke sibhikishe sigcwale izitaladi.UMTN udlala ngathi. Inkinga uma uthi ubashayela ucingo ngenkinga osuke ubhekene nayo kuvane kudlalwe, ngawe uphicaphicwe kuhle kwengane.Ufike uthenge i-airtime ka-R30, uthi usakhulume imizuzwana uzwe sekukhuluma yomlungu ithi awusenamali. Uma ubathinta bavele belokhu ukukutshela ukuthi cisha iselula yakho imizuzu emihlanu. Uma ube nenhlanhla emva kwalokho iyavela i-airtime yakho kanti uma ube neshobolo isuke isihambe unomphelo.

data:
UMHOLI we-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF), uMnuz Julius Malema, ugxeke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuseka i-ANC yize bengayethembi ukuthi ingabavikela ezintweni ezibathwalisa ubunzima nsuku zonke. Ethula umkhankaso wayo wokhetho eGoli izolo, uMalema uthe kubhekwe ukuthi ukhetho lwangonyaka ozayo lube nezinga eliphezulu lokuncintisana selokhu kwaba nokhetho lwentando yabantu ngo-1994.
UMalema utshele amalungu e-EFF, eStandard Bank Arena, eGoli, ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika baseka i-ANC kodwa bese bethembela kwi-EFF ukuthi ixazulule izinkinga zabo zansuku zonke.

Ithimba labameli bakaDe Lille eliholwa wuqeqwe u-Advocate Dali Mpofu SC, litshele iNkantolo eNkulu yaseCape Town ukuthi iDA ishaye phansi kwashunqa ngeke uDe Lille alale engandlalelwe.

UThompson ujahwe waze wafika esibhedlela yiBMW emhlophe ebihamba abesilisa abebezifihle ubuso befake nama-gloves ngoLwesihlanu ntambama eMhlanga, eThekwini.

data:
IKHUNJULWE njengeqhawe inkakha yomthwebuli waseNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Sam Nzima, oshone ngoMgqibelo. Igama likaNzima laduma umhlaba wonke ngemuva kwesithombe asithatha sikaHector Pieterson ngoJuni 16, ka-1976, ngesikhathi abafundi bakuleli bebhikishela ukuthi kuqedwe umthetho wokufundiswa kwesibhunu kuleli.
Lesi sithombe indlela esaduma ngayo saze sangena ohlwini lwezithombe eziwu-100 ezaguqula umlando ephephabhukwini elihlonishwayo emhlabeni lase-United States, iTime Magazine. Noma sakhombisa isithombe esiyiso ngokwakwenzeka eNingizimu Afrika ngaleso sikhathi, uNzima wazidonsela amanzi ngomsele ngaso. Wadingiswa endaweni ayehlala kuyo eSoweto, wabuyela eLilydale eMpumalanga waphinde wanqatshelwa ukuthi aqhubeke nokuthathe izithombe. Amaphoyisa kahulumeni wobandlululo amsola ngokuveza isithombe esibi ngeNingizimu Afrika.

Wahlala isikhathi esibhedlela uNksz Mthembu ekhishwa isagila njengoba umndeni uthe kwaze kwaphoxeleka ukuba akhishwe nesibeletho...

Ekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba eMeander Manor Hotel, eSalt Rock, izolo ngemuva kwengqungquthela yesifunda iGreater KwaDukuza, uNkk Molewa uthe ubuholi bukazwelonke bufike esifundazweni buzohlola isimo samagatsha nezifunda bathola ukuthi iqembu likulungele ukuthi lingaba nengqungquthela yesifundazwe.

USAFISA ukulanywa yinoma abangaki owesifazane ogane esithenjini eNdwedwe, obegcagca ngosuku olulodwa nomnakwabo.
UNkk Thokozile Lushozi, uKaMakhoba (49), usehlale iminyaka engu-19 noMnuz Sabelo Lushozi (57) abegcagca naye izolo. Ugcagce nomnakwabo uNkk Khanyisile Lushozi, uMaKhumalo (43). UKaMakhoba othe wafika kwaLushozi eneminyaka engu-17, uthe wayevele efisa ukuthola umnakwabo ozomlekelela ngoba miningi imisebenzi emzini wakhe. data:
UMBUZO: Mhla zingu-30 kule nyanga ngizobe ngihlanganisa iminyaka engu-65 kanti kuzobe sekuyisikhathi sokuya empeshenini. Ngizobe ngiqeda iminyaka engu-42 nezinyanga ezinhlanu ngisebenzela uhulumeni. Sonke isikhathi ngisebenza bengikhokha imali nyanga zonke kwi-GEPF - isikhwama sempesheni sabasebenzi bakahulumeni.
Ngishadile kanti umhlomulo wami wempesheni uzoba iholo lesibili. Nginemali engiyilondolozile kodwa ngihlela ukungayikhiphi ingakapheli iminyaka emihlanu emuva kokuya empeshenini. Ngihlela ukusebenza izinsuku ezimbalwa ngesonto, ukuze ngikwazi ukuqhubeka nokuhola. Kubukeka ngingeke ngiwuswele umsebenzi.

Lo wesifazane kuthiwa unele wabona ukuthi isinqandamathe sakhe sihuqa obudala, wathi ngibonwa yini wayigwexa iselula ethutha izithombe nemiyalezo ekufaka kwenye iselula ukuze akucubungule kahle esenesikhathi.

data:
IVULELWE icala lokushaya imeya kaMasipala Umfolozi uMnuz Smangaliso Mgenge okuthiwa ishaye ikhansela leDA bebanga ihholo lomphakathi iHlanganani eJ1 eSikhaleni ngeSonto.
Ngokusho kukaMnuz Sphesihle Magubane oyikhansela le-DA, ingxabano eholele ekushayweni kwakhe iqale ngombango wehholo okuthiwa belizosetshenziselwa umhlangano weqembu. Uthi bahlangabezane nembibizane ngesikhathi bethola ukuthi ne-ANC iyalisebenzisa ihholo. "Ngangena ehholo esasilicelile kumasipala kanti sekukhona uMgenge namanye amalungu e-ANC. Ngazama ukuchaza, bavele balwa nami bangethuka, uMgenge wangiphushela odongeni wangishaya wangidonsela phandle."

data:
SELUZONGENELELWA uMnyango wezeMpilo nowezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal udaba lokuhlala kwezingane ehostela labesifazane, uMasipala weTheku othi lokhu kuphambene nesimo sempilo yazo.
Izolo iNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini itshele abameli bezinhlangothi zombili ezithinteka kulolu daba ukuthi bathintane nale minyango ukuze iphenye ngesimo senhlalo yezingane kuleli ehostela elibizwa ngeThokoza. Umasipala ukhala ngokuthi leli hostela alilungele ukuhlala izingane futhi ligcwele. Abesifazane abahlala kulo, izolo bathe bancamela ukuhlala nezingane zabo ngaphandle kwaleli hostela elisemgwaqweni uYusuf Dadoo eThekwini, uma inkantolo igcina ibalahla.

data: YIZE uhulumeni KwaZulu-Natal usungenelele odabeni lokuzanywa kokususwa kwabadayisi bokufika ezindaweni zabamnyama kodwa kubukeka kuvunguza umoya ongemuhle. Ubuholi beNorth Regional Business Association (Norba), bunqumele ugwayi katiki laba badayisi abangakudabuka eSomali nase-Ethiopia ukuthi baphume kulezi zindawo lungakashayi uLwesine. UDELI MNCWABE uxoxe kabanzi nonobhala weNorba uMnuz Mlungisi Mncube ngalolu daba.

data:
MHLELI: Kunento edumazayo ngoMnyango wezobuholi boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal. Ngabe abanye ondabezitha KwaZulu-Natal bayayibona yini indlela amakhosi aphethwe ngayo? Lo mnyango uxova izindlu zasendlunkulu ngenhloso yokuqhatha ukuze kufezeke izinhloso zawo.
Thina eMabovini eMsinga sinenkinga yokuphoqwa yilo mnyango ukuba siphathwe ngenkani yinkosi engafunwa yisizwe nengafanele ukubusa. Singabantwana baseMabovini sathatha incwadi eyabhalwa yisizwe yokungayethembi inkosi saze sacela owabe engumengameli ngo-2014 ukuba asitholele uNgqongqoshe uNomusa Dube-Ncube nebala sahlangana naye eThekwini.
label: politics

data:
UBHALE incwadi esejele exwayisa abantu ngokushintsha indlela abacabanga ngayo, umbhali waKwaMashu owaboshelwa ukubulala intombi yakhe.
ULungelo Shandu (31) oseneminyaka emibili ephume ngoshwele ejele, ubhale incwadi ethi Success and Wealth Through The Bible. Le ncwadi wayibhala ejele yaphuma ngo-2015 esaboshiwe njengoba ehlale iminyaka emine ngaphakathi.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SEKUNXUSWE abomthetho ukuthi baphenyisise ngokubulawa kwekhansela laseMlaza elisanda kudutshulwa.
IPhini likaSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu, lithe kufanele amaphoyisa aphenye angashiyi lutho ngokubulawa kukaMnuz Sibusiso Maphumulo (32) obeyikhansela laseMlaza ku-ward 88 odutshulwe wafa ngoLwesine ebusuku ephuma emhlanganweni. Kuthiwa uMaphumulo ubezipholele emotweni yakhe yohlobo lweVW Golf 6 ngesikhathi edutshulwa abalisa okuthiwa bebehamba ngemoto yohlobo olufanayo neyakhe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UNQATSHELWE ibheyili owesilisa owabiza uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngegama lokucwasa abantu abamnyama eliqala ngo-K, kwivideo eyasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngenyanga edlule. UMnuz Kessie Nair (60) ubhekene namacala ayisikhombisa okwehlisa isithunzi namabili okukhomoza umuntu ukuba ephule umthetho.
UNair unqatshelwe ibheyili enkantolo yeMantshi eVerulam ngoLwesithathu ekuseni. IMantshi uNcumisa Gcolotela izwakalise ukushaqeka ngokwashiwo uNair kwivideo ayifaka kuFacebook. Ngesikhathi echitha isicelo sakhe sebheyili uGcoboleta uthe esinye sezizathu salokhu ukuthi uhlulekile ukunikeza inkantolo Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â eminye iminingwano yendawo angahlala kuyo ngaphandle kwekamfowabo oziqhelelanisile naye.

data:
SIYAQHUBEKA nokushuba isimo kwiDemocratic Allaince kulandela imibiko yokuthi uNkk Patricia De Lille angase ashaye ungqimphotho odabeni lokusula njengeMeya yaseCape Town.
NgoLwesine ekuseni ngesikhathi kuhlangene umkhandlu, uSotswebhu omkhulu weDA eKapa, uMnuz Shaun August, uthuse abaningi ememezela ukuthi uyasula kulesi sikhundla futhi uyasula njengelungu leDA ekhala ngokucwaswa kuleli qembu.

data:
KULINDELEKE ukuthi afake isicelo sebheyili ngesonto elizayo amaphoyisa amabili nonogada abasolwa ngokuthumba usomabhizinisi nokusolwa ukuthi kuthinteka amabhizinisi nodaba lwamathenda ngokunyamalala kwakhe.
UMnuz Sikhumbuzo Mjwara (41) ulahleke ekupheleni kuka-Agasti nonyaka kade eseNkantolo yaseVerulam ehamba icala lombango phakathi kwakhe nozakwabo ababanga naye ubunikazi bendawo ephambili yokudla eMhlanga, iBarrio. Umndeni wakhe uveze ukuthi wazi ukuthi uzakwabo wakokotela amaphepha amenza kube nguyena ophethe le ndawo yokudla eseMhlanga ekubeni bengalihlanganisele ibhizinisi.

data:

UMNDENI wakwaGupta osolwa ngokuba obhongoza ekulawulweni kombuso yidlanzana uthi uzimisele ukugeza igama lawo kodwa hhayi manje.
Lo mndeni kubikwa ukuthi uyiqaphe ngeso lokhozi ikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana eqhubekayo kuleli. Ijaji uRaymond Zondi lasichitha isicelo samalungu alo mndeni asolwayo sokuthi afakaze nge-video eseDubai. data:
ABANTU bakuleli sebezwakalise ukushaqeka ngendlela ummeli womfundisi obhekene namacala okudlwengula nokushushumbisa abantu besifazane ebandleni lakhe ahlaba ngayo ngemibuzo omunye wofakazi.

UMfundisi Timothy Omotoso ubhekene noxhaxha lwamacala athinta ukudlwengula nokushushumbisa abesifazane abangaphezulu kuka 30 abanye babo abebehlala emzini wakhe oseMhlanga, eThekwini. Usolwa nabesifazane abesibili oNksz Lusanda Sulan noNksz Zukiswa Sitho abasolwa ngokuba abasizi bakhe. 



   UMfundisi Timothy Omotoso, uNksz Lusanda Sulan noNksz Zukiswa Sitho eNkantolo eNkulu ePort Elizabeth. Isithombe: Raahil Sain / ANA
  

Oyedwa walaba besifazane, uNksz Cheryl Zondi (22), ungufakazi wokuqala kuleli cala elivezwa bukhoma kwithelevishini. 

UNksz Zondi ukhethe ukuphumela obala ngoba uthe ufuna umhlaba wazi ukuthi uwumuntu onjani uMfundisi Omotoso weJesus Dominion International Church. 
Kusukela ngoMsombuluko uNksz Zondi uhlatshwa ngemibuzo ummeli ka-Omotoso uMnuz Peter Daubermann. Indlela lo mmeli abeka ngayo imibuzo yakhe isithole ukugxekwa okukhulu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba abantu abaningi sebezwakalise ukuzwelana noNksz Zondi. Phakathi kwemibuzo eshaqe abaningi ummeli ubuze uNksz Zondi ukuthi mude kangakanani umphambili ka-Omotoso. 

Nanka amazwibela okuphawula kwabantu kuTwitter ngaphansi kwesihloko esitho #OmotosoTrial:
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IFUNGA iyagomela iDA ithi izoya ngenkani eziteshini zamaphoyisa iyohlola ukusebenza kwazo nakuba sekuphume incwadi evimba amaqembu ezepolitiki ukuba agasele eziteshini zaKwaZulu-Natal engacelile.
IBamba likaKhomishana wamaphoyisa eKZN, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, lisanda kukhipha incwadi evuthayo ethi akekho usopolitiki ovunyelwe ukufuhleleka esiteshini engacelanga, afike apekequle afune namabhuku ezimali. Lokhu kungenxa yokugasela kweDA eziteshini ezehlukene ithi izohlola isimo.
label: politics

data:
USOMABHIZINISI waseShowe, uMnuz Brayce Mthimkhulu obezibiza ngeNgonyama yamaHlubi, ulahlwe yicala eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngoLwesihlanu wayalalelwa ukuthi angaphinde azibize ngeNgonyama futhi akhokhe nezindleko zecala.
UMthimkhulu ubefakwe enkantolo wuMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, ngemuva kwesikhalo esifakwe yiNdlunkulu yamaHlubi kuwona. INdlunkulu yamaHlubi yafaka isikhalo ngoMthimkhulu emnyangweni oqale wamyalela ukuthi angazibizi ngeNgonyama kodwa waqhubeka. UMthimkhulu ubebangisa iNgonyama yamaHlubi ebusayo, iNkosi Muziwenkosi kaLangalibalele Radebe eseMtshezi.
label: politics

data:
INKAKHA yomlingisi, uRapulana Seiphemo, odume ngelika Tau Mogale okuyindawo ayilingisa kwiGenerations: The Legacy, uvele kafushane enkantolo yamacala ezimali ngoLwesine ekuseni ngezinsolo zokungayikhokhi intela.
Umbuso usola uSeiphemo ngokungayikhokhi imali yentela kusukela ngonyaka ka-2010 kuya ku-2013. AbeSouth African Revenue Services bathi lo mlingisi ukweleta imali engaphezulu kukaR48 000. 
Icala lihlehliselwe uNovemba 13 njengoba abameli bakhe becele ukunikezwa isikhathi sokuthi bake baxhumane nabakwaSARS bahlele ukulungisa lolu daba. 
USeiphemo waziswe ukuthi lizoqhubeka leli cala uma engaxhumani nabakwaSARS. 
Abameli bakhe baxolisile bathi usezame kaningi ukuxhumana nabakwaSARS kwangaphumelela. 
Ngesikhathi inkantolo isahleli lo mlingisi ubebukeka ekhululekile. 
Ubephelezelwa uzakwabo alingisa naye kwiGenerations, uZoe Mthiyane, olingisa indawo kaZitha othandana noTau kulo mdlalo. 
Nyakenye ziqinisekisiwe izindaba zokuthi sebeyathandana laba.
Lo mlingisi uvela enkantolo ngalolu daba nje, abanye osaziwayo okubalwa kubo umethuli wezinhlelo uBonang Matheba, nomdlali webhola uTeko Modise nabo basobishini nabaqoqi bentela kuleli njengoba nabo bebengayikhokhi intela.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
UKUGEMBULA, ukwehlukana kwenkolo kungezinye zezinto ezidala udlame olugcina luholele ekutheni kuliwe ezikoleni.
 UDkt Zithobile Mkhize-Ngidi oyiphini likathishanhloko eVikingozi High, ngaphandle kwaKwaMakhutha, osanda kuthola iziqu zePhD kwiPublic Administration, egxile kwiPeace Studies, eDurban University of Technology (DUT), izolo ubenesigcawu sokucobelelana ngolwazi sokuhlomisa ezinye izitshudeni ebenza iziqu zePhD.

data:
UTHUKE kwaphela nasozwaneni unina womfana (15) waseManenberg ezwa ngomdlalo omusha obizwa nge- Treintjie (isitimela), lapho abafana abancane bebukiswa khona izithombe zocansi ngaphambi kokudlwengulwa ngabafana abadala. 
Lo wesifazane oneminyaka engu-32 uthe uthole iqiniso ngalo mdlalo ngemuva kokuba indodana yakhe eneminyaka eyisikhombisa imtshele ukuthi inukubezwe ngokocansi ngabafana emgwaqweni ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUBULAWE amadoda amabili eClermont, eThekwini abesolwa ngokubulala onogada ababili eMoroka eGoli, kule nyanga okusabalale ivideo yawo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ebulawa.
Kuthiwa laba basolwa okuvela ukuthi ngabaseNkandla, baficwe emjondolo thizeni ngamaphoyisa abelandela umkhondo wabo, oyedwa wabo kuthiwa uvulele ngenhlamvu ebhekise emaphoyiseni, namaphoyisa aphendula ngezulu lezandla bashonela khona lapho.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
AKAKATHATHI sinqumo ngekusasa lakhe uNkk Patricia De Lille ngoLwesithathu omemezele ukuthi uzosigcina isinqumo sakhe sokusula njengeMeya yaseKapa.
UDe Lille umemezele lezi zindaba engaphandle kweNkantolo eNkulu yaseWesterm Cape lapho afake khona isicelo sokuthi kuchithwe imibiko emibili eyenziwa abameli beBowman Gilfillan ebiphenya ngendlela abephethe ngayo umasipala.
label: politics

data:
UPHELE sekumuncu umshado obuseNseleni ngeSonto kushona umngani wabebeshada obeyolanda abanye esikhumulweni sezindiza iKing Shaka International eThekwini.
UMnuz Mpilo Ndlazi (30), waseRichards Bay, obezoshadelwa ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo, ushone ngesikhathi imoto abehamba ngayo ishayisana nenye okuthiwa ngeyomndeni waseSwazini. Ingozi yenzeke emgwaqweni uN2 eMthunzini, kwashona abanye abathathu abebesemotweni yaseSwazini okushaye isikhathi sokuloba ingakatholakali imininingwane yabo.
label: society

data:
I-DA ivulele uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wabesiFazane, uNksz Bathabile Dlamini, icala lokuqamba amanga ebe afunga wagomela ukuthi uzokhuluma iqiniso lodwa.
Izolo, uNkk Bridget Masango weDA, uthe bavulele uNksz Dlamini icala esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseGoli emuva kokuthi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ithe izodlulisela umbiko kwiJaji uBernard Ngoepe elisophikweni lwezokushushisa ukuze lunqume ukuthi uzoshushiswa yini uNksz Dlamini ngokuqamba amanga efungile.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
AKALIBONI iphutha elenzeke emshadweni wakhe owesilisa okusabalale i-video yakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ephikisa izifungo zomfundisi.
UMnuz Linda Mthethwa obeshadelwa uNkk Tiny Mthethwa eNtuzuma ngoMgqibelo, uthe akonakalanga lutho emshadweni wakhe ngoba ubengeke avume ukufunga amanga. Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi selokhu kusabalele le video umkakhe udinga ngisho ukwelulekwa ngokomqondo ngendlela aphatheke kabi ngayo ngokushiwo ngabantu ngabo.

data:
USELE nemibuzo ngelungu lawo elishonele ejele umndeni waseMgungundlovu, othi awanelisekile ngencazelo ngokuholele ekushoneni kwalo.
Umndeni kaThembinkosi Nyathi (25) waseMpolweni, uthe umngcwabe ungakhululekile ngoba akucaci ukuthi wabulawa yini ejele. Uninalume kamufi uMnuz Sakhephi Nyathi, uthe wayegwetshwe ngo-2013 ngecala lokushaya nokugqekeza kanti bese kusele kancane aphume ejele. Uthe waqala waboshelwa eNew Prison kodwa ushonele eSevontein.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ILALISWE esibhedlela indoda yaseMatikwe, eNanda, okuthiwa ibhunyelwe yiphoyisa ngophethroli layishisa ngaphambi kokuthi lishise nendlu yakubo entathakusa yangeSonto.
Umndeni kaMnuz Wonder Zwane (28) uthe akakwazi ngisho ukuziyela ethoyilethi ngenxa yokushiswa yiphoyisa ebelimsola ngokweba imali yentombi yalo. Unina kaZwane, uNksz Gugu Zwane, uthe iphoyisa elisolwayo lijwayele kaZwane ngoba likhanda khona izimoto. Nentombi yalo iyavakasha kuzophuzwa futhi abakaze baxabane nephoyisa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UNGQONGQOSHE woMnyango wezaseKhaya kuleli, uMnuz Malusi Gigaba ubizelwe ukuba azochaza ukuthi kungani umnyango wakhe wavumela isamba sikaR67 million osikweleta inkampani engenamali yezobuchwepheshe, sikhuphukele kuR800 million.
Ngokwabaphenyi, lesi samba esikweletwa iDouble Ring Trading sinyuke kakhulu ngemuva kombango ophakathi kwayo noMnyango wezaseKhaya ngo-2009, njengoba manje sesifinyelele kuR794 million.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa umise emsebenzini iPhini loMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi u-Adv Nomgcobo Jiba no-Adv Lawrence Mrwebi onguMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi ngamacala athinta imali, ukuze kuphenywe ukuthi bakufanele yini ukuba kulezi zikhundla zabo.
URamaphosa umemezele lezi zindaba izolo ntambama esho nokuthi uphenyo lokuthi o-Adv Jiba noMrwebi bakufanele yini ukuba sezikhundleni zabo luzophathwa yiJaji leNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo eselathatha umhlalaphansi uNkk Yvonne Mokgoro.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UFUNA ahoxiswe amacala abekwe wona umfundisi osolwa ngezenzo zokuhlukumeza amantombazane ebandla lakhe nokushushumbisa abantu, uPastor Tim Omotoso, odabuka eNigeria. 
Icala lika-Omotoso nabesifazane ababili asolwa nabo liyaqhubeka njengamanje eNkantolo eNkulu yasePort Elizabeth. U-Omotoso weJesus Dominion International Church ezinze eThekwini, ubhekene namacala angaphezulu kuka-60, okubalwa kuwo ukuphula umthetho i-Sexual Offences Act, okukhona phakathi kwawo amabili okudlwengula. Abesifazane asolwa nabo baboshwa ngoNovemba nyakenye kanti bangaphandle ngebheyili kaR2 000. 
U-Omotoso uboshwe oKlebe esikhumulweni sezindiza iPort Elizabeth International Airport ngo-Ephreli ngonyaka odlule. Abameli bakhe bazise inkantolo ukuthi uyawachitha onke amacala abhekene nawo.
Baveze nokuthi abaneme ngokuthi ubufakazi obuningi obethulelwe inkantolo abuvezi ukuthi asolwa ngakho u-Omotoso wakwenza ngaluphi usuku. Baphinde bacela nokuthi uJaji Mandela Makaula ukuthi angabe esaluhlehlisa lolu daba ngoba umsolwa usehlale ejele unyaka wonke. 
Ngaphandle kwenkantolo abalandeli balo mfundisi bebeze ngobuningi bezomeseka bethi umsulwa. 

UMakaula uthe uzokhipha isinqumo ngo 3 ntambama. 

- Udaba lusaqhubeka.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUZOQHUBEKA ngo-Okthoba 22 ukuqulwa kwamacala abhekene noMfundisi Timothy Omotoso osolwa ngokudlwengula nokushushumbisa abesifazane.
Izolo ufakazi wokuqala kuleli cala, uNksz Cheryl Zondi, ubephekwa ngemibuzo abammeli baka-Omotoso webandla iJesus Dominion International Church. UNksz Zondi (22) ungomunye wabesifazane ababalelwa kwabangaphezulu kuka 30 abasola umfundisi ngokubanukubeza ngokocansi kusuka ngo-2009 kuya ku-2017 okuwunyaka aboshwa ngawo esikhumulweni sezindiza ePort Elizabeth.

data:
BAPHUME becijeke kuyo yonke imikhakha abesifazane ohlelweni lwaminyaka yonke olwenziwa yi-Independent Institute of Education (IIE) Varsity College, oluhlose ukubathuthukisa kwezomnotho nangokomqondo.
Babheme bakholwa abebehambele umcimbi, iLadies to Legends, olwenziwe yilesi sikhungo eThekwini ngaleli sonto. Lo mcimbi waminyaka yonke uhambisana nenkolelo yokuthi kuhlomula sonke isizwe uma kuqeqeshwa kahle ingane yentombazane.

data:
USINDE kukubi uthisha wesikole samabanga aphansi eNquthu ngesikhathi ehlaselwa abazali bengane ayifundisayo abamfice efundisa bamshaya ngenduku waba mabokoboko.
Lesi sigameko senzeke esikoleni iLuvisi Primary, okwahlaselwa kuso kwabulawa umfundi nephini likathishomkhulu, uMnuz Vusi Ntombela ngo-2015, owayebuye abe nguSomlomo kuMasipala iNquthu owadutshulwa ngentululwane yezinhlamvu kwathinteka nabafundi omunye washona.

data:
BUCHITHEKE bugayiwe engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi be-IFP esiyingini saseNdumeni ngesikhathi kulwa izithunywa zibanga ukuvunyelwa kwababengamalungu eNFP nakaKhongolose ukuba bangenele izikhundla zokuhola iqembu.
Lokhu kwenzeke ngeSonto ntambama kwaze kwaphoqeleka ukuthi ingqungquthela ebisehholo eDundee ihlehle ngenxa yokuthi kuhluleke ngisho ubuholi buzama ukudambisa isimo kodwa kwabanhlanga zimuka nomoya.

data:
LIGCINE lifezekile iphupho lokuvulwa kwesikole esinobuchwepheshe besimanje kodwa esisemakhaya iMandla Mthethwa School of Excellence esiseNdumo, esifundeni uMkhanyakude, enyakatho yeKwaZulu-Natal.
Umqondo wokusungula lesi sikole esiqanjwe ngesishoshovu esaboshwa iminyaka ejele iRobben Island, uMnuz Mandla Mthethwa, waqhamuka nowayenguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo noNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Senzo Mchunu. UMchunu uyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC aphinde abe yilungu lekomiti elibheka ukusebenza kwansuku zonke lale nhlangano.

data:
MHLELLI: Ngiphawula ngodaba lwezimali eziqoqwa emarenke, abafowethu nodade abahweba embonini yezokuthutha umphakathi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi bakhulume ngazwi linye kubona bonke ososeshini kuqedwe izimali eziqoqwa esandleni umuntu oyedwa.
Siyazi ukuthi kunezindleko ezikhokhelwayo kasoseshini bonke kunabasebenzi abaqashiwe wososeshini. Akwenziwe izinhlelo imali ikhokhwe ebhange kwi-akhawunti kososeshini. Uma usoseshini ungenayo i-akhawunti, ayivulwe ilabo abangamalungu abasebuholini benhlangano. Le nto yokuqoqwa kwezimali emarenke isikhiphe imiphefumulo eminingi kakhulu.

data:
SIZAQHUBEKA nokushuba isimo sezomnotho kubashayeli bezimoto nabathengi kuleli njengoba inhlangano yongoti kwezezimoto i-Automobile Association of South Africa (AA) iqinisekise ukuthi uzophinde unyuke uphethroli kule nyanga. 
I-AA iveze ukuthi uphethroli kulindeleke ukuthi unyuke ngoR1.01 ilitha, elika dizili lizonyuka ngoR1.24. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ilitha likaphethroli selizobiza uR17.

data:
KUZOQEDWA uhlelo lokuhambisela umphakathi waseMsinga amanzi ngamaloli ngenxa yokunyuka ngamandla kukaphethroli. Umasipala uthathe isinqumo sokuba kugxilwe ekufakweni amanzi adonswa phansi nasemifuleni ngamapayipi ukuze wonge imali.
Lokhu kuvezwe iMeya yaseMsinga uNkk Buyiswa Ngcobo ephawula ngohlelo oluqhubekayo lokufakelwa kwamanzi ezigodini ezahlukene zaseMsinga oluqalwe ngesonto eledlule, oluphethwe uMasipala wesiFunda uMzinyathi.
label: society

data:
SIYAKHULA isibalo sabantu abaququdwa yindlala. Izibalo zango-2016 zeStatistics SA, ezicubungula ngemindeni, iGeneral Household Survey, zikhombisa ukuthi abantu abangu-7.4 million babulawa yindlala kanti manje kulinganiselwa ukuthi lesi sibalo sesicishe siphindaphindeke kabili.
Yize izibalo zikhomba lokhu kuyavela ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isemazweni ayishumi okuthiwa ayakwazi ukukhiqiza ukudla okwanele kodwa lokho kudla akufinyeleli kubo bonke abantu ngoba abanye abanayo imali eyenele yokukuthenga. Lezi zibalo ziholela ekutheni uhulumeni asungule izinhlelo eziningi ezizosiza ekutheni abantu abangakwazi ukuzikhiqizela ukudla abazokudla bathole izinsiza ukuze bakukhiqizele imindeni.
label: society

data:
I-EFF ithi usheshe waxolisa uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali kuleli, uMnuz Nhlanhla Nene, ngemihlangano yakhe nomndeni wakwaGupta ngoba kuningi esazokwenekela izwe okungamahlazo akhe enkohlakalo.
Lokhu kudalulwe yiPhini likaMengameli wale nhlangano uMnuz Floyd Shivhambu. Lo mholi ubekhuluma ngesikhathi evula ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi KwaZulu-Natal, ebiseScottsville, eMgungundlovu, izolo ezosongwa namuhla.
label: politics

data:
INDODA yaseMaoti, eNanda, esolwa ngokudlwengula iphindelele abesifazane, itshele iNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini, izolo ukuthi ayisazi isibalo sabesifazane eyalala nabo, ababehluleka ukuyikhokhela imali yayo njengoba bengaphezu kuka-55 abesifazane eyayibagada bedayisa umzimba.
UMnuz Amos Ganyeni Ngobeni (29) uqhubekile nokufakaza izolo esephonswa imibuzo umshushini wecala, u-Advocate Noxolo Dube.

data:
BUBUYISELWE ngo-elethu ezikhundleni ubuholi be-ANCYL esifundeni iTheku ngemuva kokukhethwa ngaphandle kokuphonselwa inselelo engqungqutheleni ebisenkundleni yezemidlalo iMoses Mabhida.
Bekuvele kulindelekile ukuthi uMnuz Thembo Ntuli ophinde wakhethwa waba uSihlalo noMnuz Thinta Cibane naye ophinde wakhethwa waba uNobhala ukuba babuye. Amalungu alolu phiko eThekwini kade ehlale elibeke ngembaba elokuthi bawubuholi obubuyayo.
label: politics

data:
LIVELE eNkantolo yeMantshi oPhongolo iphoyisa lesiteshi saseNgwavuma elisolwa ngokudubula libulale umlisa ebelimsola ngokupaka kabi imoto emgwaqweni.
UContsable Mxolisi Donda (30) usezikhindini ngecala lokufa kukaMnuz Sifiso Sithole (24) okuthiwa ubezoqala ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wobuphoyisa naye. Kuthiwa leli phoyisa elidume ngesihluku endaweni, lahilizisana nomufi baze bashova iqupha isikhathi eside kubuka abantu. Kuthe uma umsolwa ebona ukuthi sengathi akaliboni elidlalayo ngamankomane walanda isibhamu somsebenzi emotweni wadubula umufi emphindelela washona. Kuthiwa ababekhona bathi umufi wadutshulwa ngemuva ekhanda esezama ukubaleka ebona ukuthi kulandwa isibhamu. Ngesikhathi ecela ibheyili enkantolo ubalule ukuthi unezingane azondlayo futhi izindleko zekhaya zibheke yena, wacela inkantolo ukuthi imdedele ukuze ayohlukanisa unyaka nezingane zakhe. Icala lihlehliselwe uLwesithathu lapho okulindeleke ukuthi kukhishwe khona isinqumo ngesicelo sebheyili yomsolwa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUQHUME isililo nomthandazo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngemuva kokuphikiswa kwesicelo sebheyili sikamfundisi weTowers of Faith Ministries International, uMphostoli Mxolisi Striker Shange.
Lo mfundisi uzowudlela ejele eWestville uKhisimusi njengoba eyoze abuyele enkantolo ngoJanuwari 21 ngonyaka ozayo. UShange ubhekene namacala amane, okungamabili okudlwengula, elilodwa lokuthumba nelinye lokuhlukumeza ngokocansi amantombazane aneminyaka aphakathi kuka-14 no-18. Lawa macala kuthiwa uShange wawenza eLeisure Palace eNewlands West kusukela ngo-2014 kuya kuNovemba 12, 2018.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IZIGAMEKO zokugwazana kwabafundi esikoleni samabanga aphezulu KwaMakhutha zenze ukuthi uvalwe khona umkhankaso wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane izolo.
Umcimbi wokuvala imigubho yalo mkhankaso wenziwe yiMeya yeTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, okhale ngezigameko ezimbi ezenzeke kule ndawo. Yize singashiwongo ngegama isikole kodwa yiseMasakhane High lapho kuke kwagwazana abafundi ababili bashona ngo-Agasti. Imeya iveze izibalo zezigameko ezahlukene ezibikwe esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaMakhutha kusukela ngoSepthemba, ezinye zazo ezinyukile. Ithe ikhethe ukuvala umkhankaso KwaMakhutha ukukhuza umhlola wezigameko ezingezinhle. UNkk Gumede uqale waveza izibalo zokudlwengulwa ezibikwe esiteshini samaphoyisa, athe ngoSeptemba bayisihlanu abadlwenguliwe, ngo-Okthoba bayisishiyagalombili kwathi ngoNovemba balishumi.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUSOLWA ubudedengu babasebenzi bakaMasipala baseZululand, ophikweni lwamanzi ngokushona kwengane yaseNcotshane oPhongolo, eminze emgodini obumbelwe ukulungisa ipayipi.
ULuyanda Gumede (4) kuthiwa ubedlala nabanye ontanga ngoMsombuluko emini ngesikhathi ephonseka kulo mgodi obusugcwele amanzi emvula. Lesi sigameko sicasule umphakathi osola ukuthi ukungavalwa komgodi yikona okwenze ingane iphonseke futhi kusazodaleka omunye umonakalo.

data:
IGAMA lobenguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma selivele ohlwini lwamagama abantu abaphakanyiselwe ukuthi bajutshwe ePhalamende emuva kokhetho luka zwelonke oluzoba ngonyaka ozayo.
Igama lakhe kuvele ukuthi lingunombolo 74 emagameni angu-833 aphakanyiselwe ukuya ePhalamende. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi uZuma uma evuma ukuthunywa ePhalamende kuyohoxiswa yonke imihlomulo yakhe yokuthi wayengumengameli bese ehola imali yokuba yilungu lePhalamende. Uyokwephucwa abaqaphi nemali ayiholayo njengoba esehleli ekhaya.

data:
UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, uMnuz Bheki Cele uthe umnyango wakhe uzosebenzisa uR2 billion ukuholela amaphoyisa akhushulwe ezikhundleni, eminyakeni emithathu ezayo. Izolo, iPolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) neSouth African Police Union (Sapu) bathe kufanele anconywe uCele ngesenzo sakhe ngoba sekuphele isikhathi eside amaphoyisa engakhushulwa.
Izolo uCele utshele izintatheli ukuthi awu-68 000 amaphoyisa akhushulelwe izikhundla kulo nyaka. Uthe kuzophela uMashi wonyaka ozayo sekukhushulwe amanye awu-28 000.

data:
BEKUNGUNYAKA onzima embuthweni wamaphoyisa njengoba kube nezigameko ezishaqisayo lapho kubulawe khona amaphoyisa, okubalwa nesokuqothwa kwamaphoyisa esiteshini eNgcobo, e-Eastern Cape, adutshulwa.
Kulesi sigameko esenzeke ngo-Febhuwari nonyaka kwashona amaphoyisa amahlanu nesosha elilodwa. Lesi sigameko sathusa wonke umuntu kuleli ngoba lawa maphoyisa ahlaselwa esesiteshini sawo futhi kwagcina ngokuthi kuboshwe abasolwa kwelinye lamabandla akule ndawo, iMancoba Seven Angels.

UMnuz Dumisani Cebekhulu (26) noNtuthuko Mkhwanazi (24) bebevele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMpangeni kuleli ngecala lokudubula babulale uMnuz Xolani Nkosi owayegada uMchunu. Igama leNkantolo eNkulu bazolazi uma sebezotshelwa ngosuku lwabo lwasenkantolo.

Lokhu kushiwo umengameli wenhlangano yabesifazane abangabalimi, iWomen in Agriculture and Rural Development (Ward), uNksz Maureen Magubane, ngesikhathi kunesigcawu sabesifazane sokubonisana ngezindlela ezingasetshenziswa ukuze abesifazane bathole umhlaba, ebesiseThekwini, izolo.

IMEYA yoMkhandlu weTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede ithi imibiko yabezindaba mayelana nokuthi izoboshwa maduze ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa wumkhankaso wokuyinyundela nokungcolisa igama layo.
Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba, uNkk Gumede uthe le mibiko ikhishwe ngesikhathi lapho kuqhubeka khona uhlelo lokuhlanganiswa kohlu lwamagama abaholi abangathunywa ezikhundleni nangesikhathi somkhankaso wokhetho lwangonyaka ozayo.

I-Independent Communication Authority of South Africa (Icasa) iyalele izinkampani zokuxhumana ukuthi zazise amakhasimende azo ngokusebenza kwe-data futhi kube yiwona azinika igunya lokuthi zithathe imali uma sekuphele i-data.

data:
SIGCINE sifinyelele ku-106 isibalo sezingane ezizalwe ezibhedlela ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal ngoKhisimusi, eziningi eziphume nezitifiketi zokuzalwa.
UDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo onguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo esifundazweni ngoKhisimusi uvakashele isibhedlela ePrince Mshiyeni naseRK Khan ukuyonika izipho omama ababelethile. Ubehambisana noNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezaseKhaya uDkt Siyabonga Cwele osizane nabasebenzi bomnyango ukukhipha izitifiketi neMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede. UDhlomo ukhale ngokuthi isayinkinga indaba yokukhulelwa kwezingane njengoba bekukhona eneminyaka engu-16 komama ababelethe ngoKhisimusi.
label: society

data:
UPHIKO lwentsha iYoung Communist League of South Africa (YCL) selunqumele ugwayi katiki isiteshi somphakathi Izwi Lomzansi 98.0 FM ukuba lubuyisele emoyeni ngokushesha umsakazi okusolwa ukuthi umiselwe ukufequza umfana aze achame. UNosipho Ngubane usebhuquza ekhaya ngemuva kokuvela kwe-video yakhe efequza omunye umfana.
I-YCL ithe uma iZwi LoMzansi lingambuyisi uNosipho lizozifaka enkingeni ngoba ngeke yona ithule isonge izandla ngalolu daba, izolusukumela.

data:

Lokhu kushiwo uSenior Superintendent Parboo Sewpersard okhulumela amaphoyisa kuMasipala weTheku, othe bayaqhubeka nezivimbamgwaqo nsuku zonke. Uthe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi abantu babonakala bengawuhloniphi umthetho njengoba beqhubeka nokwenza amacala phezu kokuba amaphoyisa etshalwe nxazonke. Kwababoshwe ngempelasonto uSewpersad uthe kubalwa nowesilisa ogwaze abesifazane ababili ngasebhishi eBlue Lagoon.

Abafundi baseMashiyamahle High eNdwedwe bathi abanalo igugu lemiphumela yokuchibiyela kwabo kwango-2015, umnyango oyikhiphe ngoMsombuluko ngoba sebelahlekelwe yisikhathi esiningi lolu daba lusenkantolo. Bathi imiphumela yabo bafisa ukuyithola kummeli wabo okunguye abamqoka ukuthi abamele kulolu daba hhayi emnyangweni.

data:
KUCHAZWE njengokuwa kwensika ukudlula emhlabeni kwesishoshovu se-ANC, uMnuz Mendi Msimang, odlule emhlabeni izolo ngemuva kokugula isikhathi eside.
UMsimang, owayeyiHigh Commissioner yase-United Kingdom (UK), uchazwe njengengqalabutho eyalwela amalungelo abantu. Ungumyeni kaDkt Manto Tshabalala-Msimang, owayenguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo owadlula emhlabeni ngo-2009. UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa udlulise amazwi endunduzo emndenini, kubangani, izihlobo nakubantu bakuleli ngokudlula emhlabeni kwalesi sishoshovu esamela i-ANC eLondon ngo-1960.

data:
BASEBENZA bejeqeza abashayeli bezimoto zakwa-Uber noTaxify KwaMashu, abakhala ngokusatshiswa ngabashayeli bamatekisi.
NgoLwesibili laba bashayeli baqhinqe esiteshini samaphoyisa kwa-E KwaMashu befuna ukuvikelwa kulezi zigameko zokusatshiswa, njengoba kuthiwa ezinye izimoto zabo sezilinyaziwe. Omunye wabashayeli be-Uber ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe akusasebenzeki ngoba bayesaba. Uthe sekunamasonto amabili kusatshiswa abashayeli bezimoto zakwa-Uber nakwaTaxify KwaMashu, eNtuzuma naseNanda. Uthe lo mkhuba usungenelele ngisho eNewlands.

NgoLwesithathu u-Adv Thabani Masuku obemele uZuma utshele amajaji ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ubengakashintshi ekutheni izindleko zecala zikhokhelwe wuhulumeni njengoba uZuma wasayina isivumelwano nalowo owayenguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Thabo Mbeki ukuthi kube wuhulumeni okhokhayo.

Ihhovisi likazwelonke emaphoyiseni sekuphele isonto lizama ukuthola ulwazi emaphoyiseni ase-Eastern Cape ngokubulawa kukaMnuz Bonginkosi Shoyisa (45), isidumbu sakhe esatholwa endlini abegcinwe kuyo ePort Elizabeth sesonakele, ekopolotwe amehlo wathelwa nge-acid.

data:
UNGENE ehlazweni owayengumgadli weKaizer Chiefs amaphoyisa ethola ukuthi umuzi wakhe usetshenziswa njengesidleke sokukhiqizia izidakamizwa eHillside, eGoli.
 
NgokweSowetan, amaphoyisa agasele ekhaya lale nkakha ngoLwesithathu ekuseni batholwa ukuthi kunegumbi obekukhiqizelwa kulo imandrax. 

Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uColonel Brenda Muridili uziqinisekisile izindaba zokuboshwa kowayengumgadli weKaizer Chiefs. Uthe kuboshwe nabanye abathathu ababanjwe kuwo lo muzi. 

Abasolwa amagama abo awakadalulwa njengoba bengakaveli enkantolo. 

Esitatimendeni, obambe izintambo kwesokuba nguKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uLietenant General Stefan Schutte ushaye amaphoyisa ihlombe ngokubambisana emzamweni yokwehlisa isihlava sokusatshalaliswa kwezidakamizwa kuleli. 

Abasolwa kulindeke ukuthi bavele enkantolo namhlanje.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
OYINHLOKO yehhovisi likaMengameli we-ANC, uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, uthi bazoziphendulela ezinsolweni ezenziwa nge-ANC kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana ephethwe yiJaji Raymond Zondo.
Izolo uKodwa ubekule khomishini obekufakaza kuyo owayenguNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uNksz Barbara Hogan, uthe i-ANC yabhalela ikhomishini icela ukwenza izethulo zayo, isalindile ukunikwa lelo thuba uma selivelile.

data:
ZIKHIHLA esikaNandi izakhamuzi zaseNkunzi, eMnambithi, ezifelwe yizinkomo ezidle ushevu okuthiwa uthelwe wumuntu ongaziwa edlelweni zasala ziqumbile. Zibalelwa ku-20 sezizonke izinkomo ezifile nembuzi nayo okuthiwa ikhothe endaweni efanayo yaqumba.
Abanikazi bazo bathi bafe olwembiza ngokufelwa yizinkomo, bathi basazibuza ukuthi ubebazondeni othele ushevu edlelweni ngoba le nto iyaqala ukwenzeka.

data:
LUYASHUBA udaba lukasomabhizinisi waseNtuzuma odilizelwe isitolo ngabasebenzi bakaMasipala weTheku namaphoyisa awo ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule, osethole ummeli ozolungisa udaba lwakhe, wavula necala.
UMnuz Nduduzo Magwaza (37) obengumnikazi weYoung Minds Tuck Shop, usamile ekutheni isitolo sakhe besisebenza ngokusemthethweni kodwa yilungu elithize lomphakathi elibikele uMasipala amanga ngaye. UMagwaza ubesedayise iminyaka engu-11 kulesi sitolo esiyikhonteyna. Uthe ufuna umasipala umbuyisele endaweni yakhe futhi umkhokhele nezimpahla ezicekelwe phansi ngesikhathi edilizelwa isitolo. Kuthiwa abasebenzi bakaMasipala namaphoyisa baklabhe ikhonteyna emuva kokuba kukhishwe incwadi yesexwayiso yokuthi uMagwaza kumele ayisuse.

data:
BANGU-62 000 abahola impesheni KwaZulu-Natal okuthiwa abakawenzi amakhadi amasha njengoba sekuzonqanyulwa ukuwasebenzisa maduze. Lokhu kushiwo uMnuz Mbizeni Mdlalose okhulumela abakwaSouth Africa Social Security Agency (Sassa) esifundazweni, onxuse ukuthi njengoba sekuqalile ukuholela abantu basale sebeshaya namakhadi amasha.

USHAYWE ngoswazi oluncane usaziwayo uBonang Matheba ecaleni abebhekene nalo lokungakhokhi intela.
Inkantolo yamacala emali eGoli ihlawulise uBonang uR30 000 ngoLwesibili ngokuhluleka ukukho intela ngesikhathi. Lokhu kwenzeke ngemuva kokuthi elivumile icala abethweswe lona lokungakhokhi intela eqondene naye uqobo kusukela ngo-2008 kuya ku-2017 neyebhizinisi lakhe iBonang Matheba Entertainment (Pty) Ltd kusukela ngo-2014 kuya ku-2017.

data:

Izolo uGordhan uhambe nommeli wakhe u-Adv Tebogo Malatji emhlanganweni noMvikeli woMphakathi, u-Adv Busisiswe Mkhwebane, okade efuna uGordhan achaze ukuthi kungani avumela uPillay ukuba asheshe athathe umhlalaphansi amsayinele nempesheni.
