Kuthiwa uMnuz Philani Msomi uhlaselwe abalisa bangakubo ngeledlule ngoba bemsola ngokuthi ungene endlini wabopha ingane yakhona eneminyaka engu-16 wase ethatha uR50. Umalume wakhe, uMnuz Mpiko Msomi, uthe umshana wakhe uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela emuva kokunenebulwa yilaba balisa okuthiwa bebemshaya ngomphini wepiki bephinde bamshaye nangobhushi ngoba bemsola ngokweba.

IZama High eqala kwaGrade 8 iye kwaGrade 12, ngesinye sezikole eziphakamisela phezulu ifulegi lezikole zasemakhaya futhi ezibhukulile zavala igebe ebelikhona phakathi kwalezi nezikole nezasemadolobheni uma kuziwa ngasohlangothini lwemiphumela.

Kusukela ngoMgqibelo ozayo izingane zizofundiswa imidlalo yakudala ePhansi Museum eGlenwood, ukukhombisa abazali ukuthi akukona ukuchitha imali kuphela okungazijabulisa ngamaholidi. Le midlalo izodonsa uDisemba wonke njalo ngoMgqibelo.
 UNksz Thobeka Dlomo okhulumela lesi sikhungo uthe uma le midlalo iba yimpumelelo bazimisele ukuthi baqhubeke nayo ngisho sekudlule amaholidi.

Esithangamini nabezindaba eCity Hall eThekwini izolo, uNobhala wabefundisi besifazane uNkk Ziningi Jali okunguye obefunda isitatimende, uthe sekwanele ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane, wengeza ngokuthi bafuna ukuthi bonke abagila imikhuba babhadle ejele.

Ngenyanga edlule amalungu awu-17 omphakathi wakule ndawo, aphuma ejabula enkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaDukuza, ngemuva kokuhoxiswa kwecala lawo, izolo abayisithupha babo babuye baboshwa ngemuva kokuthi bephinde bakha imijondolo kule ndawo.

data:
IMILUTHA yezidakamizwa isijike ukwenza njengoba kuthiwa isizitika ngokuphuza amanzi aphuma uma ipheke ama-pads (amaqakelo) abesifazane asesebenzile.
Lo mkhuba omusha ubukeka uzobhincisela nxanye abezidakamizwa iwunga nenyaope. Kuthiwa uthandwa yintsha engenayo imali yokuthenge inyaope newunga ngenxa yokuthi imba eqolo. Ukuhlanganisa amaqakelo kulula ngoba bahambela imizi enabantu besifane baketule imigqomo bathathe amaqakelo asesebenzile noma baye lapho kulahlwa khona imfucuza bapequlule ukuze bathole amaqakelo.

data:

Umbiko we-Eyewitness News uveze ukuthi uMnuz Ernest Mabaso (27) ongomunye wabasolwa ababili abasolwa ngokubulala amalungu omndeni akwaKhoza uthe wayephoqwe nguMnuz Fita Khupe (61) abasolwa naye kuleli cala ukuthi abulale lo mndeni. Ngesonto eledlule iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseProtea ikuhlehlisile ukulalelwa kokufakwa kwesicelo sebheyili kwalaba bobabili ukuze kuqhubeke izolo nanamuhla.

Abasebenzi abakholwa wukuthi izigebengu bezizilungiselele zizongena ehhovisi, abakhulume naleli phephandaba bacela ukungadalulwa, bathe basathukile futhi banovalo lokuthi kungenzeka izigebengu ziphinde zibuye zizogqekeza amanye amahhovisi.

USabelo Mdlovu obesebenza engadini emzini kaNkk Charlotte Davies, umyeni wakhe owayedayisa idayimane (naye ongasekho emhlabeni). Ngokomunye womakhelwane abasondele emzini kaNkk Davies, wayengumuntu othulayo owayekhuluma noMdlovu kuphela isikhathi esiningi.

data:
SIYANDA isibalo sabafundi ababhekana nokuhlukunyezwa nokunukubezwa ngothisha ngokocansi ezikoleni zaKwaZulu-Natal.
Ngokwempendulo kangqongqoshe wezeMfundo kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, abalelwa ku-33 amacala okunukubeza ngokocansi avuliwe ngo-2017/18. Angu-22 awokushaywa avulwe ngesikhathi esifanayo. UDlungwane udalule lezi zinombolo kulandela umbuzo weDA ePhalamende. Uqhube waveza nokuthi bangu-231 abafundi baKwaZulu-Natal abalulekwa ngokwengqondo.

data:
Bantabami ngokuzithoba ngiyacela isale seyimiswa le Khomishini kaZondo okuthiwa ngeyophenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana. Ngicabanga ukuthi nobengaboni useyabona manje ukuthi iKhomishini yokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana ifana nenunu emakhandakhanda ezoshaya ibhuqe u-ANC. Ukube nginawo amandla okufinyelela egoseni le Khomoshini yokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana, uSolwazi uThuli Madonsela, kungabe ngiyambuza manje ukuthi uyathokoza yini njengoba abantu bakaKhongolose sebejikijelana ngemikhonto ongathi baloyiwe. Kungenzeka ukuthi leKhomishini yasungulwa ngoba kuhloswe ukuthi kwembulwe izinqe zikaZuma kodwa manje kubukeka sekuvela nezinqe zabantu abaningi.
Ngisho ingane ekhasela eziko iyabona ukuthi kule khomishini kuhujwa inyamazane eyodwa enguZuma kodwa kugcina sekulimala nezinye izinyamazane ngenxa yokuthi abazingeli bazingela ngokushisa umlilo. MaSolezwe ngiyaphinda ngiyasho ukuthi lo mlilo obaswe kuleya Khomishini uyoshiya uKhongolose ushe wahanguka amashiya nezinkophe. Lezi gubhu ezishawayo kuthiwe uKhongolose ubumbene ngibona ongathi kusiniswa amahleza ngoba le Khomishini ikuveza obala ukuthi uhlakazeke phakathi okwamaqhezu ezinqe. Okufike kube yinkinga wukuthi ofakazi beza ngogqozi nofuqufuqu lokupenda uZuma njengesikhohlakali kodwa bagcine sebechaphazele noGwede Mantashe, uGodongwana noJeff Radebe sekuvela ukuthi babekhona emihlanganweni ethile. OkaVolos uthi le Khomishini kaZondo ifana nomgangela wezinsizwa nezintokazi zikaKhongolose okufanele umiswe ngokushesha ngoba kuyofikwa okhethweni sekukhishwene amehlo abanye bengasanamazinyo. Kuyishwa ukuthi amalungu ka-ANC abukeka engaboni ukuthi ukuyofakaza kule Khomishini kufana nokuthatha intambo uzikhunge ngoba ugcine usungene wavela ngesicoco. Ubufakazi bale nto engiyishoyo kube yisehlo esehlele uNhlanhla Nene osukwe wusinga wayokwethula ubufakazi kodwa wagcina eselahlekelwa yisikhundla sokuba uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali. Kufikisela ngosizi ukubona uPravin Ghordan efakaza, echaza ukuthi yena wakubona kanjani ukulawulwa koMbuso. Thina esibukelayo sesinovalo lokuthi kwayena uGhordan uyogcina eselahlekelwe yisikhundla sakhe ngoba kuyabonakala ukuthi akekho omsulwa.
label: politics

data:
KUBATSHAZWA umhlola wenkosi yaseVulamehlo, eNquthu okuthiwa iphakamise ukuthi abangaganiwe bakhokhe intela yobumpohlo ekubeni umphakathi usukhathele wukukhokhiswa intela ngezinto ezehlukene. Kukhalwa nangemali ekhokhwa abashonelwe enguR600 umphakathi othi awazi ngeyani. 
Kuthiwa kweminye imingcwabo kuze kulamule inkantolo enquma ukuthi umuntu angcwatshwe. Inkosi kuthiwa isuke ishaya phansi ngonyawo, ithi ngeke angcwatshwe kungakhokhiwe.

Okhulumela iNPA uMnuz Luvuyo Mfaku wazise iNews24 ukuthi incwadi yokuhoxiswa kwamacala isibhaliwe yathunyelwa abammeli bomndeni wakwaGupta ukubazise ngezakamuva ezithinta leli cala. Icala bekumele libuyele enkantolo yeMantshi eBloemfontein ngoDisemba 4 nonyaka.

data:
Mhleli: Ngiyabonga ngokungipha isikhala ephephandabeni lakho. Ake ngibonge yize ngingazi ukuthi abaholi be-ANC eThekwini bafinyelele kanjani esinqumeni abasithathile. Umphakathi waKwaZulu-Natal uyayithanda i-ANC kodwa izinto eziningi ezenziwa wuKhongolose kulesi sifundazwe zenza umphakathi ubone kungafanele uzihlanganise nale nhlangano.
Ngifunde ephephandabeni kuthiwa ubuholi be-ANC esifundeni iTheku bufuna ukuxoxa namalungu kaKhongolose akhetha ukuzimela okhethweni ngo-2016. Ake ngilungise lapha, bonke abazimela abakaze bawushiye uKhongolose yizinkinga nenkohlakalo okwenziwa ubuholi besifundazwe nobeTheku ezadala umphakathi uvele uthi abazimele nangempela kwenzeka. Ngenzela ukucacisa lokho. Okunye okumele sikukhulume wukuthi umphakathi omningi waseThekwini owalinyazwa ngokufunzwa amakhansela abaholi besifunda seTheku awujabulile.
label: politics

data:
KUNGENZEKA izifunda ezimbili ze-ANC ezingakabi nezingqungquthela zazo KwaZulu-Natal, okuyiMoses Mabhida neLower South Coast, zibe nazo ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke ngonyaka ozayo njengoba udlulile umnqamulajuqu obubekwe yisigungu sikazwelonke sale nhlangano obusekupheleni kuka-Agasti.
Lokhu kushiwo nguNkk Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu, okhulumela i-ANC esifundazweni, kulandela ukuthi ibe yimpumelelo ingqungquthela yaseHarry Gwala.
label: politics

data:
BAGCINE bephoqelekile ukuthu bayisuse ivideo kaSbahle Mpisane abakwaMpisane ngemuva kokuhlaselwa ngabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Ofake le video, u-Andile Mpisane, ongumfowabo omncane kaSbahle, uthe ukhethe ukuyisusa ekhasini lakhe ngoba bese behlaselwa njengomndeni. 
"Ngicela niqaphe ukuthi ngiyisusile ivideo yokululama kukaSbahle ekhasini lami ngemuva kokuhlaselwa kwethu (yena noSbahle) nomndeni. Besihlose ukwazisa umphakathi ngokululama kwakhe ngokufaka le video. Ngemuva kwengozi abantu babehleba ngakho konke okubi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, nasemaphephandabeni ngaye okuyinto esizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu. Siyabonga ngokuqhubeka niseseka ngomkhuleko, uSbahle uyabonga kini nonke, siyabonga," kusho u-Andile.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Ngikhala ngiyazithulisa ngesandla sobulwane obenza kuvalwe ikolishi lamaphoyisa eThekwini osekwehlele kwelethu oLundi. Siphethwe kabi singothisha abaqeqesha izitshudeni ukuthi zibe abavikeli bomphakathi.
Akusasebenzeki ngendlela ekolishi siphathiswa okwezilwane. Selokhu lavulwa ngo-2005 ikolishi angikaze ngiyibone le nto yokuthi abafundi batshele othisha ukuthi sizokwenza ukuthi nokuthi, okuthile ngeke sikwenze. Ngeke usho ukuthi sisekolishi lamaphoyisa.
label: education

data:
ISEMATHENI indaba yokwebiwa kwezinwele zokufakelwa ezibizwa ngama-weave. Ukwanda kwalo mkhuba sekwenza ukuthi abesifazane abafake lezi zinwele bahambe bejeqeza besaba ukuhlwithwa zona. Ukubiza kwalezi zinwele ezinye okuthiwa zitholakala emazweni aphesheya, yikho okwenza nezigebengu zicuthele odade abazifakile.
Kuvele nokuthi eminye imishwalense isinezinhlelo zokukhokhela abantshontshelwe izinwele. Ngokombiko wephephandaba elisesitebeleni esisodwa neSolezwe, iBusiness Report, kuvele ukuthi uhlelo lokukhokhela ukwebiwa kwezinwele lungaphansi kwebhizinisi lezobuhle kweminye imishwanelense.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
BASAZOBOSHWA abazotholakala nensangu emakhaya abo yize kuleli sonto kube nenhlokomo kwabaningi bejabulela isinqumo seNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ethe ngeke kusaba yicala ukutholakala nensangu ekhaya, inqobo nje uma ungayidayisi.
Yize abantu bakuleli becabanga ukuthi selokhu kuphume isinqumo, sebengenza noma yini ngensangu ekhaya, izazi zithi inkantolo ikubeke kwacaca ukuthi umthetho ovuna insangu uyoze usebenze eminyakeni emibili ezayo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUKHISHWE incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kukaBonang Matheba enkantolo ebhekene namacala athinta imali eGoli ngemuva kokuthi lo saziwayo ehlulekile ukuvela kuyo ngecala lokukhwabanisa izolo.
UBonang akekho kuleli njengoba eseNew York lapho kuqhubeka khona umhlangano weNhlangano yeZizwe. Ubephethe uhlelo lwengxoxo ebizwa nge Leave No Girl Behind, obekudingidwa udaba lokuthuthukisa abesifazane emhlabeni.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
BAHLALELE ovalweni othisha baseWiggins Secondary, eMayville, ngemuva kokushiswa kwamahhovisi abo, kwasha izincwadi nempahla yesikole kwanqanyulwa namapayipi amanzi okusolwa abantu abafuna ukudla umhlaba wesikole okungakhiwe kuwona.
Lokhu sekwenze isikole sacela amaphoyisa ukuthi azulazule ngaphandle kwaso njengoba kuthiwa kunabasabisile ngokuthi bazobuya bazongqongqisa nezimoto zothisha ngoba banenkani bagweve nendawo. Kuthiwa kufike abantu ababalelwa ku-50 izolo ezintatha kukhona onogada ababili bafike baphihliza ihhovisi lothisha bashisa izincwadi basuka bahamba.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
LUYASHUBA udaba lokushona kwesiguli emtholampilo eMzinto, njengoba kuthiwa unesi osolwa ngokungasinaki usenxuswe ukuba asule emsebenzini. 
Isolezwe lithole ngenhlangano iNurses Forum ukuthi ucelwe ngabaphathi bakhe ukuthi asule unesi wasePhungashe Clinic osolwa ngokuba budedengu okuholele ekushoneni kukaNksz Thobile Phungula (26). Lesi sigameko esenzeke ngoSepthemba 6 sithukuthelise umndeni kamufi, osola ubudedengu ngaso. Kuthiwa umufi wayelethwe emtholampilo ngo-2 ntambama, washona ngabo 10 ebusuku elinde i-ambulensi.

data:
OWAYENGUNGQONGQOSHE wezokuXhumana, uNksz Faith Muthambi usole ibamba likaMqondisi Jikelele eMnyangweni wezokuXhumana, uNkk Phumla Williams, ngokuhubhuza amanga aluhlaza ngaye ngesikhathi lifakaza kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokugwamandwa kwamandla ombuso ngoMsombuluko.
KuleKhomishini ephethwe iphini likaMengameli wamaJaji uRaymond Zondo, uNkk Williams ukhulume ngobuhlungu ayebuzwa ngaphansi kobuholi bukaNksz Muthambi, nokwaholela ekutheni abe nokhwantalala.Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â

data:
BAVEZE imibono eyehlukene abahlaziyi bezepolitiki mayelana nomhlangano wabaholi abathile be-ANC okubalwa nobengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma lapho kuthiwa bekuboshwa kuwo uzungu lokuketula uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.
Iphephandaba lesiNgisi langeSonto libike ukuthi uZuma, uNobhala-jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, obenguNdunankulu aphinde abe nguSihlalo we-ANC eNorth West, uMnuz Supra Mahumapelo, uNobhala we-ANCYL KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo, noNkk Meokgo Matuba we-ANCWL nabanye bahlangane eMaharani Hotel, eThekwini. Iphephandaba lize laveza nesithombe esikhombisa laba baholi bekuleli hotela.
label: politics

data:
UBHEKENE nengcindezi umfundi kaGrade 11 waseBilanyoni, eDumbe owabona kubulawa intombi yomzala wakhe okuthiwa ukhala ngokuthi ubuthongo abusafiki ngenxa yesithombe sokugwazwa kwayo.
Lokhu kulandela ukuthi umndeni namaphoyisa bedidekile ngokuthi kwenzekani ngesidumbu sikaNksz Makhosi Ndlangamandla (25) ngoba umphakathi uyamba lapho kuthiwa wagqitshwa khona kodwa akuveli lutho kuqhuma amanzi kuphela.

data:
MHLELI: Abantu bafuna umhlaba wabo. Umbuzo wami-ke uthi bazowenzani njengoba besahlulwa yilo omncane abanawo? Ukube kuya ngami ngabe siyabambisana nabamhlophe, bakhokhe kithi inyanga nenyanga.
Ngeke sakufihla ukuthi abamhlophe bayawusebenzisa umhlaba. Futhi ngendlela egculisayo banazo zonke izinto zokuwusebenzisa. Thina sifuna umhlaba nje khona abangenawo ngisho ugandaganda lo.
label: society

data:
KUNINGI osekushiwo ngobubi bokukipita. Ungoti uthi iningi labakipitayo ligcina lingashadile, lixabana kubangwa nokuthi abathandanayo badidekile. Owesifazane ugcina engazazi noma uyinkosikazi endodeni akipite nayo, nowesilisa engazazi ukuthi ungumyeni noma isoka kwakipite naye.
Kukubi kunjalo, ungoti wezamasiko uthi kukhona okuhlale kweqiwa uma kukhulunywa ngomkhuba abathi mubi wokukipita.
label: society

data:
ISIKHULU esiphezulu saseNedbank, uMnuz Mike Brown, siveze ukuthi owayengungqongqoshe wezokuMbiwaphansi, uMnuz Mosebenzi Zwane, wayecindeza ibhange ukuthi lithathe ama-akhawunti omndeni wakwaGupta ukuze kuvikelwe imisebenzi.
UBrown utshele ikhomishini yeJaji Raymond Zondo izolo ukuthi uZwane wacela umhlangano nezikhulu zakwaNedbank ukuze kuxoxwe ngodaba lokuhlengwa kwemisebenzi yabantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngoMeyi ka-2016.

data:
UDLAME lwasezikoleni lufinyelele kwelinye izinga ngenkathi umfundi ona-17 egwaza ephindelela uthisha wakhe ngommese wambulala.
Lo mfundi owenza uGrade 10 eRamotshere Moiloa High School, eDinokana Village eduze kwaseZeerust, eNorth West, kuthiwa uboshwe amaphoyisa ngezinsolo zokugwaza ngokubulala uMnuz Gadimang Daniel Mokolobate onguthisha wakhe obebhekele ukubhalwa kwesifundo iGeography abafundi abenza uGrade 10 ngoLwesine.

data:
KUGWAZWE kwabulawa isitshudeni saseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal ophikweni lwaseWestville ngemuva kwendumezulu yomcimbi wezitshudeni, iMother of All Bashes ezintatha zayizolo.
Lo mcimbi obekumenywe kuwo izintandokazi zeGagasi FM, uSphectacula noDJ Naves, uphele kabi. Isitshudeni esina-22 igama laso eligodliwe ngoba singekho isiqiniseko sokuthi umndeni waso usuyazi ngokushona kwaso, kuthiwa sigwazwe ngemuva kwengxabano esuke phakathi kwaso nezinye izitshudeni ezintathu.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Izinyembezi emehlweni ami zehliswa wumcabango wokuthi kanti ngempela sasizabalazela ini uma kuzofika abafana baseNdiya bazosikhethela ongqongqoshe ezweni lethu sibe thina sasivotele amaqabane ukuthi asebenzele umphakathi ontulayo. Inhlangano yethu uKhongolose yaphenduka yaba silwane sini ngesikhathi sikaJacob Zuma? Amaqabane asala enkundleni ayefela ukuthi sibe yinhlekisa ezweni nasemhlabeni wonkana na.
Eqinisweni sonke sasimkhonzile uMsholozi ngoba sithi ungumuntu olwaziyo usizi lomuntu omnyama okuyothi uma esengumengameli azi okuyikonakona okufanele akwenze. Sidangele kakhulu futhi sididekile ngomonakalo ikakhulu esizweni esinsundu esidonsa kanzima wububha.
label: politics

data:
KUBATSHAZWA isihluku somlisa (28) waseNgwavuma okuthiwa uhlahlele unina okwembuzi emuva kokuthi ezame ukumlamula eshaya unina wengane yakhe.
Lo mlisa wasOnaleni, eNgwavuma, ongumakhi, kuthiwa uhlahlele unina, uNkk Maponyane Timbane (56) ngocelemba ngoMsombuluko ntambama, emva kokuthi emlamule enengxabano nonina wengane yakhe abesehlale naye iminyaka emzini wakhe.

data:
INKAKHA yomculi wakuleli uChicco Twala onguyise kaLongwe Twala ongomunye wababekhona ngesikhathi kudutshulwa lowo owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates uSenzo Meyiwa usephumele obala wazwakalisa ukugculiseka ngokuqhubeka kophenyo lwamaphoyisa.
 Ngokombiko weTimesLIVE, uChicco ukuphikile ukuthi indodana yakhe iyathintekla ekubulaweni kukaSenzo. Uthe ukuba indodana yakhe ibithinteka ekubulaweni kukaSenzo ubezoba ngowokuqala ukuyinikela emaphoyiseni.

LUYINZUKAZIKEYI olwabashadile baseMbazwana abaneminyaka ewu-21 beshadile kodwa isitifiketi somshado sabo sikhomba ukuthi umama uzishadile.
 UNkk Phikiwe Thandazile Ngobese (Mangeni) ushade noMnuz Bernard Mxoshwa Ngobese kodwa isitifiketi somshado abasinikwa uMnyango wezaseKhaya siveza ukuthi uNkk Ngobese uzishade yena, esikhaleni okufanele ngabe kubhalwe kuso umyeni kubhalwe igama nesibongo sakhe nasesikhaleni sikankosikazi kubhalwe yena.

data:
KUVELE ukuthi sabulawa ngokushaywa ngesando ekhanda emagcekeni esikhungo saseDurban University of Technology (DUT) isitshudeni uSandile Ndlovu oshonele esibhedlela ngoSepthemba ngemuva kokulimala kanzima ekhanda.
Umsolwa ecaleni lokubulawa kukaNdlovu (18) uMsizi Mbutho (29), uboshwe ngeledlule kanti uvele okwesibili enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ngoLwesithathu. Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo, umsolwa ubhekene namacala amabili, elokubulala nelokubamba inkunzi.

data:
OWAYENGUKHOMISHANA wakwaSars, uMnuz Tom Moyane, uzothola ithuba lokuphonsa ngemibuzo uNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, kwiKhomishini ephenya ngokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana, ngodaba lokwethweswa amacala ngo-2016 ngokusungula uphiko labaphenyi olungekho emthethweni kwaSARS.
Sibe yimpumelelo isicelo sikaMoyane sokuphonsa imibuzo uGordhan, njengoba kumemezele izolo uSihlalo wale Khomishini, iJaji uRaymond Zondo.

data:
UTHUKUTHELE uyaveva uNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha nokuPhepha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Ntuli, emuva kwesigameko sokubulawa kwephoyisa, elinye lalimala ngesikhathi kade eyofuna izigebengu ezithinteka emacaleni okubulawa kosomatekisi eNsuze.
Amaphoyisa amabili asebenza ophikweni lwezobuNhloli KwaZulu-Natal, uwarrant officer no-captain, abelandela umkhondo ethungatha abantu abasembonini yama-metered taxis abathinteka emacaleni okubulawa kosomatekisi endaweni ngesikhathi edutshulwa kade elalelwe unyedle yiqulu labantu ebelihlomile.

data:
UTHELEKELWE wumphakathi ngamabhodlela nangezibhakela owesilisa waseMachobeni ngaseLindelani, ngemuva kokuvela kokuthi uvezele izingane ezisencane izithombe zocansi.
Lo wesilisa esingeke silidalule igama lakhe njengoba engakasho ukuthi uyalivuma noma uyaliphika icala, kuthiwa ubebiza izingane zamantombazane ezingomakhelwane athi uyazithuma, agcine ngokuzivalela endlini ezibukisa izithombe zocansi, esebenzisa i-lap top yakhe.

data:
UHLALELE ovalweni umndeni womfana ona-9 okuthiwa uvinjezelwe ngamalungu omphakathi waseSavannah Park eMariannhill ngoLwesithathu ngeledlule, emsola ngokuthakatha.
 Uyise womfana (igama lakhe elingeke lidalulwe ukuvikelwe umfana) uthi uthuke kwaphela nasozwaneni ngesikhathi ehla esitobhini ntambama ngoLwesithathu ephuma emsebenzini, elinye ilungu lomphakathi limcela ukuba behlisane baye emzini ongumakhelwane lapho kugcinwe khona indodana yakhe okuthiwa ibanjwe kulo muzi igibele imfene, ekuseni ngabo 9.

data:
I-IFP KwaZulu-Natal ifuna amaphoyisa ampintshele ekhoneni, aze agonyuluke iqiniso umlisa oboshwe ngelezinsolo zokubulawa kwekhansela layo, uMnuz Mthembeni Majola (39). Ikhansela uMajola belisebenzela uMasipala iNkosi Langalibalele eMtshezi, lithelwe othulini ngo-Agasti ngesikhathi lihamba ngemoto yalo nomunye owasinda. 
UMnuz Ayanda Siyanda Mshengu Mvelase (26) uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMtshezi emuva kokuthelekelwa ezakwadalawane zamfaka ozankosi.

data:
KUBHUNTSHE umngcwabo abamakhaza begoloza nesidumbu befuna imali okuthiwa bebengavumelananga ngayo nomndeni kamufi. Umndeni wakwaMohlakwana eMzongwane, eMatatiele, ukhala ezimathonsi ngezindleko othi ufakwe kuzo yinkampani yabangcwabi iHambakahle Funeral Parlour ekwaV eMlaza, kulandela ukunqaba nesidumbu sikaNksz Buhle Mohlakwana (35) okuthiwa ushonele esibhedlela iKing George eThekwini ngesonto eledlule.
Isidumbu bekulindeleke ukuthi sifike eMatatiele ngoLwesihlanu. Kuthiwa bese kwenziwe zonke izinhlelo zokuthi afihlwe ngoMgqibelo.
label: society

data:
OWAYENGUNGQONGQOSHE wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNksz Bathabile Dlamini uthi akanandaba nabamgxekayo bemenza idimoni kodwa ujabulela ukuphinda athole ithuba lokusebenzela abantu ngoba yilokho akwazi kangcono. 
UNksz Dlamini onguMengameli we-ANCWL, ubephawula emuva kokuqokelwa esikhundleni sokuba nguSihlalo weBhodi elingaphansi koMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwabantu, elibizwa ngeSocial Housing Regulatory Authority (SHRA). Uqokwe nguNgqongqoshe woMnyango uNkk Lindiwe Sisulu ukuba ahole lolu phiko olungaphansi komnyango wakhe.

Indoda (35), engeke ize idalulwe ngoba ayikabuzwa ukuthi iyalivuma noma iyaliphika yini icala, izolo bekulindeleke ivele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasoLundi mayelana necala lokubulala uMnuz Phakamani Bukhosini (27).

data:
LIGWEME ihlazo lokulandwa yiveni lakhetha ukuzinikela emaphoyiseni ilungu eliqavile le-ANC, elibhekene necala lokukhomba uzakwabo ngesibhamu ngesikhathi betholana phezulu emhlanganweni. 
UMnuz Arthur Zwane, uzinikele emaphoyiseni kuleli sonto mayelana nezinsolo zokukhomba uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka ngesibhamu ngesikhathi bexabana. UHlomuka uyiPhini likaNobhala we-ANC esifundazweni, uphethe nesokuba nguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba Zomdabu.

data:
KUNXUSWA abafundi bakamatric ukuthi bangayoni inyufomu yabo uma beqeda ukubhala iphepha lokugcina kodwa banikele ngayo ukuze isize abanye.
Inhlangano yentsha i-Rise Black Child Enterprise ezinze eThekwini igqugquzela uhlelo i-Gqoka School Mate okuzoqoqwa ngalo inyufomu nezincwadi zokufunda kubafundi abazobe bebhala iphepha labo lokugcina kuleli sonto.

data:
OWAYEYISIKHULU kwezokuxhumana kuhulumeni kwiGCIS uMnuz Themba Maseko, useveze okushayisanayo nobufakazi obathulwa owayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngokuthi kungani asuswa esikhundleni sakhe wanikezwa omunye umsebenzi kuhulumeni. 
UMaseko obesebuya isibili kwikhomishini ephenya ukulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana, watshela ikhomishini nyakenye ukuthi wasuswa esikhundleni ngoba wanqaba ukusiza umndeni wakwaGupta ukuthola ingxenye yemali eyayinguR600 million.

data:
OWAYEYILUNGU lePhalamende eBritain uLord Peter Hain, ugxeke izinhlangano zemali ngokuvumela abomndeni wakwaGupta ukuba bafake imali engekho emthethweni emazweni ahlukene okwenza kwaba lula ukulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.
Efakaza ngoMsombuluko uHain utshele iKhomishini kaZondo ukuthi ngeke kwagxekwa uhlangothi olulodwa ngoba amabhange nezinkampani zokuxhumanisa umphakathi ezaba nesandla ekutheni umndeni wakwaGupta uthumele imali yawo ezindaweni ezehlukeni ezweni jikelele.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
WAYEFISA ukuba wunjiniyela uthishanhloko ochonywe uphaphe lwegwalagwala ngokuba wuthishanhloko obadlula bonke ngokuphatha isikole samabanga aphezulu KwaZulu-Natal.
UMnuz Philani Innocent Mathenjwa uthishanhloko waseNtulabakayise Secondary, KwaNibela, eHluhluwe, uchonywe uphaphe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, ngesikhathi ebonga futhi ekhuthaza othisha ngomsebenzi omuhle abawenzile emcimbini owaziwa ngeKwaZulu-Natal National Teaching Awards (NTA) obungoLwesihlanu.

data:
UMNYANGO wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nobuHoli bezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni uthi usuzimisele ukwelekelela osomabhizinisi abasebancane abafuna ukwenza imikhiqizo yensangu kuleli.
Lokhu kuvezwe ngungqongqoshe uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwingqungquthela yensangu, iCannabis Investment Protocol, ebiseNkosi Albert Luthuli International Converntion Centre, eThekwini ngoLwesithathu. Ethula inkulumo yakhe phambi kwezihambeli zalo mcimbi uthe, ngesikhathi benesidlo sasekuseni iKZN Growth Coalition ngo-Agasti bahlongoza ukuthi bewuhulumeni bahlose ukulekelela abalimi abancane njengendlela yokulwa nokwentuleka kwemisebenzi.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
SEBEXABANE baze bafakana enkantolo abomndeni wowayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma kubangwa imali yethenda yomshini ophakela amanzi, abayifaka eNkandla. UMnuz Zobaphi Zuma, ozalwa ngumfowabo wobengumengameli noNksz Nompumelelo Mhlongo, oyisihlobo esiqavile basembangweni oshubile wemali.
UZuma (Zobaphi) ukhala ngoNksz Mhlongo ngokugweva nemali athi babeyithole emuva kokuthola ithenda yokufaka injini yamanzi. UZuma uthi empeleni bebesebenzisana ngaphansi kwenkampani, Ubucebo General Trading. Uthi ngokwazi kwakhe, kufanele ngabe wathola R500 000 ngomsebenzi abawenza kodwa akatholanga ngisho isente. Useze wakhetha ukulufaka enkantolo udaba ngoba usekhathele wukukhuluma nesihlobo sakhe esingafuni nemali.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
ITHOLAKALE ibulewe yaphonswa esimobeni esiseduze kwasemzini wayo ingoduso ebihlale ihlukunyezwa umnyeni wayo. UNksz Nompumelelo Shangase (46) waseMontebello eNdwedwe ogane eGqugquma, KwaSwayimane utholakale ngeSonto eshonile esimobeni esiseduze komuzi wakhe engenalo inxeba kodwa evuvukele ebusweni, kubonakala sengathi ubeshaywa.
Uyise kamufi, uMnuz Nicholas Shangase uthe, washayelwa ucingo umkhwenyana wakwakhe ngeSonto ekuseni ebuza ukuthi indodakazi yakhe ayikaze ifike yini kubo ngoba iduke ngayizolo?
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SIDUVE emakhazeni phesheya kwezilwandle eGreece isidumbu sikaNksz Sarah Masango, waKwaNdebele, eMpumalanga, oshonele esibhedlela ngoNovemba 14 nonyaka, enesifo sofuba. Umndeni wakhe kumele ukhokhe R71 000, ukuze isidumbu sakhe sibuyiswe kuleli.
UMnyango wezangaPhandle uthe ngeke ukwazi ukukhokhela izindleko zamakhaza nokumbuyisa kuleli umufi ngoba ubengeyena umsebenzi kahulumeni.
label: society

data:
I-DA kuMasipala weTheku ifuna izimpendulo ukuthi kungani engezi emsebenzini izinyanga ezintathu obeyimeya yomkhandlu uNkk Zandile Gumede, yize eqhubeka nokuhola imali yokuba ikhansela?
Emhlanganweni wamakhansela e-ICC zolo, usotswebhu we-DA eThekwini, uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, uthe uNkk Gumede bamgcine ngoSepthemba efika emuva kwesikhathi emcimbini wokugcotshwa kongene ezicathulweni zakhe, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda.
label: politics

data:
Abafundi baseGratton High, babuye nendondo emncintiswaneni ohlelwa ngabakwa-Eskom ne-Education With Enterprise Trust (EWIT) eGoli. Abaphume isibili ezikoleni ezintathu ebezingenele KwaZulu-Natal, bebeyokwethula iSnempilo Jam, okuwujamu abazenzele wona. 
Lesi sikole besimelwe wuMinenhle Morris noNoxolo Mthethwa abafunda uGrade 11, abenza iBusiness Studies. Uthisha wabo obebaphelezele, uNksz Busi Dlamini, ofundisa zona lezi zifundo, uthe bavele banenhlangano abazisungulele yona esikoleni, enabafundi abangu-16.
label: education

data:
INHLANGANO ebusayo i-ANC ifuna amakhansela aseThekwini athweswe amacala enkohlakalo ayiswe ekomitini layo elimele ukuqondisa ubugwegwe.
Lokhu kulandela ukuthi oKlebe bebophe amakhansela amane ngoLwesithathu ngecala lokukhwatshaniswa kwemali yethenda yokuqoqa udoti kaR208 million. Amakhansela athintekayo nasevelile enkantolo yamacala athinta imali eThekwini akhululwa ngebheyili kaR5 000 umuntu emunye ngoNomthandazo Shabalala, Nomusa Mthembu, Sthenjwa Nyawose noThembelihle de Lange.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
BAGWETSHWE iminyaka ewu-15 umuntu emunye abesifazane ababili ababengabasebenzi boMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal ngokukhwabanisa * -R7.5 million.
Inkantolo ephenya amacala athinta izimali eThekwini izolo igwebe uHlengiwe Hlela (35) noPatricia Chule (33) iminyaka ewu-15 ngokukhwabanisa yengeza eminye iminyaka ewu-10 ngokuphula isigaba somthetho olwa nezenzo zobugebengu obuhleliwe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMENGAMELI ngokuhlonishwa we-IFP inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi uthi kuyomphatha kabi uma eze washona lungaqediwe uhlelo lokubuyisana phakathi kweNkatha ne-ANC.
Ekhuluma emcimbini wokwethulwa ngokusemthethweni kwesikhwama sakhe nomngani wakhe ongusomabhizinisi ohlonishwayo, uMnuz Harry Oppenheimer esikhumulweni sezindiza esidala ngaseSiphingo izolo, uButhelezi uthe inhliziyo yakhe kayikutholi ukuphumula ngokuthi lolu hlelo kalukaqedwa.
label: politics

data:
UMMANGALELWA ecaleni lokubulawa kwesitshudeni saseMangosuthu University of Technology uthi isibhamu abulala ngaso lesi sitshudeni kwakungesaso isitshudeni.
UMnuz Thabani Mzolo ubhekene necala lokubulala uNksz Zolile Khumalo isidumbu sakhe esatholwa endaweni ehlala izitshudeni eLonsdale ngoMeyi 1 kulo nyaka. Ummangalelwa waboshwa esendaweni yesigameko, wagcinwa esitokisini njengoba enqatshelwe ibheyili.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SEKUVELE isiphakamiso sokuba kushintshwe umphenyi wecala lokubulawa kwelungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANCYL KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Sindisiwe Beauty Ndlovu (34) okusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe yisoka. Umzala kamufi, uNksz Slo Khuzwayo, wenze lesi siphakamiso enkonzweni yomngcwabo enkundleni yezemidlalo eThokozani ngoMgqibelo.
UNksz Khuzwayo uyiphoyisa naye njengoba nomufi kusolwa ukuthi ubulawe yisoka eliyiphoyisa okuthiwa limhlabe ngenhlamvu esifubeni washona. UNksz Khuzwayo uthe balibheke ngabomvu icala futhi abeneme ngomphenyi wecala.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUKHUNJULWE iqhaza elabanjwa yinkosi yesizwe sakwaMdunge inkosi Faku Mdunge ukumela abantu besizwe ngezikhathi zikahulumeni wobandlululo emcimbini wokwembulwa kwetshe lesikhumbuzo sayo obusenkantolo yesizwe eBomvini izolo.
UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezamaCiko, amaSiko, iMidlalo nokuNgcebeleka, uNksz Hllengiwe Mavimbela, uthe inkosi yakwaMdunge ingenye yamakhosi ayebusa ngesikhathi sobandlululo ayelwela ukuthi abantu bayo bangaxhashazwa wuhulumeni wangaleso sikhathi owawucindezela abantu abamnyama.
label: politics

data:
UMSOLWA obhekene necala lokubulala isitshudeni saseMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT) esasihlala ezindlini zezitshudeni enkabeni yeTheku uqale ukwethula ubufakazi bakhe ngokutshela iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwiniÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â ngothando ayenalo ngomufi.
UThabani Mzolo obhekene necala lokubulala uZolile Khumalo, utshele inkantolo ukuthi babengamathe nolimu futhi babezitshela ukuthi bothandana baze bahlukaniswe ukufa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUZOHLOMULA nentsha efuna ukuqala amabhizinisi ohlelweni loxhaso, olwenziwa yinhlangano kaNgqongqoshe woMnyango weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha uMnuz Senzo Mchunu ayisungule nomkakhe.
Bangaphezu kuka-60 osomabhizinisi abebeyingxenye yomdlalo wegalofu eMount Edgecombe eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu, obuhlelwe yinhlangano iSenzo & Thembeka Mchunu Foundation. Inhloso yalo mdlalo ukuqokelela isikhwama esizosiza intsha eswele efuna ukuqhubeka nezifundo.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
UKHALA ngokuhamba kancane kophenyo lwamaphoyisa umndeni wowesilisa waKwaCaluza, eMgungundlovu, ogwazwe washona eGeorgedale eHammarsdale yibhungu okuthiwa lamdidanisa nomunye wesilisa elalixabene naye.
UMnuz Njabulo Ngcongo (29) kuthiwa ufe emuva kokugwazwa amanxeba amathathu emhlane umsolwa okuvela ukuthi uneminyaka engu-17, endaweni yokucima ukoma. UNgcongo ungcwatshwe ngoMgqibelo emathuneni aseMountain Rise eMgungundlovu. Elandisa Isolezwe ngokwenzeka, uNksz Nqobile Mbambo, ongumzala kamufi, uthe uNgcongo ufele ubala emuva kokudidaniswa nomunye umuntu.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UKUHLUKUMEZEKA kwabesifazane nezingane kulokhu kuqhubeka kuleli njengoba owesifazane nengane yakhe eneminyaka engu-13 behlalele ovalweni ngenxa yokuchanasa kukayise oyizalayo osolwa ngecala lokuyidlwengula.
Le ntombazane yaseMtubatuba, kusukela ngoMashi nonyaka uyise oyizalayo usolwa ngokuyidlwengula ephindelela. Kuthiwa ubeyithuma ukudla namanzi okugeza ukuba imlethele bese ethola ithuba lokuyihlukumeza. Le ntombazanyana yayisatshiswa uyise ukuthi uzoyibulala uma ike yabhoboka ngale ndaba.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUSUKE umsindo phakathi kwamaqembu aphikisayo nezikhulu zikaMasipala weTheku mayelana nesinqumo sokususwa kukaR3.5 million, ezinhlelweni zokukhumbula owayengumengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu kuleli uMnuz Nelson Mandela wayiswa emkhankasweni wokulwa nesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane ngaphandle kokugunyazwa umasipala.
Ikhansela le-IFP uMnuz Mdu Nkosi lithe alingabazi ukuthi le mali isetshenziswe ngaphandle kokugunyazwa umkhandlu.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UKUNGABOSHWA kwabasolwa ngokubulala amalungu omndeni ayisithupha, adutshulwa abulawa ebuka ithelevishini ngeledlule eMpumalanga, eHammarsdale, kufaka ingebhe kwabasinda kule sisigameko.
 UMnuz Ndodo Msomi, umfowabo kaMnuz Mvumo Msomi (55) owabulawa nezingane zakhe uMnuz Dumisani Msomi (25), Nksz Philisiwe Msomi (27), Andiswa Msomi (13) umshana wakhe uMnuz Dumisani Ntuli (29), nomakhelwane wakhe uMnuz Bongani Ndlovu (42), uthe abasinda ngesikhathi kudutshulwa laba bayesaba ukuthi kungenzeka ababulali babuye.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUNXUSWE othishanhloko bamakolishi amakhono amaTVET ukuthi basebenzisane nabezimboni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izitshudeni ziyathathwa ezimbonini ukuphucula amakhono azo emuva kokuqeqeshwa kulezi zikhungo.
UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqeshwa, iSayensi nobuChwepheshe uDkt Blade Nzimande ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi evula ngokusemthethweni ingqungquthela yezinsuku ezimbili iNational Artisan Development eqale izolo, eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, eThekwini.
label: education

data:
KUPHAZAMISEKE umhlangano womkhandlu, kwavalwa amabhuku ngesikhathi kuboshwa uSomlomo kaMasipala waseBaqulusini, eVryheid uMnuz Mkhonyovu Khumalo obhekene necala lokweba i-generator. 
UKhumalo uthelekelwe ngezakwadalawane ngoLwesine emahhovisi omkhandlu, waboshwa phambi kwamakhansela ethe shaye, ethamele umhlangano asala kanjalo emangele. Umasipala we-IFP ungaphansi komlawuli njengoba uhlaselwe yizinkinga zokuphatha, manje sekuboshwa usomlomo wawo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUVALWE izitolo eziyisishagalolunye ezidayisa utshwala ngokungemthetho eMatikwe, eNanda, izolo ngenhloso yokunciphisa amacala okuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane enzeka kakhulu kule ndawo.
UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha noKongiwa kweMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, obehambisana nethimba lamaphoyisa nophiko olulawula ukukhishwa kwezimvume zokudayisa utshwala, bagasele ezindaweni ezidayisa utshwala kule ndawo. Bebehlola ukuthi izindawo ezidayisa utshwala ziyayilandela yini imigomo ebekiwe yokudayisa utshwala efana nokuthi kumele umdayisi abe nemvume, indawo yakhe iphinde ibe sesimeni esihle, kubuye kube nendawo yokupaka amakhasimende akhe.
label: society

data:
AWUKAZI ukuthi uzongcwaba ngani umndeni wengoduso okusolwa ukuthi ibulawe umkhwenyana wayo eMgababa ngeSonto.
Umndeni kaNksz Zothile Mthethwa (33) waseMashiwase, eMgababa, ngaphezu kobuhlungu bokuthi uvuke ngeSonto watshelwa ngomuntu olele endleleni eduze komuzi wakhona okuthe uma usufika khona wathola ukuthi ilungu lawo libulewe, usuzwa obunye ubuhlungu bokuthi awazi umufi uzofihlwa ngani. Lo mndeni uphinde washaqeka uma usekuboshwa umkhwenyana kamufi osolwa ngokuthi umklinye wambulala. Umndeni usubhekene nenkinga yokuthi awazi ukuthi uzongcwatshwa kanjani umufi njengoba umkhwenyana wakhe okunguyena obemeseka ngemali esengumsolwa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UGWETSHWE udilikajele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu owesilisa ona-29 owayefunda eDurban University of Technology (DUT) owashiya izifundo wayoba yisigebengu.
UMsizi Mbutho ugwetshwe ngecala lokubulala isitshudeni uSandile Ndhlovu (18), obenza unyaka wokuqala kwi-Industrial Engineering kusona lesi sikhungo. Umufi wayefunda ophikweni lwaseSteve Biko, eThekwini ngoSepthemba 9, lapho ashaywa khona ekhanda ngesando ngaphambi kokuthi abanjwe inkunzi.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UHLALELE ovalweni umndeni wowesilisa waseRedcliffe, eVerulam, okuthiwa udutshulwe wabulawa ngomunye wesilisa wakule ndawo obemsola ngokuthi uyishende le ntombi yakhe ngoMgqibelo.
Umndeni kaMnuz Sibusiso Ncanana (34) uthe uzizwa ungaphephile njengoba owesilisa odubule umufi engakaboshwa ekubeni kuthiwa uke wabonakala kule ndawo ebusuku yize ebalekile emini ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi efunwa ngamaphoyisa.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
INKANTOLO eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ikuhlehlisele inyanga ezayo ukulalelwa kwesicelo samalungu e-ANC angeneme esifundeni iMoses Mabhida Region abefuna kuhlakazwe isigungu sesikhashana salesi sifunda ngoba ethi sesiphelelwe yisikhathi.
Le nkantolo ifuna ukuthi leli cala lilalelwe kanye namanye kanti alukho uzinzo kulesi sifunda njengoba kukhona amalungu afuna kuhlaliswe ingqungquthela ezokhetha ubuholi.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IMANQIKANQIKA ukuvota intsha ezobe ivota okokuqala okhethweni lukazwelonke kulo nyaka ngenxa yokunganeliseki ngokufakwa kakhulu kwasebekhulile ezinhlakeni zobuholi.
Intsha okukhulunywe nayo ithe ifuna ukubona ushintsho ebuholini bezepolitiki, kufakwe abaholi abazoqonda izidingo zayo. Njengoba ngempelasonto ezayo kulindeleke kubhaliselwe ukuvota okokugcina ngaphambi kokhetho oluzoba ngoMeyi, enye intsha ayikaqinisekisi ukuthi izobhalisa.
label: politics

data:
OWAYEYISIKHULU saseBosasa, uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi, uthi isikhulu esiphezulu sale nkampani uMnuz Gavin Watson sasigwazela owayenguMqondisi wokuShushiswa koMphakathi u-Adv Nomgcobo Jiba nomqondisi wezokushushiswa kwamacala ayisipesheli uR100 000 ngenyanga ukuze le nkampani igweme ukushushiswa.
Uthe emuva kokuthi u-Adv Jiba emisiwe emsebenzini, uWatson wathi uMnuz Jacob Zuma kufanele alulungise lolu daba futhi wathi ufuna ukumvakashela. Njengamanje uJiba no-Adv Lawrence Mrwebi babhekene nekhomishini kaJaji Yvonne Mokgoro osathatha umhlala phansi ophenya ukuthi laba bobabili bawulungele yini lo msebenzi.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UBUMBANO, ezemfundo, ukubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo, ezempilo, ukufukula ezomnotho, ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi, ngezinye zezinto okulindeleke ukuthi zibe seqhulwini enkulumeni yaminyaka yonke ye-ANC ezothulwa nguMengameli wale nhlangano, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.
Le nkulumo ibhekwe ngabomvu, ikakhulu kulo nyaka wokhetho, njengoba le nhlangano izobe ikhankasela ukuwina ukhetho ukuze igcine amandla okuhola uhulumeni kuleli ngaphandle kwaseWestern Cape lapho kuphethe iDA.
label: politics

data:
ITHOLAKALE izolo isicekelwe phansi itekisi yeDA, ebintshontshwe eMorningside eThekwini ngoMgqibelo. Itekisi esetshenziselwa ukukhankasela ukhetho inemibala yeqembu nobuso bukaMnuz Zwakele Mncwango okufoloswe ngaye ukuba nguNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal.
UMncwango, obhale nakuFacebook ngokwebiwa kwetekisi, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ibigcine ukubonakala ngezithuba zabo 12 ebusuku. Uthe yebiwe lapho kuhlala khona umshayeli wayo eMorningside.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
LIHLEHLISELWE iJanuwari 24 icala lenkakha yomrepha uPitch Black Afro osolwa ngokubulala inkosikazi yakhe ngoDisemba 30 nyakenye.
Lo mculi owazakhela udumo ngamaculo okubalwa kuwo elithi Matofotofo uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi eJohannesburg ngoLwesihlanu. 
Imantshi ithe isicelo sebheyili salo mrepha, ogama lakhe uThulani Ngcobo, sizolalelwa ngalolu suku kulandela ukuqinisekiswa kwekheli alethule enkantolo. 
Usehlale esitokisini isikhathi esingaphezulu kwesonto selokhe aboshwa ngeledlule ngezinsolo zokubulala unkosikazi wakhe uCatherine Modisane endaweni yokulala eYeoville eGoli. 
Umshushisi u-Adv Mzamo Mathe utshele inkantolo ukuthi isicelo sakhe sebheyili sesingaqhubeka njengoba seliqinisekiwe ikheli lendawo azobe ehlala kuyo uma kungenzeka athole ibheyili. 
Uthe sebekhulumile futhi nomuntu azohlala naye uma kuwukuthi siyaphasa isicelo sakhe sebheyili. 
Abameli bakaPitch Black bacela ukuthi lihlehliswe leli cala ukuze bezokwazi ukulungiselela isicelo sebheyili. Imatshi isemukele isicelo sabo yabanika isikhathi sokuzilungiselela
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UBUHOLI be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal busemkhankasweni wokuqeda ukudideka kubantu basemakhaya mayelana nokuthi ngubani umengameli obusayo phakathi kukaMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa noMnuz Jacob Zuma.
Lokhu kuvezwe yiPhini likakaNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka izolo, kulandela ukuthi ezindaweni zesifunda iNkosi Bhambatha, eNquthu naseMsinga, kuvele ukuthi kusenokudideka emphakathini yakhona esakholwa ukuthi uZuma usengumengameli.
label: politics

data:
PHEZU kokuba abahlaziyi bezepolitiki bethi i-ANC izophinde iwudle umhlanganiso okhethweni lukazwelonke okulindeleke ukuthi lube ngoMeyi nonyaka kodwa bathi akukho okusha okuvele kumhlahlandlela wokhetho othulwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.
URamaphosa uthule umqulu obugxile emfundweni yamahhala, ezempilo, ukufukula umnotho, ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi, ukubuyiswa komhlaba, ukulwa nobugebengu, ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane nabakhubazekile, ukwehliswa kokubiza kwe-data, ukwakha izindlu, izikole, amadamu nezinye izethembiso.
label: politics

data:
BABUYELE esikoleni ngoLwesibili abafundi besikole samabanga aphansi eNdwedwe obese kuphele isonto sivalwe abazali namalungu omphakathi.
Isolezwe lithole ukuthi akuphazamisekanga ukufunda ngosuku lokuqala eNtaphuka Primary bebuyele esikoleni njengoba abafundi babegcine ngoLwesibili olwedlule. Abazali namalungu omphakathi bebevale isikole ngoba besola amalungu amabili esigungu esilawula isikole ngokudla uR40 000 wesikole.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UZOLINDA elinye isonto ngaphambi kokuthi akwazi ukufaka isicelo sebheyili owesifazane waseKlarinet, eMpumalanga, osolwa ngokubulala izingane zakhe ezine ngamaholidi kaKhisimuzi.
UNksz Zemhle Zinhle Maditla (24) uvele eNkantolo yesiFunda eWitbank ngoMsombuluko lapho ebhekene khona namacala amane okubulala. Kubikwa ukuthi ngosuku ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“abulalaÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ ngalo izingane zakhe naye wayazama ukuzibulala kodwa wangaphumelela.

data:
UKHUNGATHEKILE umndeni wakwaCele eMariannhill emuva kokulahleka kwendodakazi yawo. UNksz Andile Lucia Cele waduka ngoKhisimusi kade evakashele isoka lakhe elase limlobola eMatimatolo.
Udadewabo kaNksz Cele, uNksz Smangele Cele, uthe ngoDisemba 22 u-Andile (27) wasuka kubo wayogibela itekisi eliya eGreytown esuka ePinetown, eGreytown ezogibela eya eMatimatolo.

data:
IZONGENISA uR2 billion imigubho ye-ANC emnothweni waKwaZulu-Natal njengoba kutheleke abantu abangaphezu kuka-100 000 kuleli sonto.
Lezi zindaba zivezwe nguNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala osho lokhu emuva kokuthi iPhini leMenenja kaMasipala weTheku uMnuz Phillip Sithole lithe wonke amahhotela amakhulu nagudle ulwandle agcwele njengoba kunemicimbi yemigubho yeminyaka ewu-107 yokusungulwa kwe-ANC.

data:
KUSOLWA ukuthi uzikhunge ngenxa yokhwantalala oludalwe ukubanjwa inkunzi nokuthunjwa owesilisa waseZimbabwe otholakale elenga emgwaqweni omkhulu eVerulam ngeSonto.
UMnuz Michael Chikura (24) kuthiwa bekusaphele isonto esinde esehlakalweni sokuthunjwa, waphucwa noR600 ngamadoda angaziwa. Isitatimende esithunyelwe yinkampani yabezimo eziphuthumayo, iReaction Unit South Africa (RUSA), siveza ukuthi uChikura obehlala eWaterloo, watholakala elenga esihlahleni emgwaqweni uR102 eduze kwebhuloho eVerulam.

data:
UMKHANDLU olawula othisha kuleli iSouth african Council for Educators (SACE) usichithe isitatimende senyunyana yothisha iSouth African Liberated Public Sector Workers Union (Salipswu) eyasungulwa ngowayenguMengameli weSadtu owakhonjwa indlela uMnuz Thobile Ntola, sokuthi isikhulu esiphezulu salo mkhandlu sahlangana noNobhala weSadtu KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Nomarashiya Caluza ngezinsolo zokuthi akanazo iziqu zokufundisa.
Umkhandlu uthe awukho umhlangano ofuze lo oke wabakhona.

data:
IMFUNDO yamahhala emanyuvesi nasemakolishi, ukwakhiwa kwamanyuvesi amabili, izigidi zabantu abathola imishanguzo yokulwa negciwane lengculazi, ukudla kwabafundi ezikoleni ngezinye zezinto owayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma athi zenzeka eminyakeni eyisishiyagalolunye ephethe.
UZuma uphefumule kuTwitter ephendula inkulumo kaMengameli wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, ayenza eDavos ngeledlule ukuthi kuchitheke isikhathi kule minyaka eyisishiyagalolunye eyayisingethwe nguZuma.

data:
INHLANGANO ezibiza ngeDagga Party of South Africa, ithi uma ingakwazi ukuthola uR200 000 ofunwa yinhlangano eyengamele ukhetho kuleli ukuze iqembu lezepolitiki likwazi ukungenela ukhetho, kuyobe kuphenduleke imithandazo yabo bonke abantu bakuleli abafisa ukusebenzisa insangu ngokukhululeka. 
Le nhlangano ithi isikwenze konke okudingekayo njengokubhalisa isiqubulo seqembu nelogo, kodwa njengamanje isasenkingeni yokuhlanganisa imali yokubhalisa.

data:
ISISHOSHOVU seFees Must Fall esigwetshwe iminyaka emithathu sisebenzela umphakathi sithe akusethusi ukusebenzela umphakathi ngoba yinto esiyijwayele.
UMnuz Bonginkosi Khanyile (29) owayeyisitshudeni saseDurban Univesity of Technology (DUT) ngesikhathi ehola umkhankaso weFees Must Fall ngo-2016, ugwetshwe iminyaka emithathu noma inhlawulo kaR5000 yinkantolo yemantshi eThekwini izolo. Isigwebo silengiswe iminyaka emihlanu.

data:
UMENGAMELI we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uvumile ukuthi inhlangano yakhe i-ANC yenze inqwaba yamaphutha kule minyaka edlule futhi izimisele ngokuzehlisa phambi kwabantu iwalungise ukuze babuyelwe yithemba kuyona.
URamaphosa usho lokhu ngesikhathi ephakathi nenkulumo yakhe emcimbini wokwethula komhlahlandlela wokhetho obusenkundleni iMoses Mabhida eThekwini ebigcwele phama kungekho nendawo yokubeka unyawo.

data:
KULINDELEKE siphume namhlanje isinqumo ngesicelo sebheyili sekhansela le-ANC elisolwa ngokubulala elinye okusolwa kukho umbango wesikhundla eMlaza. Izolo eNkantolo kaMantshi eMlaza abameli babasolwa baveze izethulo zabo.
UMbuso nawo waqala ukuveza ezawo ngesicelo sebheyili. Kulindeleke imantshi, uMnuz Thulani Mbuyazi, ukuba ihlaziye okubekwe wuMbuso nabameli, bese ikhipha isinqumo. Izolo leli cala belithanyelwe uMengameli we-ANCYL kuzwelonke, uMnuz Colleen Maine. Ufike icala seliphakathi.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UZITHINTELE kubantu umsiki wengqephu waseNgwelezane, eMpangeni ngemuva ngokuhlambalaza amadodakazi akhe amathathu ngokuwamodelisa namaphepha anemibhalo ewathukayo enxanxatheleni yezitolo iSanlam Centre, eMpangeni ngempelasonto edlule.
Uyise wezingane esingeke simdalule ngenxa yokuvikela zona, kuthiwa uqhube amadodakazi akhe aneminyaka elinganiselwa ku-13 kuya ku-15 ewanamathisele amaphepha ezifubeni abhalwe ngemibhalo emikhulu egqamile ethi awanaso isimilo, athandana nenqwaba yamadoda, alala nawo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
IMEYA yaseMgungundlovu, uMnuz Themba Njilo, ithi babonga uNkulunkulu ngokuvikela umsakazi woKhozi FM olimale kabi esigamekweni okusolwa kuso ukuthi ubedunwa imoto.
Kushaqise abaningi ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi uSbu Buthelezi wohlelo lwasemini Indiza Nathi ngo-12 kuya ku-3 ntambama phakathi nezinsuku udutshulwe amahlandla amaningana ngeSonto ebusuku eMbali, eMgungundlovu.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UMASIPALA weTheku usuthembise ukuthi kuzobuyela esimeni esijwayelekile ukuqoqwa kukadoti osekunesikhathi ungaqoqwa eMlaza nakwezinye izindawo eThekwini.
Izolo iphini lenhloko yezokuxhumana kumasipala, uMnuz Mandla Nsele, lithe sebeqalile ngohlelo lokuqoqa udoti kusukela ngoMsombuluko, nayizolo bebesaqhubeka nakho. Udoti sekunamasonto amabili ungaqoqwa eMlaza, Chesterville naseMayville nokukholakala ukuthi kudalwa ukungakhokhelwa ngendlela kosonkontileka. UNsele uthe banethemba lokuthi isimo sizobuyela kwesijwayelekile uma sebeqoqa obungalandwa.
label: politics

data:
KUQHUME umkikizo kwaculwa nezingoma zomzabalazo izolo ngesikhathi abasebenzi befemu yendwangu eVerulam bejabulela ukuvakashelwa ongqongqoshe abebezoyivula ngokusemthethweni. Abasebenzi base-Africa Bespoke Apparel (ABA), bamamukele ngesasasa uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala obehambisana nePhini likaNgqongqoshe wezokuHweba neziMboni uMnuz Bulelani Magwanishe.
Bekuvulwa ngokusemthethweni ifemu edale amathuba omsebenzi angaphezu kuka-500. Kudle uR81 million ukuvulwa kwefemu okuthiwa iyona enkulu esifundazweni. Umsebenzi wokuyivula, oxhaswe yiKZN Growth Fund noMnyango wezokuHweba neziMboni, waqala ngo-2016.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
IKHALELWE ngamasongo kaSigonyela inyanga yaseMasosheni, eGreytown, okuthiwa ibidlwengula abantu besifazane abakhendla kuyona ibalutha ngokuthi umphambili wayo yilona khubalo eyelapha ngalo, othole wona ngeke aphinde ahlupheke.
Inyanga eneminyaka engu-26 esingeke sikwazi ukuyidalula ngoba ayikaveli enkantolo, iboshwe ngoLwesine ekuseni isekhaya layo. Leli phephandaba lihabule ngemithombo yalo ukuthi inyanga ibimatasa ithaka amakhathakhatha ayo ngesikhathi ezakwadalwane zitheleka yathuka, yajuluka yamanzi te bayigaxa izinsimbi bachitheka nayo.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
MHLELI: Ngokwejwayelekile ukuqala konyaka omusha kuletha ithemba ebantwini abehlukene kodwa akunjalo ezinganeni eziphothule iziqu zobuthishela emanyuvesi. Ezinye zalezi zingane sezineminyaka emithathu zaphothula imfundo ephakeme kodwa lutho ukuthola umsebenzi. Okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi bafunde kanzima abazali beboleka imali ngethemba lokuthi uma sebephothulile kuyoba lula ukuyibuyisela kulabo abatshelekisayo.
Kunoxhaso okuthiwa yiFunza Lushaka. Abantwana bathi iyisiqalekiso impilweni yalabo abafunde kanzima abazali beqhwanda ukuze baphumelele. Ngesikhathi besafunda bathi bazifaka izicelo kulo Funza kodwa zangaphumelela. Uma sebezizamele baphumelela batshelwa ukuthi kuzobhekwa kuqala abafunde ngalo Fundza Lushaka. Ngabe bukhona ubuntu uma ziphathwa kanje izingane zethu ezifunde kanzima zingaxhaswe muntu?

data:
ZINGASE zivalwe ezinye zezikole okuvalwe ngehlahla kwangaphasa ngisho umfundi oyedwa ku-matric KwaZulu-Natal ngo-2018 ngoba ezinye zazo bezinomfundi oyedwa obhalile.
UMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni uzobizela esigcawini othishanhloko balezi zikole ukuthi bazochaza ngemiphumela engemihle abayitholile. Sinyukile isibalo sezikole okungaphasanga muntu kuzona ngo-2018 njengoba ziyisishiyagalolunye zisuka kwezintathu ngo-2017.

data:
UKHALA ngokucwaswa ngokobuhlanga omunye wabaholi beNFP ngemuva kokuhlaselwa kuleli qembu ngoba esolwa ngokwenza izikibha ezinobuso bakhe esikhundleni sokufaka obukaNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi.
UMnuz Shaik Emam Mansoor obuye abe yilungu lePhalamende, uthuse ozakwabo kuNFP ngokuziqoka njengogaqele isikhundla sokuba uNdunankulu waseWestern Cape ngaphandle kokuphakanyiswa ohlwini lwamagama asuka ezinhlakeni zeqembu, abazomela ezifundazweni nasePhalamende.

data:
IHHOVISI likaNgqongqoshe wezeMvelo uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane lithi lo ngqongqoshe akakazophawula okwamanje ngezinsolo abekwa zona kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana eholwa yiJaji uRaymond Zondo.
Izolo owayeyisikhulu saseBosasa, uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi, uveze ukuthi babegwazela uNkk Mokonyane ngoR50 000 njalo ngenyanga baphinde bamthengele inyama, utshwala obuphambili baphinde bamngcwabele nezihlobo.

data:
UZONGENA nasemalokishini umkhankaso wokuvala izitolo ezisebenza zingenawo amaphemithi kanti kuzoshaqwa namakhonteyna abekwe ngokungemthetho.
Lokhu kushiwo uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, obehambisana neMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede, izolo ngesikhathi begasela ezitolo eChesterville nasePhoyinti eThekwini, kubhekwa ukuthi zinawo yini amaphemithi okusebenza. Kuvalwe ezimbili ePhoyinti okutholakale ukuthi azinawo amaphemithi. Esinye sitholakale sidayisa ukudla kwezingane osekudlulelwe yisikhathi, okunye okubhalwe ukuthi sadlula ngo-2015.

data:
Isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal sibaluleke kakhulu emlandweni nasekusimameni kwe-ANC. Lo mlando wacishe washabalala ngeminyaka yawo-1990 lapho khona osomathuba bakha isithombe okungesona bethi i-ANC ngeyamaXhosa, i-IFP ngeyamaZulu.
Isinqumo sobuholi be-ANC sokubamba ingqungquthela yohlu lwabazongena ephalamende likazwelonke nawezifundazwe, inkulumo yaminyaka yonke eyaziwa ngeJanuary 8 Statement nokwethulwa kwemigomo yokhetho yeqembu eThekwini sikhumbuza iNingizimu Afrika ngokubaluleka kwalesi sifundazwe kwi-ANC.

data:
OWAYEYISIKHULU saseBosasa uMnuz Angelo Agrizzi, uphinde waveza ukuthi wayegwazela isikhulu sePolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) asibize ngoSbu (kodwa isibongo angasisho) ukuze sizame owayenguKhomishana wamajele uMnuz Vernie Petersen ukuthi asebenzisane neBosasa.
U-Agrizzi uthe uSbu uyingxenye yabantu ababegwazelwa ngoR1 million ukuze aqinisekise ukuthi uPetersen akanqabi lutho olucelwa yizinkampani zakwaBosasa ngo-2007.

UNxele ubekhuluma ne-African News Agency (ANA) ngaphandle kwenkantolo yabasebenzi ngoLwesibili, lapho abezama khona ukuyoguqula isinqumo sokumiswa kwakhe.

data:
UKUBALULEKA kokonga ngokwezidingo nezimiso zakho kuyinto eyaziwayo. Sesiside isikhathi sikhuluma ngokuthi abatshalimali abalithathi ithuba elikhona ezimakethe ukuthenga ezinhlelweni ezifana ne-stock market.
Kulolu hlelo sikholelwa ngukuthi, abatshalimali kumele babheke uhlelo lotshalomali oluzokhula njengokutshala kwizinhlelo ezizoletha inzuzo ephezulu. Ngakho isaluleko sethu sithi, kubalulekile ukuthi amalungu esitokofela aqale ukubheka ezinye izinhlelo ezehlukene ezikhona kwizimakethe.

URamaphosa ehambisana nabanye abaholi be-ANC esifundazweni uhambele kule ndawo izolo enxenxa abantu ukuthi batheleke ngobuningi kulo mgubho weqembu. Uphinde wathembisa ukuthi uzothula uhlelo lwakhe lokuthuthukisa izwe.

I-video kaDeysel eshayiswa yitekisi ebisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kukhona abakugxekayo ukuvezwa kwayo abanye bazwelana nomndeni wakhe.

I-EFF yafunga yagomela ukuthi kuzoba ncane indawo ePhalamende uma kuphela uJanuwari nonyaka uRamaphosa engacacisile ngodaba lwemali ebalelwa kuR500 000 okuthiwa wayinikelelwa yinkampani iBosasa ngesikhathi ekhankasela ukuba umengameli we-ANC.

Lona wesilisa osindile kuthiwa uthole imihuzukwana okukholakala ukuthi idalwe ukuwa esuka esitezi sokuqala phezulu ewela phansi kuleli fulethi eliseduze neNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngaseMtateni.

UMnuz Nzuza ngiyavumelana naye uma ethi kusuka ngo-1994 umkhandlu sewakhe izindlu eziningi eThekwini noma ke ngingeqinise ngesibalo asishoyo sezindlu asebezakhile kodwa kukhona lapho engidideka khona. data:
ABALANDELI nabazalwane bebandla loMprofethi oboshelwe ukushushumbisa imali basuleke izinyembezi izolo yena nomkakhe bethola ibheyili.
Bekuyinjabulo yodwa kubazalwane be-Enlightened Christian Gathering (ECG), ngaphandle kweNkantolo yamacala ezimali ePitoli. Bebejabulela ukuthi umholi webandla uMprofethi Shepherd Bushiri (35) nomkakhe uNkk Mary Bushiri (37) bathole ibheyili kaR100 000 umuntu emunye. Bekusha umculo ngaphandle kwenkantolo abanye bebonga amandla omthandazo emuva kokukhululwa kwabo. Abanye babhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi sekuzoke kufike ubuthongo, bakwazi nokubuyela emsebenzini.

UMnuz Simingaye Oscar Hlatshwayo (38) obeyi-Excutive Director oPhikweni loKwakhiwa kweNgqalasizinda kuMasipala i-Alfred Duma, kuthiwa bekungakapheli isikhathi eside eyalele omunye wabangani bakhe ukuthi enze isiqiniseko sokuthi imfuyo yakhe inophawu.

data:
AKUWONA wonke amabhizinisi azohlomula ngoxhaso lukaR50 million lwesikhwama esizosiza intsha KwaZulu-Natal, esethulwe izolo eThekwini.
Lokhu kushiwo uNdunankulu obambile esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, obethula lesi sikhwama esibizwa ngeKZN Growth Fund. Lesi sikhwama samenyezelwa uNdunankulu uMnuz Willies Mchunu ngesikhathi kuvulwa isiShayamthetho ngonyaka odlule. UZikalala uthe lesi sikhwama sizohlomulisa kuphela amabhizinisi angeke aphelele endleleni kodwa azokwazi ukukhula isikhathi eside. Uveze nokuthi bazobheka amabhizinisi azokwazi ukudala amathuba omsebenzi kwenye intsha.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
BACHIPHIZE izinyembezi kwakhona noqulekayo enkantolo ngesikhathi benqatshelwa ukufaka isicelo sebheyili abasolwa ngokushisa ibhasi likamasipala befuna imisebenzi esibhedlela iKing Dinuzulu, eSydenham.
Izolo amalungu angu-29 omphakathi waseSydenham ku-ward 25 asolwa ngokushisa ibhasi likamasipala, yindlu yonogada basesibhedlela iKing Dinuzulu aphinde ashaya alimaza ama-ambulensi amabili avele enkantolo yamntshi eThekwini ngecala lokuphehla udlame emphakathini.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
I-IFP noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli bathi bashaqekile ngokusatshiswa ngokubulawa komndeni wowesilisa ogonyuluke kubo ngokusocongwa kwekhansela leNkatha laseZululand. Lo mlisa usevule necala emaphoyiseni aseMgungundlovu ePressburry, ladluliselwa eVryheid kanti uthi usongelwa umholi oqavile kwi-IFP ngoba efuna asuse igama lakhe esitatimendeni esifungelwe esimnukayo.
Lokhu kulandela ukuthi lo mlisa ocele ligodlwe igama lakhe, ekhale ngokuthi kunamaphoyisa awabize ngamagama asebeke engcupheni umndeni wakhe ehlangene nalo mholi we-IFP naye eligodliwe igama lakhe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Willies Mchunu uthi iyabakhuthaza imibono abayithola kubantu uma benza ucwaningo emphakathini, ngenhloso yokuthola ukuthi baphethe kanjani.
Ethula inkulumo yakhe mayelana nesimo sesifundazwe, enkundleni yezemidlalo eRoyal Showgrounds eMgungundlovu, ngaphambi kokuthi axinwe ukugula, uMchunu uthe bathatha isinqumo sokuthi benze ucwaningo emphakathini, ukuze bafunde ukuthi ikuphi lapho bengenzi khona kahle.
label: society

data:
UNGQONGQOSHE wezaMandla uJeff Radebe uzohambela isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal namhlanje, emkhankasweni wokusiza izingane zesikole eziswele izicathulo. Inhloso yomkhankaso ukuveza ukubaluleka kokufunda nokuthi izingane zesikole zikwazi ukuya esikoleni, ngaphandle kokucwaswa futhi zizibone zifana nezinye ngisho ngabe ziphuma emakhaya ahlwempu.
Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelwe, ungqongqoshe uthi akumele izingane zingayi esikoleni ngenxa yokungabi nezicathulo ezifanele.
label: society

data:
USASHAQEKILE umphakathi waseNtshawini, eStanger, ngokubulawa kwabalisa ababili abaklajwe bashiswa ngamalungu omphakathi abebasola ngokuba yizigebengu ezingena emizini yabantu.
Kuthiwa uMnuz Thulubheke Thokozani Mdlalose (29) noMnuz Bhekinkosi Mfundeni Msomi (35) bebephuma emsebenzini nozakwabo ababili ngoLwesithathu ebusuku ngesikhathi bevinjwa abantu abebebasola ngokuba yingxenye yezigebengu okuthiwa zihlalise abantu lubhojozi ngokubangenela ezindlini zibaphuce impahla kokunye zidlwengule nabesifazane.

data:
INKANTOLO eNkulu eThekwini iphasise isicelo izolo sabalawula ukushaqwa kwempahla yeziqumama zakwaMpisane, ezisolwa ngokungayikhokhi intela.
UMnuz Sbu Mpisane nenkosikazi yakhe uShauwn basolwa yiSouth African Revenue Services (Sars) ngokuyikweleta uR204 million wentela enzuzweni abayenza ezinkampanini zabo, iZikhulise Gro Zikhulise Maintenance and Transport, Zikhulise Auto Restorers, Inyanga Trading, Royal Eagles Football Club, Zikhulise Auto Recoveries, the Zikhulise Group, neSbusha Trust.

data:
OWAYENGUNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, oyinhloko yezinhlelo zemikhankaso ye-ANC nelungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uthe uMengameli we-ANC nezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa unikwe umsebenzi wokuthi agxile ekukhuliseni umnotho wezwe ukuze kwakheke amathuba emisebenzi kukhule nezwe.
UMchunu uthe lezi ngezinye zezinto okumele zilungiswe ngokushesha ezweni ukuze abantu baphume ebubheni.

data:
IYAVUTHA ikhokhasi yamakhansela e-ANC kuMasipala waseMtubatuba ikhala ngemeya athi ilaxaze imoto ngoba isaba ukuthi inotokoloshe, yathenga entsha ceke ngemali kamasipala. 
Amakhansela athi iMeya uMnz Velangenkosi Gumede iyeke imoto iJeep Cheerokee emnyama yaze yadayiswa ngoba isaba ukuthi uma ihamba ngayo ingase ibeke impilo yayo engcupheni ngoba icushwe ngotokoloshe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
LIKHULU isasasa ngombukiso omkhulu wamabhizinisi ozoba KwaZulu-Natal okokuqala ngenyanga ezayo.
Kulindeleke ukuthi ihehe osomabhizinisi abaningi i-International Franchise and Entrepreneur Expo eyethulwa Ithala ngokuhlanganyela neFranchise Association of South Africa (Fasa). Kuzobe kuwunyaka ka-21 kwenziwa lo mbukiso ohlose ukunika ithuba osomabhizinisi abancane nemifelandowonye ukuhweba emabhizinisini eFranchising. Oyisikhulu esiphezulu se-Ithala Development Finance Corporation uNksz Pearl Bengu, uthe ukulethwa kwalo mbukiso KwaZulu-Natal kuyingxenye yemizamo yabo yokuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abancane.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
KUBHEKWE ukuthi udaba lokudala amathuba emisebenzi, ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda nezinhlelo zokufukula intsha kube ngezinye zezinto eziseqhulwini uma uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Willies Mchunu (osesithombeni), esethula inkulumo yakhe mayelana nesimo sesifundazwe enkundleni yezemidlalo eRoyal Show Grounds eMgungundlovu ngoLwesithathu.
Namhlanje iSilo samaBandla uGoodwill Zwelithini kulindeleke ukuthi sivule isiShayamthetho ngokusemthethweni bese kuthi kusasa uMchunu athule inkulumo yakhe mayelana nesimo sesifundazwe.

data:
OWAYEYILUNGU lePhalamende, uNkk Vytjie Mentor, izolo ubuze kabanzi ngokwethembeka kwemininingwane yocingo eqoshiwe eyiswe kwiKhomishini ivela kuNkk Lakela Kaunda owayesebenza njengomsizi kaMnuz Jacob Zuma.
UNkk Mentor ubethula ubufakazi osukwini lwesibili kwikhomishini lapho ekade ehlohlwa imibuzo. Ngonyaka odlule wabethula ubufakazi kodwa nakulo nyaka uphinde wabizwa ngoba bekukhona izinto obekumele azicacise.

data:
UKHALA uyazithulisa owesilisa wasePort Shepstone owayevakashele umngani wakhe eThekwini, othi wabanjwa inkunzi waphucwa uR1 100 nguscabha etekisini yaseSouth Beach.
 UMnuz Christ Cele, uthe wayeyohlangana nomngani wakhe, wagibela itekisi ngo-5.30 ekuseni, esekhokha kuscabha owayeqoqa imali kwabanye abagibeli wabe esekhonjwa ngommese yilo sicabha, wathatha yonke imali yakhe.

data:
MHLELI: Ngizwakalisa umuzwa wami ngengqungquthela ye-IFP KZN ebisoLundi ngempelasonto mhla ka-29 Juni. Ngiyilungu le-IFP ebeliyingxenye yengqungquthela futhi ebelinelungelo lokuvota.
Ngizwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngenkulumo kaMnuz Xolani Dube ongumhlaziyi wezepolitiki, ayisho ohlelweni lwezindaba kuKhozi FM ngoJulayi 1. UDube uthe uMnuz AT Ntuli ukhonjiwe nekomiti akhethwe nalo. Lapho umhlaziyi ubekhomba ngenjumbane umholi wethu, uMntwana waKwaPhindangene ukuthi ukhombe uNtuli ukuthi abe ngusihlalo waseKZN.
label: politics

data:
SIPHINDE safakelwa ezinye izigidi isikhwama okuhloswe ngaso ukusiza intsha enamabhizinisi KwaZulu-Natal, esethulwa ekuqaleni konyaka. Lesi sikhwama esibizwa ngeKZN Youth Fund sethulwa nguNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala ngoJanuwari. Ethula isabelozimali sehhovisi lakhe izolo, undunankulu umemezele ukuthi kuzokwengezwa uR50 million kulesi sikhwama.
Ngesikhathi sethulwa ngoJanuwari, uZikalala waveza ukuthi wuR50 million obekelwe lesi sikhwama. Emuva kokwethulwa kwaso kwabuye kwaba nesidlo sasekuseni nabanye osomabhizinisi abanikele ngoR20 million, okwenze isikhwama saba uR70 million. Kumanje isikhwama sesinoR120 million.
label: economy, business and finance

data:
ABALANDELI beMeya yeTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede basabisa ngokuthatha izinyathelo uma ingabuyiselwa emsebenzini njengoba inikwe ikhefu ngemuva kwamacala enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa athinta ithenda yezigidi yokuqoqwa kukadoti.
Abalandeli bakaNkk Gumede izolo bebebhikisha edolobheni bezwakalisa ilaka labo ngemuva kokuthi i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal yelule isikhathi ikhefu lakhe kuze kube yenza isimemezelo ekuqaleni kuka-Agasti.

data:
KUSAME nse ukusebenza kwamatekisi erenki yaseMlaza, iMNR naseNgonyameni njengoba ososeshini bakulezi zindawo bengavumelananga emhlanganweni kulandela ukubulawa kwabashayeli abangaphansi kwasoseshini uMNR eMlaza. NgoLwesibili ntambama kubulawe abashayeli bamatekisi ababili kwizigameko ezehlukene. Umshayeli oyedwa udutshulwe ka-D kanti omunye udutshulwe kwa-M.
Kuthiwa ukubulawa kwalaba bashayeli kulandela ukubangwa kwemizila phakathi kososeshini ababili iMNR Taxi neNgonyameni Taxi. Kuthiwa osomatekisi bakwaMNR banqabele amatekisi aseNgonyameni ukuthi asebenzise umgwaqo odlula eMlaza uma beya eThekwini nokusolwa ukuthi yikho okususe lolu thuthuva.

Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uSergeant Martin XumaÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â uthe le ndoda iboshwe abeSelossha Tactical Response Team ngemuva kokutholwa kwale mali ifakwe ezicathulweni lapho kuhlala khona izingubo zokugqoka emzini wayo.

OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma usazolinda uphenyo lweKhomishana kaJaji Raymond Zondo ngezinsongo zokubulawa abhekene nazo ngaphambi kokuba afake isicelo sokuba kwengezwe ezokuPhepha kuye.
Lokhu kuvezwe umkhulumeli wakhe, uMnuz Vukile Mathabela emuva kokuba kube nezinhlangano eziphazamise ukuba kuqiniswe ezokuphepha kuZuma, ummeli wakhe u-Advocate Muzi Sikhakhane nomndeni wakhe uZuma.

data:
SEKUPHINDE kwangena esinye isikhalo ngengqungquthela ye-IFP Youth Brigade okuwuphiko lwentsha yeNkatha ebihleli oLundi ngempelasonto. Iziko Imbabazane elibuye lizibize ngoMtshezi, kuthiwa seliphumele obala lithi kuningi okungahambanga kahle ngengqungquthela ekhethe uMnuz Mthokozisi Nxumalo kwesikaSihalo wophiko.
UNobhala walo uNksz Nobuhle Ngubane unqabile ukuphawula ngencwadi okuthiwa ithunyelwe esigungwini esiphezulu seqembu . Akafunanga ngisho ukukhuluma ngesikhalo okuthiwa basifakile uvele wavala ucingo.
label: politics

data:
USEMISIWE enhlanganweni uNobhala we-IFP ezikweni Enkululekweni, Osizweni, ngemuva kokuphumela obala wakhalaza mayelana nemiphumela yengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi obusha baKwaZulu-Natal ebisoNdini ngempelasonto. Isinqumo sokumisa uMnuz Siphiwe Zungu sithathwe isiyingi sasoSizweni ngoMsombuluko.
UPhini likaNobhala wesiyingi sasoSizweni, uNkk Noxolo Nzuza, uthe lesi sinqumo basithathe emhlanganweni ophuthumayo abawubizile ngoMsombuluko ngemuva kokuzwa uZungu ekhuluma emsakazweni mayelana nengqungquthela nokuyilapho ephinde wangakhuluma kahle ngoMengameli weqembu Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi.

data:
KUMISWE ukufunda esikoleni, Ukusa High, eHammarsdale izolo ngemuva kokubulawa konogada ababili okusolwa ukuthi bashaywe bafa begadile ebusuku bangoLwesithathu esikoleni.
Isidumbu sikaMnuz Mncedisi Ntuli (29) okuthiwa bekuwusuku lwakhe lokuqala esebenza esikoleni nesikazakwabo uMnuz Thandazani (46) zitholakale kwelinye lamakilasi esikole izolo ekuseni, uzakwabo wesithathu obesaphila uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela elimele kanzima.

data:
ABAHLAZIYI bezombusazwe babona lisengcupheni yokuphelelwa yisithunzi nokuthenjwa ihhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, (osesithombeni) emuva kokuchithwa kwakhe yinkantolo ekutheni kumele kusheshiswe izinyathelo azithathela uNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan ngodaba oluthinta ukusungulwa kophiko lwabaphenyi abangekho emthethweni kwa-SARS.
Izolo inkantolo enkulu eNorth Gauteng inqume ukuthi kumele kumiswe konke okuthinta ukuthathelwa izinyathelo kukaGordhan kuze kuphume isinqumo senkantolo. U-Advocate Mkhwebane wayalela noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi athathele uGordhan izinyathelo zokumqondisa ubugwegwe. Wayalela nePhalamende ukuthi lithathele izinyathelo uGordhan.

data:
IMEYA kaMasipala waseKurhuleni uMnuz Mzwandile Masina, ishaya phansi ngonyawo ukuthi ngeke yehle esikhundleni emuva kwezinsolo zenkohlakalo yethenda yamathoyilethi.
UMasina obekhuluma nesiteshi somsakazo iSAfm izolo, uyazichitha izinsolo zethenda kaR1.9bn. UMasina usola ukuthi kunetulo lokumsusa esikhundleni. Uthe kunemiyalezo esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuthiwa kumele asule. Uveze ukuthi akukho okungahambanga kahle ngesikhathi kukhishwa le thenda. Uthe kwayona ithenda yakhishwa engakangeni esikhundeni ngo-Agasti 2016.

data:
KUZOSHUBA ezinkampanini eziphula umthetho wokusebenza konogada njengoba iPrivate Security Industry Regulatory Authority (Psira) isimise inkampani edume ngokukhipha abakhe ezindaweni ezingafanele, iRed Ants Security Relocation and Eviction Services.
IPsira imise ukusebenza kweRed Ants emuva kwezikhalo zokuthi inesihluku uma yenza umsebenzi wayo futhi ayibaphathi kahle abantu esuke izobakhipha.

AMASOSHA oMkhonto weSizwe Military Veterans Association (MKMVA) eGauteng azoqhubeka nemashi yawo ebhekiswe ekomkhulu le-ANC iLuthuli House yize kunohlangothi loMkhonto weSizwe National Council olungahambisani nayo.
Izolo okhulumela iMKMVA kuzwelonke uMnuz Carl Niehaus, uthe imashi eGauteng izoqhubeka njengoba behlelile yize iMK National Council idonse amalungu ayo ngendlebe yathi akangamasheli eLuthuli House namhlanje.

UMnuz Philani Thwala (37) ubevele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseNewcastle izolo ngecala lokubulala uMnuz Martin Sithole owayeyilungu le-ANC nomngani wakhe uMnuz Buthanani Shange owayenguthishomkhulu, eNewcastle.

data:
BAGODUKE bengadlile izolo abafundi besikole samabanga aphansi KwaMakhutha, abafike kugqekezwe kwebiwa nokudla kwabo.
Kuphoqeleke ukuthi basheshe bagoduke abafundi baseHabiyane Primary njengoba izigebengu zithathe konke ukudla abaphekelwa kona, kwebiwa nesitofu. Isolezwe lifike kulesi sikole izolo omama abaphekayo bezipholele ekhishini. Endlini okuhlala kuyo ukudla bekukhona ama-butternut ambalwa okuthiwa yiwona asale ngesikhathi kwebiwa. data:
I-IFP isibize umhlangano ophuthumayo ne-DA ukuze inqande ingozi yokulahlekelwa uMasipala wasebaQulusini nabanye KwaZulu-Natal njengoba bubamuncu ubudlelwane babo.
Lokhu kulandela ukuthi umholi weDemocratic Alliance KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango ebhalelwe incwadi iFederal Executive (FedEx) okuyisigungu esiphezulu seqembu imfaka ingcindezi ukuba acacise ngekusasa abanalo ne-IFP njengoba beyisola ngokubadayisa eGauteng nangokwamukela isikhundla seScopa kuzwelonke nesekomiti likaNdunankulu eSishayamthetho saseGoli.

data:
ABALANDELI beMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, bathi kabahambisani nokuthi umholi wabo aqhubeke nokuhlala ekhaya ibe ikhefu abenikwe lona lenyanga yi-ANC seliphelile.
UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, izolo utshele abezindaba ukuthi uNkk Gumede, iMeya yaseNewcastle, uDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba, nekhansela laseThekwini, uMnuz Mondli Mthembu, bazoqhubeka nokuhlala ekhaya kuze kube bathatha isinqumo ngabo okulindeleke ukuthi basikhiphe esontweni lokuqala ku-Agasti.

Esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini izolo, okhulumela abeseka uNkk Gumede, uMnuz Mzomuhle Dube usole uNobhala we-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele ngokufaka unyawo lwedada eThekwini.

Usho lokhu nje kulandela isinqumo sikaRamaphosa sokuthi uzoya enkantolo eyophikisana nombiko ka-Advocate Mkhwebane lapho ethe wakhohlisa iPhalamende ngodaba lwalo mnikelo kaR500 000 wokuxhasa umkhankaso wakhe wokuba nguMengameli we-ANC ngo-2017.

OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wakuleli uMnuz Jacob Zuma uthi ugqigqa izinkantolo nje futhi usevela kwikhomishini kaZondo yingenxa yetulo elidala lokuthi asuswe ebuholini kuhulumeni.Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â 
UZuma udalule lokhu ngoMsombuluko ngesikhathi eqala ukufakaza kwikhomishi ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana. Ngesikhathi eqala ukufakaza uZuma, ummeli wakhe u-Adv Muzi Sikhakhane uqale wacacisa ngokubhalela kwakhe ikhomishini eyicela ukuthi imthumelele imibuzo ngaphambi kokuthi avele. USikhakhane uveze ukuthi akukho kuhle ukuthi kule khomishini kunabantu asebebukwa njengamaqhawe abanye babukwa njengabasolwa ekubeni yasungulelwa ukuthi ithole iqiniso ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â
label: politics

data:
OKLEBE bathi bayazi ngezinsolo zokuphulwa kwemibandela yebheyili yiMeya yoMkhandlu weTheku uNkk Zandile Gumede emisiwe emsebenzini emva kokuboshwa mayelana namacala enkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa athinta ithenda yezigidi yokuqoqwa kukadoti eThekwini.
Okhulumela oKlebe, uBrigadier Hangwani Mulaudzi izolo uthe zikhona izikhalo abazitholile mayelana nokuthi uNkk Gumede uphule eminye yemibandela yakhe yebheyili.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
KUBOSHWE izisebenzi zoMnyango wezaseKhaya ezingu-17 kanjalo nabanye abangezona izisebenzi zalo mnyango abangu-12 ngamacala athinta inkohlakalo.
Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi ephendula umbuzo kaNksz Liezl Linda van der Merwe we-IFP obuze ukuthi iziphi izinyathelo ezenziwayo emnyangweni ukuqeda inkohlakalo ethinta ukukhishwa kwezinto ngomgunyathi emnyangweni okubeka engcupheni ezokuphepha kwezwe.
label: crime, law and justice

data:
SEKUZOPHELA ukuhamba amabanga amade beyotheza izinkuni abantu baseNquthu esigodini sakwaQwabe kulandela ukwethulwa kohlelo lukagesi olwethulwe ngoLwesibili.
Lolu hlelo lokufakelwa kwemizi engu-461 ugesi olubiza uR5 million lwethulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo ezobuCiko namaSiko, KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Hlengiwe Mavimbela obemele uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka.
label: politics

data:
SIZOVULWA ngelizayo isikole iSahlumbe High, eWeenen osekuphele inyanga sivaliwe ngenxa yezimpi zezigodi zabafundi ezikapakele esikoleni. Kuthiwa nezidakamizwa zidliwa udede esikoleni kukhalwa nangokushoda kwamakilasi.
Izolo uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu ube nomhlangano nomphakathi wakule ndawo kubalwa nenkosi uMthembu lapho kuvunyelwene khona ngokuthi kumele sivulwe isikole.
